56b6(mdo sde): mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi gtam sna tshogs te smra ba spangs pas ba s+phu re re nas/ g.yas phyogasu 'khyil ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i bshes
56b7(mdo sde): gnyen dang mkhan po dang bla ma rnams kyi bstan pa'i tshig yang dag par blangs pa dang bzung ba mngon tu spel zhing 'grib par ma byas pas/ yan lag gi spu gyen tu 'khyil ba'i mtshan
56b8(mdo sde): dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / yon tan dpag tu med par bsgrubs pas zhabs legs par thob pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams ting 'dzin bsgom par bskul
57a1(mdo sde): bas shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar dpag tu med pa'i
57a2(mdo sde): yon tan bsgrubs na/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis de lta bu dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// zhes de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das
57a3(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bdag bdag gis brtags na gang yang dngos po dang mtshan mar ma grub ste/ ma mchis la de bzhin gshegs pa
57a4(mdo sde): la brtags na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam de ma lags na/ ci'i slad du spyod lam rgya cher bsgrub ces gsungs/ dkon mchog gsum dang bden pa bzhi dang phung po dang
57a5(mdo sde): skye mched dang rten 'brel bcu gnyis dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos rnams la bdag gis brtags na yang phyi nang gi rgyu 'bras kun stong pa nyid de/ mtshan pa mchis
57a6(mdo sde): smon pa ma mchis/ skye zhing 'byung ba yang ma mthong / 'gag cing nub pa yang ma mthong / sgyu ma dang 'dra ba sprul pa dang 'dra ba/ 'bar ba dang 'dra ba/ brag ca dang 'dra ba/ chab kyi zla ba dang
57a7(mdo sde): 'dra ba khya sbal gyi spu dang 'dra ba ri bong gi rwa dang 'dra ba/ na mkha'i me tog dang 'dra ba/ sasham gyi bu dang 'dra ba/ gzugs brnyan gyi gos gyon zhing / sgyu ma'i glang po che la 'tshal
57a8(mdo sde): bdang 'dra ba/ mchis pa yang 'dra ma mchis pa yang 'dra ba/ de dag ni mchis pa dang ma mchis pa/ mchis pa yang ma lags/ ma mchis pa yang ma legs/ rtag pa ma lags/ 
57b1(mdo sde): chad pa ma lags/ skye ba ma lags/ 'gag pa ma lags/ nang du ma lags/ slad rol ma lags/ mthong ba ma lags/ shes pa ma lags/ dper na namakha' dang 'dra ba la/ bcom
57b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das ci'i slad du ngas ni spyod pa de dag spyad ces gsungs de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag gis brtags na/ bdag ma lags/ sem sa ma lags/ srog ma lags/ gseb ma lags/ 
57b3(mdo sde): skyes bu ma lags/ gang zag ma lags/ shed can ma lags/ shed bdag ma lags/ byed pa po la sogs pa sa lags/ mig ma lags/ gzugs ma lags/ mig dang gzugs kyi mtshan
57b4(mdo sde): nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/ rna ba ma lags/ sgra ma lags/ rna ba dang sgra'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/ snam lags/ dri ma lags/ sna dang dri'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/ lcem
57b5(mdo sde): lags/ ro ma legs/ lce dang ro'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma legs/ lus ma lags/ reg bya ma lags/ lus da nga reg bya'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/ yid ma lags
57b6(mdo sde): chos ma lags/ yid dang chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul yang ma lags/ rnam par shes pa ma lags/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul yang ma lags/ gzugs ma lags/ sdug bsngal ma la
57b7(mdo sde): gzugs dang sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid kyi sprid yul yang ma lags/ bdag ma lags/ bdag gi ma lags/ 'gro ba ma lags/ gzugs can ma lags/ phung po ma lags/ bden pa ma lag/ 
57b8(mdo sde): brdzun pa ma lags/ bsdus pa ma lags/ gtor ba ma lags/ 'byung ba ma lags/ 'jug pa ma lag ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin te/ 
58a1(mdo sde): brdud pas lags/ chung byon pa ma lags/ bzhugs pa'i gnas kyang mi mang/ sems dang ying dang rnam par shes pa yang mi mngang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyang mi ma
58a2(mdo sde): gcig pa 'ang ma lags/ tha dad pa'ang ma lags/ 'das pa'ang ma lags/ ma byon pa ma lags/ da ltar byung ba ma lags/ dri ma can ma lags yongasu dag pa ma lags/ bdag ma lags/ sems
58a3(mdo sde): lags/ srog dang skyes bu dang gang zag la sogs pa yang ma lags/ rtag pa ma lags/ chad pa ma lags/ skye ba ma mchis/ 'gag pa ma mchis/ bsgom du ma mchis/ spyong du ma mchis/ ngong dum
58a4(mdo sde): mchis/ blang du ma mchis/ mtha' las pa yun du zhugs pa la/ gang gi slang du skyed las rgya cher bsgrubs shes gsungs zhes gsal ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
58a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rnam pa'i snying po la leg so zhes bya ba byin nas/ legaso leg so// rigs kyi bu khyed sngon 'das pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams la byang byas
58a6(mdo sde): pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / yun ring po nas theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i don chub par shes te/ cho so cog kun kyang stong pa nyid du mngon par shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag
58a7(mdo sde): pa'i mtha' las 'das te/ yun du gnas par yang shes pas/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i nor bu shin tu dang pa gsal ba'angs rdzab kyi nang du la sdang gi nga
58a8(mdo sde): du bzhag kyang / rang bzhin yong gis dag pas phyir phyung na yang lnga ma kho bzhin te/ khyod kyang de dang 'dra bar chos kyi mtshan nyid mngon par rdzogs la rang bzhin rnam par dag pas byed rnamasar ltar
58b1(mdo sde): khams gsum na/ snyigs ma can rnam lnga'i 'das rdzab du gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang sems can gyi don byas kyi kyang 'dam rdzab kyis ma gos pas na/ don 'di lta bu dag 'di rus
58b2(mdo sde): pa yino// rigs kyi bu khyod yang nyon cig/ 'di lta ste/ chos so cog thams cad yang dag par na/ dngos po med de yi ge yod pa'i phyir chos bshad// chos kyi nang du yi ge med la yi ge'i nang
58b3(mdo sde): du yang chos medo// kun tu spel ba'i phyir yi ger bstan to// yi ge'i nang du ni byang chub kyang med/ byang chub kyi nang du ni yi ge yang med mod kyi/ don ngas par ni yi ge med kyang kun rdzob du yig
58b4(mdo sde): yod par bshad pas/ sems can la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang yi ga las gudrin mi snyed// rigs kyi'u khyod zer ba'ang bden te/ de bzhin ga shegs pa
58b5(mdo sde): la zad pa med/ skye ba med mi sgom mi spyod// sgom spyod rnam sa dang bral ba/ yang dag pa'i chos la mi 'jug/ de la sa ldog cing 'gyur ba yang ma yin/ skye ba gcig gis dga'
58b6(mdo sde): ldan gyi gnasu yang ma skyes/ de las babs te yum gyi lhum su yang ma gnas/ chos thams cad la sems mi gnas pas/ nga ni skye rga na 'chi las 'daso zhes kyang ma byas/ phyogs bzhir gom
58b7(mdo sde): pa bdun bdun yang ma dza / nga ni 'jig rten na bla na med pa btsun pa yin zhes kyang ma brjod// grong khyer mchog tu ma cung bzang mo dang yang ma brtsen/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba yig cis la sos
58b8(mdo sde): pa yang ma bslabs/ stobs dang 'phong rtsal yang ma bskrun to// sems can yongs mya ngan bzla ba'i phyir/ rgan po mngon sum du bstan pa ni lus la chags pa rnams bkas pa'o/ 
59a1(mdo sde): nad pa mngon sum du bstan pa ni tshe la chags pa rnams bkag pa'o// shi ba'i mtshan ma mngon sum du bstan pa ni/ 'dod chags dngang dang ngar 'dzin pa rnams bkag
59a2(mdo sde): pa'o// dge slong mngon sum du bstan pa ni/ sems can rnams tshangs pa dang brgya byin gyi lus su mi smon par 'jig rten las 'das pa/ bla na med pa'i chos la brtson par bsgrub par
59a3(mdo sde): bya ba'o// grong khyer mchog nas phyung ste/ gshegs pa ni khams gsum gyi btson ra las thar pa dang / 'bras bu ma yin pa rnams bstan pa'o// slar gzigs pa ni byams sdang ma
59a4(mdo sde): mnga' bar bstan pa'o// de'i phyir mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku rnam par brgyan cing / sems can gyi bsod nams kyi zhing du bya ba'o// dbu skra bregs pa dang rgyan rnams spangs
59a5(mdo sde): pa dang / rnga tsan ta ka zha 'bring dad pa can la slar bskur ban/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar bstan pa'o// kha spu bregs pa ni chos thams cad la mi chags par
59a6(mdo sde): bstan pa'o// ka shi ngur smrig gyon pa ni sems can gdul bar bstan pa'o// drang srong u ta ka dang a ran da la chos 'dri rtog bya ba ni rang gi nga rgyal gyi sems 'joms par bstan
59a7(mdo sde): pa'o// le drug gi bar du bka' thub spyad pa ni mu stegs 'dul ba'o// zhal zas blangs pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi rjesu 'brang ba'o// rtsa swa sti ka blangs pa ni cho ga shes par bstan pa'o// 
59a8(mdo sde): rtswa bting ba'i steng du bzhugs pa ni nyam rangs dang g.yel ba rnams 'joms par bstan pa'o// lha klu kun gyis bstod cing bsngags pa dang bsnyen bkur bya ba ni yon tan gyi 'bras
59b1(mdo sde): bul bkod par bstan pa'o// bdud rnams btul ba ni dpa' ba'i mthu bstan pa'o// phyag g.yas pa sa la bstan pa ni bsod nams kyi mthu bstan pa'o// sa chen po kun tu g.yo
59b2(mdo sde): ba ni drin gyi lan ldon par bstan pa'o// de ltar mtshan ma med par sgoms pa'i phyir// bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob pa yino// 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid man
59b3(mdo sde): tu mkhyen nas/ chos kun mnyam pa nyid du bstan pas ni sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la thug med/ chos bstan to cog la sangs rgyasu 'grub pa'i don bstan
59b4(mdo sde): bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// dus gsum gyi bya ba dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos mngon tu gsal bar gzigs shing mkhyen pas na/ tha~Md mkhyen pa zhes bya'o// bden pa dang
59b5(mdo sde): yang dag par gsungs pa'i phyir/ lha dang mi'i mkhan po zhes bya'o// gang zhig de ltar slob cing rtogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// de la leg par rtog pa ni
59b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bslu ba can zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas thams cad ni mi 'byung mi 'jug mi skye mi 'gog ste/ sems can thang
59b7(mdo sde): mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir 'jig rten du 'byung zhes brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'dra'o// zhes brjod pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' rnam
59b8(mdo sde): mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang yang dag par na/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ stong pa nyid du rtogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
60a1(mdo sde): / 'byung ba 'am/ nub pa yang mi mnga' bas/ rgyal po'i pho brang du yang ma bldam/ byang chub kyi shing drung du yang mya ngan las ma 'das/ mtha' las 'das te/ 
60a2(mdo sde): yun tu gnas pa sems can yongasu bsgral bar mdzad pa'i sladadu/ bka' thub spyad cing mya ngan las 'da' bar bstan kyang / yang dag par na 'gyur ba 'am/ spros pa mi
60a3(mdo sde): mngab de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul tu gnas te/ khams gsum na sku 'byung ba yang chos kyi sku rnam pa lnga 'byung // lnga po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sku yang dag pa'i
60a4(mdo sde): bo nyid dang / sku yon tan can dang sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid la sa skyes pa dang / sku sprul cing 'byung ba dang / sku nam mkha' lta bu lnga dang ste/ de la sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid
60a5(mdo sde): ces bgyi ba ni/ yang dag pa'i 'bras bu'i mchog/ ma tshan ma thams cad las 'das pa/ rang gi dbyings la yun tu gnas pa na/ sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bgyi'o// 
60a6(mdo sde): sku yon tan zhes bgyi ba ni sems can mya ngan las bzla ba'i sladu/ spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad cing / dge ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par mdzad pas na/ sku yon
60a7(mdo sde): tan can zhes bgyi'o// sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes shes bgyi ba ni/ chos kyi mtshan nyid thams cad thugasu chu de/ mi mkhyen pa mi mnga'/ spyod yul de la yang dag pa
60a8(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i stong pa nyid las skyes te/ yang dag par rdzogs pas na/ sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes shes bgyi'o// sku sprul cing 'thung ba zhes bgyi ba ni/ de bzhin ga
60b1(mdo sde): pa 'jig rten du 'byung yang / lam rgyud lngar dge sdig kun la mngon par bstan cing / skyabasu mdzad pa ma mchis te/ sprul pa'i rdzas las mtshan du 'gyur bas na/ 
60b2(mdo sde): sprul cing dbyung ba zhes bgyi'o// sku na mkha' lta bu zhes bgyi ba ni namakha' mtha' yas pas na/ chos kyi sku yang mtha' yi so// nam mkha' dpag pa dang gzhil du ma ma
60b3(mdo sde): bas na/ chos kyi sku yang dpag cing gzhal du ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang na mkha' chen po dang 'dra ba/ sems can yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad
60b4(mdo sde): du/ sku rnam pa lngar ston pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skye ba mi mnga'/ 'gag pa mi mnga' bar mngon no// chos thams cad kyang de bzhin te/ sems can yongs mya ngan
60b5(mdo sde): las bzla ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas mngon tu sprul cing / chos rnam par spel ba lag so zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sem
60b6(mdo sde): dpa' rnamakha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi 'u khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar chos kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas pas/ spyod yul thams cad
60b7(mdo sde): la rab tu chod pa 'am/ thogs pa med rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bskal pa stong rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten longs spyod can zhes bya ba der/ byang
60b8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag theg pa chen po 'ba' shog spyod de// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i ming rna ba'i thog mar yang mi grag na/ ngan song
61a1(mdo sde): / lta zhig ci smos// khyod bskal pa de dang 'jig rten der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba
61a2(mdo sde): 'byung ste/ 'jig rten gzhan nas skyes bu chen po dag kyang der phyin cing / theg pa chen po thar pa phyogasu rgyas pa'i mdo sde mnyan pa dang / blangs pa dang bcangs par 'gyur ro// de bas na sa
61a3(mdo sde): gang la khas/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po'i ming thos te/ phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa byas na/ 'jig rten longs spyod can gyi khams der yang skye bar 'gyur ro// sems can
61a4(mdo sde): gang la las theg pa chen po'i chos sgrub na yang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur// gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blang zhing bcangs pa des ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba bcu ma 'das
61a5(mdo sde): par lung bstan pa yang thob par 'gyuraro// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dadang kyis/ bdag dang sems can thang
61a6(mdo sde): kyi don phyir zhus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
61a7(mdo sde): dge 'dun rnams kyi mtshan bstan nas yang seng+ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs te/ seng+ge'i sgra zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i tshi ge bstan pa'o// nges pa'i tshig bstan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rtag par
61a8(mdo sde): 'tsho skyong zhing gzhes te/ mya ngan las mi 'da' bar rig pa'o// yang sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yodo zhes bstan pa dang / lha'i bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa
61b1(mdo sde): spa gong ste/ skyabs kyi dbang du gyur pas na seng+ge'i sgra zhes bya'o// de ltar bstan nas ljags kyi mtshan rgya chen pos stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i khams kun khebs par g.yogs nas/ 
61b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam pa drug du g.yoso// rnam pa drug du g.yos shes bya ba ni shar phyogs mthon nub phyogs dpa' nub phyogs mthon shar phyogs dma' lnga po
61b3(mdo sde): mthon byang phyogs dasa'/ byang phyogs mthon lho phyogs dpa'/ dbus mthon mthar ngas la/ mtha' mthon dbus dpa' ba nis rnam pa drug tu g.yos shes bya'o// ljags kyi drang
61b4(mdo sde): 'od zer chen po btang ste/ phyogs bcur snang ba chen po byaso// snang ba chen po des mi rtag pa ni rtag par byas/ ma dag pa ni dag par byas sdug bsngal can ni bde bar byas/ 
61b5(mdo sde): mi rig pa ni rig par byas/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis reg cing snang ngo cog la ri dang nags tshal dang yul sa dang chu bo'i klung dang / rgya mtsho dang lcags kyi ri Sho
61b6(mdo sde): yug dang / dmyal ba la sogs pa thams cad kyang mtho dman med par mnyam par gyur cing / nyal nyil dang ldan ljin med de kun kyang yongasu dag par gyur nas 'di lta ste/ dper na
61b7(mdo sde): shar phyogs na 'jig rten zla gang rnam dag yongasu brgyan dang 'dra'o// de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku sprul pa ni/ namakha' nas bab pa ni me tog gi char bab
61b8(mdo sde): pa dang 'dra'o// 'og nas byung ba ni sprin dang na bun byung ba dang 'dra bar na mkha' yongasu gang ste/ na mkha' stong pa cung zad kyang med do// sprul pa'i zhal so so nas tshig 'thun par de
62a1(mdo sde): // bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag par 'am zhing gzhes te/ mya ngan las mi 'anga'o// sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyang ba 'ang yang zhes gsungs// 
62a2(mdo sde): thams cad ni stong pa nyid do zhes gsung so// spyod lam de dag gi rgyu 'bras ni theg pa gcig tu zad pa las sems can gyis theg pa rnam pa gsum du mthong zhes bshad nas/ 
62a3(mdo sde): de ma thag tu kun mi snang bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan la bzhugs pa nyi tse snang ste/ de'i tshe tshogs mang po thams cad sku sprul pa de dag mthong ba ni bcom ldan 'das
62a4(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu ste/ shAkya thub pa yang byam sa pas/ 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang gzi brjid mngon par sprul pa de'i tshe/ tshogs kyi nang nas byang chub sems
62a5(mdo sde): dpa' gang ga'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// nyan thos brgyad khri zhig ni the ga pa chen po'i sems bskye // dge slong stong phrag
62a6(mdo sde): bcu zhig gis ni/ dgra bcom pa'i lam thob bo// dge slong ma khri brgyad stong zhig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i lam zab bo// dge bsnyen khri phrag bzhi bcus ni lan cig phyir 'ong
62a7(mdo sde): ba'i lam thob bo// dge bsnyen ma 'bum phrag bcus ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i lam thob bo// lha dang mi grangs med pa zhig gis ni chos kyi mig rdul med pa/ dri ma dang bral ba rnam pa
62a8(mdo sde): dag pa thob ste/ rang gi tshe lnga phyi shes pa dang 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad mi rtag par mthong // de nas tshogs kyi nang nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sing+ge'i snga
62b1(mdo sde): stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
62b2(mdo sde): to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gong du bstan pa bzhin na ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos na yang sdig 'byang / chos kyi mtshan thos na yang sdig 'byung / dge 'dun gyi mtshan thos na
62b3(mdo sde): sdig 'byung bar 'gyu ro zhes 'byung na/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags sam/ chos kyi mthu lags sam/ dge 'dun gyi mthu lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags na nis
62b4(mdo sde): rgyas la gsol pa bgyi/ chos kyi mthu lags na ni chos la gso la ba bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi lags na ni dge 'dun la gsol ba bgyi ba lags na/ gsum car lags
62b5(mdo sde): babagyi ci 'tshal/ gong du gsungs pa theg pa gcig la so so'i skye bos rnam pa gsum du mthong ngo zhes 'byung na/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis kyang gsum du bshad
62b6(mdo sde): na sems can lta zhig ci smos/ zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// legs la
62b7(mdo sde): so// rigs kyi bu sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ don de lta bu 'dri ba yang shin tu legs te/ nyon cig ngas khyod la bye brag phyed par bshad// sangs rgyas kyi mthu' ba sa
62b8(mdo sde): kyang ma yin/ chos kyi mthu 'ba' shig kyang ma yin/ dge 'dun gyi mthu 'ba' shig kyang ma yin te/ kun tshogs pa'i mthu bas sangs rgyas ni sems can gyi mgon skyabs kyi pha
63a1(mdo sde): // byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin// sems can bslang ba can sems stor pa slar rnyeng 'khor ba la skyo nas/ dran pa'i mthu mang pos khams
63a2(mdo sde): na nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar 'dod na/ phyogasu rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'dis bsgral ba'i gru chen po bye'o// de bas na rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyang cheso// chos kyang dge 'a
63a3(mdo sde): mo/ dge 'dun ni 'dus ma byas pa ni stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas kyi stong pa nyid dang / nang gi stong pa nyid dang / phyi'i stong pa nyid dang / chen po'i stong pa nyid dang / chu ngu'i stong pa'i
63a4(mdo sde): 'dra ste/ de las gzhan medo// rigs kyi bu khyod zer ba lta sa rnam pa gcig tu bsgrub pa'i rigs kyi bus rnam pa gsum du bsgrub ci dgos zhes bya ba ni/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste
63a5(mdo sde): dper na mi gcig cig na mkha' stong pas skrag ste/ gar phyin dgur gab kying na mkha' dang yong ma bra'o// rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pas
63a6(mdo sde): bshad pa dang / ngas bsha do cag dge ba thams cad kyi rgyu dang rkyen dang / dkon mchog gsum dang / theg pa gsum yang gcig las mi 'da'o// byang chub sems dpa' se
63a7(mdo sde): sgras gsol pa/ legaso leg so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pas bstan pa ltar ni bdag snga nas 'tshal te/ sems can rnams kyi slad don de zhu ba lag so// bcom ldan 'ang
63a8(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du mi gnyis mi gsum// thar pa chen po phyogasu rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni yum/ byang chub sems dpa'
63b1(mdo sde): kyi gul chen po// rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mig ste/ lnga ba log pa rnams sdud pa dang / sems bstor ba rnams skyong ba dang / ngan song gsum gyi sgo gcod pa dang / bla na med pa'i
63b2(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sgo 'byed pa dang / nyan thos rnams bzlog ste/ theg pa chen por 'dzud pa'i slad/ bdag gis gzungs chen po'i sngags kyis bsrung zhing bsgrub par bgyi'o// sdom
63b3(mdo sde): pa ma 'ams pa dang / mdo sde 'di la sgom zhing bslab par bgyid pa de la yang srung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o// gal te gang zag la las mdo sde 'di la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing
63b4(mdo sde): dpung bdun gyi bar du spyad pa spyod pa la/ bdud sdigasan gyis 'khrug cing 'tsho ba'i glags lta ba mchis na/ bdud sdig can gyis glags kyi skabs mi rnyed par brgya
63b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag mdo sde 'di la rim gro bgyis te/ yun ring por gnas par bgyi ba yang / byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du gnas par bgyi'o// 
63b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod mdo sde 'di la rim gro bya ba ni/ dkon mchog gsum la rim gro bya ba dang 'dra'o// ston pa la yang rim gro bya ba dang
63b7(mdo sde): 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge sgras/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gzungs 'di skad ces so// na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+har mA ya na maHsad g+hA ya/ a dan d+hi d+ha ra ni
63b8(mdo sde): tad+ya thA ha A kA sha ni ba bI/ sarba d+har ma ni ba bI/ a sha ma d+ha/ pi pa sha~M na/ bi ma la su pa ri dar ma ni kha na/ ba ru ni tsa yai ta ma le tsa le/ hu lu hu lu/ shi bi di man tra man tra/ 
64a1(mdo sde): / sngags 'di dus gcig la lan rtsa brgyad bzlas shing / mchod rten la lan bdun bskor ba bgyi/ de ltar gdugs bdun gyi bar du mdo sde gzhan la mi bsam par/ 
64a2(mdo sde): gdugs gcig kyang dus gsum du phyogasu rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di la sems rtse gcig tu bgyis te/ sems gzhan du mi g.yeng bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzung sngags 'di
64a3(mdo sde): ni sangs rgyas khri phrag brgyad brgyas gsungs pa ste/ deng 'dir bdag gis kyang brjod pa lag so// gal te 'ga' zhig gzungs 'di la sred pa mchis na/ sangs rgyas de dag la spong
64a4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di la spong ba ni tshe rabs du ma'i bar du byang chub tu bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ srid pa gsum las kyang pi 'anga'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sngags 'di
64a5(mdo sde): ni sems dran pa nyams pa rnams sems slar rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / gzungs 'di lan cig tsam rna bar thos sam/ thos nas yi ger bris te/ sha dang chang mi 'tshal ba
64a6(mdo sde): sdom pa la gnas shing / bdag nyid rtse 'jo la sogs pa spangs te/ 'du 'dzi'i rang du mi 'jug la/ rgyun tu byams pa chen po spyad cing bsapa gtan la gces par 'dzin na/ gang
64a7(mdo sde): zag de dpag tu ma mchis pa'i sgrib pa gsum gyi sdig lci ba rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu sems theg pa nas/ blang ba dang bcang ba dang 'id re zhing klog
64a8(mdo sde): pa dang / kha ton du bgyid pa dang / yi ma du mi bskyud par bgyid na/ gang zag de mngon par byang ma chub kyi bar du ngan song gsum du ltung bar mi 'gyu ro zhes gsel ba dang / bcom
64b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i sgra la bka' stsal pa/ leg so leg so// rigs kyi bu khyod dkon mchog gsum gyi rim gro bya ba dang / byams pa'i sems kyis
64b2(mdo sde): sems can rnams srid pa gsum las gdon pa dang / bslab pa mang po grangs med pa la phan pa dang / bde ba chen po bya ba'i phyir/ ston pa'i sgro 'byed cing log par lta ba nas
64b3(mdo sde): bzlog ste/ yang dag pa'i lnga ba la 'dzud pa'i phyir/ gzungs sngags 'di bshad pa ni shin tu'ang legs// rigs kyi'u sems can gang dag khyed kyi ming dang / sngags kyi spyan+da
64b4(mdo sde): nas/ dad pa dang gus pa bskyed mi spang na/ gang zag de tshe 'di nyid la'ang bde la 'chi 'phos na yang rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong zhing / nga yang mthong la khyod la
64b5(mdo sde): sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang ma zong bar 'gyur ro// mngon par 'tshang rgya bar yang nges par rang gis rig ste/ the tsom medo// kun nas nyon
64b6(mdo sde): mongs spangs pa dang // dge ba kun gyis las bsgrubs te/ sangs rgyas rang bzhin mthong ba yang // rnam dag dad pa'i dbang giso// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad
64b7(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to// mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las nyin gcig gas/ dus gcig gam/ mtshan gcig gas/ ska
64b8(mdo sde): cig ma gcig la/ phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po rnams la phyag 'tsha
65a1(mdo sde): zhing theg pa chen po tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa la bsams na/ gang zag de ni skad cig ma se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis mi ga
65a2(mdo sde): ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las thams cad yongs ma lus par 'byung bar 'gyur// gal te dge slong ngas dge slong
65a3(mdo sde): ma 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ dge sbyong mas sems kyi rang bzhin stor nas/ sdom pa brgyad nyams pa dang / mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga byas pa dang / mnya
65a4(mdo sde): pa nyid la skur pa rnams/ phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la dad pa bskyed de phyag 'tshal na/ 'di lta bu'i las ngan pa kun ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur// 
65a5(mdo sde): de skad bka su kha sa thag tu sngon sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur gyi dus na/ rgyal bu dge mthong zhes bya ba ra'i tshe mi su ma sdong dang lhan cig tu skad cig ma der lpags nas/ 
65a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/ tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag bskal pa grangs pa mchis pa nas/ 
65a7(mdo sde): kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las bgyis pa lta zhig bshad kyis mi rdzogs te/ mi dge ba bcu dang mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la bkur ba'i sdig grangs ma mchis par bgyis
65a8(mdo sde): pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis la brten nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams kyi spyan sngar 'thol te/ 'gyod tshangasu gsol zhing mchis na/ skabs dbye bar
65b1(mdo sde): gnang zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs leg so// rigs kyi bu 'jigs pa'i sems bskyed pa'ang dkar la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'ang dka' ste/ 
65b2(mdo sde): dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga 'thol zhing 'chags par 'dod pa ni/ log spyod la sogs pa yang sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid mthong du nye bas/ yid la dran pa bzhin du 'grol zhing
65b3(mdo sde): bshags shig/ de las rgyal bu dge mthong la sogs pa mi sum stong gis/ bcom ldan 'das skabs dbye bar gnang ba byams pa'i gsung thos nas/ gos chags bcos te thal mo sbyar cing
65b4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal nas/ bla gos phrag pa g.yasu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag phyogs
65b5(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas la srub su mchi'o// phyogs bcu'i chos la srub su mchi'o// phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun la stsab su mchi'o// yang 'di lta ste/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
65b6(mdo sde): 'khrug mi mang ngal phyag 'tshal zhing sgrubasu gsal// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'thung gnas la phyag 'tshal zhing srub su gsol lo// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'od dpag med
65b7(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal zhing sgrubasu gsol lo// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas don yang grub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing skyab su gsol lo// bla ma phyogs kyi sangs rgyas dri brtsegs la phyag 'tshal zhing
66a1(mdo sde): su gsol lo// lho phyogs na skyes bu chen po 'jig rten 'dzin la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsol lo// nub phyogs na kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal
66a2(mdo sde): zhing skyabasu gsolo// byang phyogs na zla gang la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsol lo// bla ma phyogs na na mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsol lo// 'og ma phyogs na skyes bu
66a3(mdo sde): chen po brtan dpal la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsol lo// yang bdag cag gi mkhan po de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyur ba la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsol lo// ma byin pa
66a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsol lo// phyogs gzhan na sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsolo// da ltar bdag cag gi
66a5(mdo sde): mkhan po bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la yang phyag 'a tshal zhing skyabasu gsol lo// skyes bu chen po dri ma med par grags pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nu la yang
66a6(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsolo// 'phags pa dga' bo dang / 'od srung la yang skyabasu gsolo// 'phags pa'i 'bras bu rnam bzhi mngon par byung ba rnams la yang skyabasu gsol
66a7(mdo sde): lo// byang chub kyi sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la yang skyabasu gsol// sde snod chen po gsung rab mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / mnyam pa nyid yang dag pa'i mdo sde gzhan bzhugs so
66a8(mdo sde): 'tshal la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsol lo// cha brgyad du bgos pa'i sku gdung ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsal lo// da ltar na sku
66b1(mdo sde): gzugs bzhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal zhing sgrubasu gsol lo// phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / sum cu gsum gyi lha'i dbang phyug
66b2(mdo sde): dang / bar snang na gnas pa'i lha dang / sa'i lha dang / ri dang nags 'tshal dang / shing drung gi lnga dang / drang srong dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi gang ba dang / ldan pa rnams dang / lha'i spyan sa
66b3(mdo sde): ba rnams dang / lha'i snyan mnga' ba thams cad kyi snyan gyis gsan cing mkhyen par mdzod cig/ kun dbang du gsol te sems can thams cad la ma mthol ma bshags pa zhig mchis
66b4(mdo sde): na yang / sdig pa thams cad byang bar gyur cig/ yang 'di skad ces spras te/ bdag cag thogs ma mchis pa nas/ da ltar gyi lus ngan pa 'di thob kyi bar du nor cing 'khrul pa'i
66b5(mdo sde): sems kyis phyin ci log tu lta ba dpag tu ma mchis/ nyon mongs pa dang / mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa brjod kyis mi lang ste/ sdig pa'i tshogs bgyis so 'tshal/ ra
66b6(mdo sde): gis mchor ma rig pas ngan sems rab tu rgyas te/ tshe phyi ma ma mthong zhing tshe 'di 'ba' shig mthong bas/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags la mes te dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ring du gyur cing
66b7(mdo sde): las ngan pas bar du tshad nas/ sdig pa'i grogs po brten cing / dge slong dang / dge slong ma la mi rigs mi tshul ba'i las bgyis pa dang / pha dang ma la mi rigs mi tshul
66b8(mdo sde): ba'i las bgyis pa dang / yang bdag 'am rangs kyi dbang gis/ dge 'dun gyi dkor nor thugs thub du spyad pa dang / dge 'dun sde lnga la mi rigs mi tshul bar bgyis pa dang / 'jam
67a1(mdo sde): rten pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu dpag tu ma mchis par bshag pa 'am/ byang chub kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i sems can bkum pa 'am/ chos kyi
67a2(mdo sde): slob dpon la skur te/ chos la chos ma lags zhes brjod/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mi rtag ces bgyis/ dam pa'i chos la yang mi rtag go zhes bgyis/ dge 'dun dkon mchog/ 
67a3(mdo sde): kyang mi rta go zhes bgyis/ sbyin pa dang shes rab la ni ma mos/ log pa'i chos la dad cing 'dzin pa de dag gi slad du/ deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/ khrel zhing
67a4(mdo sde): ba yang dpag tu ma mchis te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu gsol// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa dang / thugs rje mnga' ste/ phyogs stobs pa'i yab yum la/ 
67a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag gis sdig pa bskal pa grang sa ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bgyis pa 'thol zhing
67a6(mdo sde): bshags par 'tshal na/ gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol zhing slan cad kyang mi bgyid par smon to// yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis
67a7(mdo sde): pa tshun cad/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa dang / sangs rgyas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i bslab pa zhig par bgyis pa dang / leg skyed kyi spyod pa spyad pa dang / ngag rtsub
67a8(mdo sde): mo gtong ba dang / dam pa'i chos la skur pa 'debs pa'i las ngan pa de dag 'gyod cing 'grol ma myong ste/ sems la gnod pa 'am/ ngo tshab pa mchis par mi doge pa bcu dang / ma
67b1(mdo sde): ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las lci ba nges par bgyis par rang gis 'tshal kyang / nongs pa bcabs nas/ 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / gnong zhing ngo tsha ba'i
67b2(mdo sde): sems thog ma nas ma mchis par/ dad pa can gyi mchod pa blangs nas/ 'grol zhing bshags ma myong ste/ dam pa'i chos yun du btsugs te/ rim gro bgyi ba'i sems ma mchis pa
67b3(mdo sde): rtag tu smod cing / brnyas pa dang / ngag gi sgo nas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nongs pa mang po bgyis pa dang / ched na dkon pa cheg gsum yang mdo zhes brjod pa dang / mi dge ba bcud pa
67b4(mdo sde): mtshams ma mchis pa'i sdig de dag bgyis pa'i spang/ dang 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis// gnong zhing khrel ba dpag tu ma mchis te dkon mchog sum la skyabasu gsol// 
67b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa dang / thugs rje mnga' ste/ phyogs snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na
67b6(mdo sde): bdag cag gi sdig pa bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bgyis pa/ mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis 'thol zhing bshags par 'tshal na/ gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol
67b7(mdo sde): slan cad kyang mi bgyid par smon to// yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa tshun cad phyin ci log tu lta ste/ rtsa ba bzhi ni sbom por bshad/ 
67b8(mdo sde): sbom po ni rtsa ba bzhir bshad/ zhig pa rnams ni ma zhig par bshad/ ma zhig pa rnams ni zhig par bshad/ lci ba rnams ni yang bar bshad/ yang ba rnams ni lci bar bshad/ 
68a1(mdo sde): // dag pa rnams ni ma dag par bshad/ sa dag pa rnams ri dag par bshad pa dang / yang log par lnga bas 'jig rten pa'i gtsug lag la bstod cing bsngags nas/ 
68a2(mdo sde): chos dang mdo sde la ni la gus te/ smre sngags kyi gtam rtag tu gleng zhing brjod pa dang / ma brtags pa'i rnam pa brgyad po 'chang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa ni bdu
68a3(mdo sde): kyi tshig go zhes bgyis pa dang / bdud kyi tshig yang dag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bgyis pa dang / mu stegs ma ban gyi tshig la yid ches par 'dzin pa dang / de bzhin
68a4(mdo sde): pa mthar mya ngan las 'das te med pas/ dkon mchog ga sum yang mi rngago zhes bgyis nas lus dang sems la khrul cing / byin ci log tu lta ba dpag tu ma mchis pa'i sgra
68a5(mdo sde): du deng 'jigs shing skrag pa yang dpag tu ma mchis/ ga nong zhing ngo tsha ba yang dpag tu ma mchis te/  gnas tshig gsum la skyabasu gsol lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
68a6(mdo sde): 'das ni byams pa dang thugs rje mnga' ste/ phyogasu snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gzhan lags na/ bdag cag gi sdig pa bska
68a7(mdo sde): pa grangs ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bgyis pa de dag mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis 'thol zhing bshags par 'tshal na/ gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ slan bcad kyang mi bgyid
68a8(mdo sde): bar smon to// yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas/ tshe lus 'di la thug gi bar du/ dge 'dun gyi spyi'i nor ram/ phyogs bcu'i dge 'a
68b1(mdo sde): gyi nor ram/ nga lngar bzhugs pa'i dge 'dun gyi nor ram/ dge 'dun sde lnga'i nor ram/ dge slong gang zag gi nor ram/ yon bdag thams cad kyi nor rdzas la brkus pa 'am/ rang 'am du
68b2(mdo sde): spyad pa dang / yang rang smras te/ bdag gis das pa'i chos bsam gtan bzhi 'am/ 'bras bu bzhi ma thob pa tho bo zhes smras pa la sogs pa/ skyen de lta bu'i las ngan pa mi dge ba'i rgyu
68b3(mdo sde): rkyen tu gyur te/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na yang / pham pa bzhi dang / sdom pa brgyad dang / drug dang / dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum dang / ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang
68b4(mdo sde): spang ba'i ltung ba sum cu dang / ltung ba dgu bcu dang / so sor bshags pa bani dang / bslab pa mang po dang / bdun shin tu zhi ba'i chos rnams te/ tshul khrims de dag re re la nyes
68b5(mdo sde): byas nas phas pa la drug gi bang durnams pa dang / rnams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa dang / dang sa dang / mang sde zab mal sdang ba dang / log sung
68b6(mdo sde): pa smad nas/ nongs pa bcabs te/ 'gyod cing 'thol ma myong bas nyin mtshan du 'phel zhing skye ba/ sngon rgyal ba dag gis bshad pa las thos pa ni/ dam pa'i chos lnga skur pa'am/ 
68b7(mdo sde): mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa 'am/ rtsa ba bzhi pham par gyur pa rnams ma gshegs ma 'thol na/ sems can dmyal bar nges par ltung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub
68b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang skyabs mdzad par mi 'gyur/ dge 'dun dang pam dang / lnga rnams dang / mi rnams kyis kyang skyabs dang 'ong ba brgya
69a1(mdo sde): / mi nus so zhes 'byung bas na/ de'i slad du deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/ gnong zhing ngo tsha ba dpag tu ma mchis te/ de'i slad du deng dkon mchog gsu
69a2(mdo sde): dang / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas steng dang / da ltar bzhug pa'i sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku shAkya thub pa la skyabs gsol lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
69a3(mdo sde): 'das ni byams pa dang thugs rje'i mnga' bdag ste/ phyogasu snyems pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag bsngal
69a4(mdo sde): pa dpag tu ma mchis pa'i tshun cad kyi 'on mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / pham pa bzhi dang / mtshams ma mchis pa dang / mi dag
69a5(mdo sde): bcu la sogs pa'i sdig lci ba rnams 'brel zhing bshags par 'tshal na/ gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das deng bdag cag sa
69a6(mdo sde): sems can rnams dang / bdag cag gi rang rang gi slad du/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i spyan sngar 'thol zhing bshags par 'tshalo// sems can thams cad kyis bskal pa dpag
69a7(mdo sde): tu ma mchis pa tshun cad / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / pha ma'i drin glo bar ma chung ba dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos ma 'tshal te/ mi dge ba sna tshogs bgyis pa dang / 
69a8(mdo sde): gi rigs bsnyems te/ dregs shing rgyags pa'i tshe/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las nyam bag du bgyis kyang / nongs par ma mthong bas/ skye bo blun po'i las bgyis pa dang / 
69b1(mdo sde): sdig pa'i bshes gnyen la bsten cing / nyon mongs pas sems 'khrugs pa dang / 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan la chog ma 'tshal te/ mi dge ba'i las rnams bgyis pa dang / 'gro
69b2(mdo sde): ba bzang pos bslus te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug gi nyon mongs pas gzir cing / sems 'khrugs te/ spros pa dang / lus dang ngag dang / yid gsum gyi sgra
69b3(mdo sde): bsags pa'i las mi dge ba bdag gis bgyis pa dang / gzhan bgyid du bstsal ba dang / bgyid pa la rjesu yi rang ba de dag thams cad deng so sor 'chag so// 'thol lo mi 'tsha
69b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang chos dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la bse na bkur ba bgyis pa'i sdig pa yang deng so sor 'chag so// 'tholo// mi 'chab bo// byang chub sems dpa' dang / @
69b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la yang bsnyen bkur ba bgyis pa'i sdig pa yang dang so sor 'chags// 'thol lo// mi 'chab bo// ma rig pa'i dbang gis dam pa'i chos la skur pa ba
69b6(mdo sde): pa dang / pha ma dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyi drin glo bar ma chud pa'i slad du/ bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa de dag kyang deng so sor gshag so// 'tholo// mi 'chab bo// 
69b7(mdo sde): blun zhing rmongs pas bsgribs te/ nyams rangs dang rgyags pas/ mi dge ba sna tshogs bgyis pa'i sdig pa de dag kyang deng so sor 'chag sa// 'thol// mi 'chab bo// sman chad
69b8(mdo sde): kyang mi bgyid do// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la bdag cag gis yin phul zhing mchod pas ni/ ma lus pa'i sems can de dag kun sa bcu la 'khod// de bzhin ga
70a1(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal bu dge mthong la
70a2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// leg so// skyes bu chen po rang gi las legs nyes kyi rtog pa la mkhas te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las la 'jigs pa dang srang pa skyes nas/ nyes
70a3(mdo sde): pa rnams mngon par 'thol ba'i steng du/ sems can gyi sdig pa mang po yang / khyod kyis 'thol zhing bshags pa'i phyir/ khyod ni skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa zhes bgyi'o// rang
70a4(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa yang spong ba'i steng du/ sems can gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa yang ring du dbral bar byas pas/ de'i phyir khyod ni skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa zhes bya ba yin te
70a5(mdo sde): rang gi nges tu smon pa yin gyi/ theg mar sems can tham sa cad kyi don tu/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba smon lam
70a6(mdo sde): btab pa'i phyir/ khyod ni skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa zhes bya'o// de nas rgyal bu dge mthong la sogs pa mi sum stong gis 'gyod tshangs bgyis pa'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das la tshig su
70a7(mdo sde): bcang de 'di skad ces bstod // bcom ldan nyag gcig gtso bo'i mchog/ khams gsum pa ma thams cad mkhyen// thams cad mi mnyam mnyam pa nyid// bcom ldan dkon la
70a8(mdo sde): phyag 'tsha lo// skye bo sbyin gtang rang gi phyir// nor rdzas byin cing lan yang re// byams chen rgyal ba de yin te// dgra gnyen byams sdang phan snyoms mdzad// rkang gnyis nang na rgyal ba
70b1(mdo sde): btsun/ shes rab spyan gyis mkhyen gzigs la// brtson 'grus me bdag skyab su mchi/ lha rnams shes rab ngem 'tshal// 'das dang ma byon da ltar bzhugs// rgyal bdun la
70b2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal// de bzhin rgyal la skyabs gsol ba 'ang // dus gsum rgyal ba mchod pa bzhin// de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis// rgyal bu dge mthong dang / mi sum
70b3(mdo sde): latshogasu bcad de bstod pa/ gang zhig sangs rgyas 'grub 'dod pa// mang du thos la 'brang bar byos// slob dpon dge la bkur byas na// sangs rgyas grub pa yun mi ring // gang
70b4(mdo sde): zhig tshul khrims rnam ngag spyod// de ni dge slong yang dag yin// gang zhig stong par sbom nus pa// de ni ting 'dzin thob ces bya// gang zhig brtson 'grus spyod nus pa// de ni bya
70b5(mdo sde): chub spyod pa'o// gang zhig mya ngan 'dara' 'gyur ba// de ni dga' ba yang dag pa'o// tshul khrims 'dzin pa'ing ge slong dang // rnam dag khrims 'dzin dge slong ma// zla ba
70b6(mdo sde): phyed cing gso spyong byos// chos gos rnam sbyar lus gyon te// lhung bzed gseg shang thogs nasu// rnam dag bsod snyoms 'gro byas na// lha rnams kun kyang dgar 'gyur bas/ 
70b7(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar cing gis phyag 'tshal// ngas kyang lnga dang mi rnams kun// de yi bya ba byed du bzhug/ dper na lha bran thams cad kyis// lha yi dbang po brgya byin la// rim gro gus hA
70b8(mdo sde): byed pa bzhin// da ltar 'phral du'ang lan thob ste// phyi ma'i dusa'ang dpag tu med// rab tu byung zhing khrims 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas drin lan lon zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mthong 'ang
71a1(mdo sde): / lnga steng ngadang sems pa ma gdogs par// 'jig rten pa'i mi kun gyis// rnam ngag dang pa'i sems bskyang // phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag can// b+hu
71a2(mdo sde): mi 'da' rtag tu bzhugs// chos dang dge 'dun de bzhin te// de ltar mngon par shes pa ni// sangs rgyas drin lan lon zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste// 'jig rten pa'i mingag
71a3(mdo sde): kun// rnam par 'byed pa'i sems med cing // theg pa gcig lam mngon par shes// 'angs pa dang ni ma 'ongs dang // phyogs bcu dang ni nga lnga'i rnams// sangs rgyas theg pa gcig
71a4(mdo sde): bu lang gnyis sam gsum zhes bya med par// de ltar yid la bskyed nasu// sems kyis rnam par mi rtog na// de lta bu'i mi rnams ni// rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya// rgyal bu
71a5(mdo sde): mthong 'di lnga ste// gang zag la la 'ga' zhig gis/ sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das phyir// ngag tu rang pa'i sem sa bskyed de// sems can kun la sangs rgyas kyi// bdag
71a6(mdo sde): yang bar bshad pa ni// de lta bu'i gang zag rnams// rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya// gang zhig skad cig dge sbyong cing // lnga yi 'bras bu mi re ste// cig car bla med lam bsgrubs na
71a7(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste// sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das phyin// gal te gang zag 'ga' zhig gis// yud tsam mdo sde 'di blags te// dkon mchog
71a8(mdo sde): gsum la gus byas shing // mkhan la sri zhu mtshang byas na// de lta bu'i gang zag rnams// rgyal ba'i drin lan len zhes bya// gang zhig nor rdzas sna 'ga' 'am/ kha zas dang nigs kyi
71b1(mdo sde): rnams/ kun la khyab par sbyin byas na// rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste// nga yi chos rnams 'jig pa na// gang zhig 'ga' la blo bstan nas// yud tsam
71b2(mdo sde): mdo sde 'di mnyan na// byang chub sems dpa' 'bum brgya la// mchod pa phul bas de lngago// theg chen mdo sde 'di dag kyang // sangs rgyas byang chub kun gyi yum// sangs rgyas byang
71b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dang // mdo sde 'di la dran byas te// snyoms sems phan tshun gnyis med na// rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste// gang zhig chos 'di
71b4(mdo sde): 'jig pa'i tshe// rgyal ba'i don lan blan 'dod pas/ skad cig yung tsam sgos byed pas// stong khams gang ba'i sems can gyi// srog gi sbyin pa byin pa bas// bsam gtan
71b5(mdo sde): bsgom pa yon tan che// gang zhig bsgom la skur pa // dge 'dun 'khrugs par byed pa ni// stong khams gsum po gang ba yi// mi rnams kyi ni srog bcad dang // srog
71b6(mdo sde): chags thams cad bsad dang 'dra// bsgom dang dge 'dun dkrugs skur na// de yi sdig kyang de bzhin// gang zhig dge sbyong mthong ba la// skur pa 'debs shing ma dad pa// dkon mchog gsum
71b7(mdo sde): gyi rigs gcod dang // des ni rgyal ba'i lan mi ldon// de nas rgyal bu dge mthing dang // mi sum stong po// bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan par gnang ba// dga' bas tshis
71b8(mdo sde): bstan pa nyid spyi bos blangs te/ tshig su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la/ gang mang lags shing gang mi mang // mang dang mi mang gnyis ka lnga
72a1(mdo sde): dngos por dmigasu yong ma mchis// yang dag mtshan nyid de lta bu// chos rnams kun dang ma 'galo// sems can kun la byams slang// thabs kyis
72a2(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// 'phags pa gang nas byon pa nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de nas byon// yang dag mtshan nyid ji lta ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de bzhino// ba
72a3(mdo sde): ba kun gyi bden tshig ltar// de bzhin gshegs pa 'ang de bzhin bshad// de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan// de bzhin gshegs zhes bgyi ba lags// bzod pa'i go cha brtan pa'i sas
72a4(mdo sde): sra ba'i gzhu stobs brtson 'grus che// rno ba'i mnga' ni shes rab 'gyogs// le lo'i dgra rnams 'joms mdzad cing // 'jig rten lha dang mi rnams kyi// mchod yon
72a5(mdo sde): phul ba bzhes pas na// de yi sla du rgyal ba'i mtshan// dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba lags// rab tu sdug pa sngal mtshan nyid mkhyen// sdug bsngal rgyu yang shin tu
72a6(mdo sde): mkhyen dang sdug bsngal zhi ba'i mtshan nyid dang // zhi ba'i tshul yang rab tu mkhyen// 'phags pa'i bden pa ni mkhyen pas na// 'gyur ba ma mchis bden par nges// de bas bye/ 
72a7(mdo sde): bcu'i nang na yang // mtshan ni yang dag rdzogs shes bgyi// rig pa gsum po mchog brnyes pas// spyod lam rnam dag dang yang ldan// de slang mtsha ni bcom ldan 'das/ 
72a8(mdo sde): mkhyen dang zhabasu ldan zhes bgyi// chos rnams thams cad kun mkhyen cing // dam pa'i chos nyid rab bsnyes pas// thams cad kun la byams slad// dus skabs sbrar
72b1(mdo sde): ba thabs kyis bshad // skye rgan 'chi rab bsal cing // bde ba'i gan su phyin par mdzad// de yi slang rgyal ba'i mtshan// bde bar gshegs shes bgyi ba lags/ 
72b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gang nas mchis pa dang // 'jig rten bas pa'i mtha' yang mkhyen// de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan// 'jig rten mkhyen ces bgyi ba lags// thugs rje chen
72b3(mdo sde): bos sems can bsgral// mnyen nges dge ba bstan cing brtul// de yi slang du rgyal ba'i mtshan// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab spyan// 
72b4(mdo sde): thub cing bla ru 'da' nga med// de yi spa du rgyal ba'i mtshan// bla na med ces bgyi ba lags// nyon mongs mi mnga' shes rab ldan// rnam grol dam pa mchog bshad pas// del slang du
72b5(mdo sde): ba'i mtshan// lha dang mi yi ston ces bgyi// dus gsum g.yo 'am mi g.yol// bas sam ma bas chos kun kyang / byang chub shing drung kun mkhyen pas// de 'as na sangs rgyas
72b6(mdo sde): de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdzu 'phrul chen po'i ting 'dzin tu zhugs nas// sku na mkha' la 'phags te// zhal so sor nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye rgyal
72b7(mdo sde): bung dge mthong dang // mi sum snying po khyed rnams kyi sdig gi rang bzhin ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas// bar na yang mi gan so// sems brtan pa'i phyir dge ba'i mthu yang brtan no// 
72b8(mdo sde): sems rnam par grol bar byed// sdig gi rang bzhin yang rnam par gro'o// shes rab snang ba nyid kyi byed// sdig gi rang bzhin kyang stong pa 'do// dang pa'i mthu che ba'i phyir/ bsod rnams kyi
73a1(mdo sde): / yang che'o// de bzhin du mthol bshags te// 'gyod tshangs nus pa ni// de rnams mthong ba'i steng du// sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang // sprul pa'i sku thams cad kyang mthong bar
73a2(mdo sde): 'gyu ror 'gyod tshangs kyis sdig sbyangs pas// rgyun tung yang mthong la// deng byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstan bcos pa dang 'dra bar// de bzhin du 'gyod tshangs byas pa ni// nga dang sprul pa
73a3(mdo sde): sku rnams dang // 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang la sogs pa thams cad kyang dgyes par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / mchod pa byas par 'gyur// de
73a4(mdo sde): kyang dgyes par 'gyur te/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde 'di'i rjesu byang chub tu chud par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor zham 'bring ba rnams la bka' stsal pa/ sdig can rnams kyis sdig
73a5(mdo sde): bshags par 'dod na/ rgyal bu dge mthong bzhin du dus pa/ sum gyi sangs rgyas dang mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po rnams la re re nas dmigs
73a6(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal ba// nga dang phrad pa dang 'dra ba 'am/ mthong ba dang 'dra bar 'du shes bskyed de// sangs rgyas gcig gam/ sangs rgyas gnyis sam/ sangs rgyas bcu 'am/ sangs rgyas brgya'o/ 
73a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas stong ngam/ sangs rgyas khri 'am/ sangs rgyas grangs med pa'i 'du shes bskyed de/ mthong ba dang 'dra bar dmigs la/ de bzhin du re re nas dmigs te/ sems kyis phyag 'tshal
73a8(mdo sde): na de dag gis bsod nams dpag tu med pa yang thob par 'gyur la/ 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba thams cad kyang sel bar bye'o// bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du ngan song gsum du ltung bar mi
73b1(mdo sde): 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la bde bar gnas par 'gyur bar yang nges te/ the tsom medo// de'i phyir sdig pa rnams 'thol zhing bshags par byas la/ sems thag pa naso dang ba bskyed na/ 
73b2(mdo sde): mngon mi za bar sdig 'thung bar 'gyur // de nas rgyal bu dag mthong dang papa slong gis cig car du skang bcung / bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcang bstod pa/ 'di skad ces gsol to// ma
73b3(mdo sde): ldan byams shing thugs rje che// shAkya'i gdung rigs chos kyi rje// tshogs kyi nang na seng+ge'i sgras// khyab par sems can bsdus pa ni// pa la gzigs pa bu cig bzhin// rnam par 'byed pa
73b4(mdo sde): ma mchis/ de lta bu yi bla med pa// mthong nas de slang gus phyag 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu dge mthong dang / mi sum stong rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi
73b5(mdo sde): ngag khyed rnams 'di ltar 'gyod tshangs byas te/ mi 'chab pa 'i sems kyis 'grol zhing bshags pas/ nga ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// khyed rnams ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
73b6(mdo sde): gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas su 'grub bo// rigs kyi bu yang 'di lta ste/ nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gang zhig sems thag pa nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / mad
73b7(mdo sde): sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal bar nus pa ni// dkon mchog gsum gyi drin gyi lan lon zhes bya ste/ de ma thag tu mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams
73b8(mdo sde): med pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la bskur ba'i sdig 'bying bar gyur nas/ rgyun tu zhugs par 'os pa ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin no// lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'os pa ni/ lan cig kyi
74a1(mdo sde): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sbyin no// phyir mi 'ong bar 'os pa ni/ byir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sbyin no// dgra bcom par 'os pa ni/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu sbyin no// rang sangs rgyas
74a2(mdo sde): su 'os pa ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu sbyi no// byang chub dpar 'os pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu sbyin no// da ltar mdo sde 'di'o nang na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
74a3(mdo sde): po rnams skye ba gcig gis yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid thob pa yang / phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yino// byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gnyis kyi chos
74a4(mdo sde): kyi dbyings thob pa yang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yin no// byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes thob pa yang dus gsum gyi sangs
74a5(mdo sde): rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yin// byang chub sems dpa' la las don dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud pa yang / du sa gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i
74a6(mdo sde): yino// byang chub sems dpa' la la dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin dang ldan pa yang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yin no// byang chub sems dpa' ma las/ 
74a7(mdo sde): rnam pa'i mdzod kyi ting 'dzin dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yin na// byang chub sems dpa'al
74a8(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa dang / chos sbyin gyi bzod pa dang / chos bzhin gyi dbyings dang ldan pa yang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yin no// byang chub sems
74b1(mdo sde): dpa' la la/ gzungs dran pa chen po'i sems dang / rang gis rigs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yang / dus gsum na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yin no// byang chu
74b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' la la/ sing+ge s+tha'i ting 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes lnga'i phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin dang ldan pa yang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la
74b3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal ba'i yi no// byang chub sems dpa' la la mnyam pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
74b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi spyod las dang ldan pa yang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po cho
74b5(mdo sde): rje 'jam dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can tham cad nor cing 'khrul pas/ sems 'khrugs te/ mi dge
74b6(mdo sde): ba dang / mtshams ma mchis pa bgyis pa rnams ci ltar bgyis na sdig 'byang bar 'gyur zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/ gong du
74b7(mdo sde): bstan pa yin te/ gang la las phyogasu rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'
74b8(mdo sde): kyi mtshan thos nas/ dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba skyed la/ dad pa dang / gus pa dpag tu med pas blangs sam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ 'don tam/ yi ger bris sam/ kun chub par
75a1(mdo sde): / byas te/ dben pa'i gnas khang pa gcig gi nang du/ dkyil 'khor byas la/ dri chus chag cag btab te/ phan gdugs bzang pos brgyan cing pog spos zhim po
75a2(mdo sde): bsregs nas/ rgyal ba rnams spyan drang zhing gshegasu gsol ba mang yang rung / nyung yang rung / spyan drangs nas/ bdag khrus dag par byas la gos gtsang ma gyon cing / lan cig phyi ro
75a3(mdo sde): che chung ngu 'gro na/ khrus lan cig byas te/ seng+ge'i khri gtsugs nas/ chos kyi rnam sa 'di yun ring du bsgoms la/ chos kyi mtshan nyid la bdag dang / gang zag dang / sems can la
75a4(mdo sde): sogs pa'i lta ba med par mngon par rtogs par bya ste/ dang po bas bye brag phyed cing gsal bar brjod par bya'o// de nas dri spos zhim po bsregs la/ 'khrug sems bsal
75a5(mdo sde): cing / dran pa yang dag pa dang / bsam pa yang dag pa sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sems rtse gcig tu ba sam mo// de ltar spyod pa rnams 'thun zhing 'don pa ni ma
75a6(mdo sde): ste/ de la mi mthun zhing rtsod pa ni 'thol tshangasu mi 'gyur ro// khro ba des kun 'jigs par byed de/ spyod lam dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po dran zhing don dam pa
75a7(mdo sde): bsams la/ nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du nyal zhing gnyid log tu mi rung ngo // nyin gcig kyang dus gsum du mdo sde 'di kha ton tam/ klog pa nyin mtshan dus drug du byas la/ 
75a8(mdo sde): dri bsrung gis mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas/ 'thol changasu byas te/ mdo sde 'di nyid nas/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan
75b1(mdo sde): cing / sems thag pa nas mi 'khrugs pa dang / sems thag pa nas mi nor pa dang / sems thag pa nas mi g.yeng ba dang / sems zag pa nas dus kyis 'grus pa dang / sems thag
75b2(mdo sde): pa nas nyin cig pas nyin cig 'grus pa dang / sems thag pa nas dad pa skyed pa dang / sems thag pa nas dga' ba bskyed pa dang / sems thag pa nas rim pa bskyed pa dang / 
75b3(mdo sde): sems thag pa nas rgyun mi gcad pa dang / sems thag pa nas gza' ba dang / sems thag pa nas mi 'bral ba dang / sems thag pa nas sdig mi bsam pa dang / sems thag pa
75b4(mdo sde): nas sangs rgyas dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas chos dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas dge 'dun dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas tshul khrims dran pa dang / sems thag pa
75b5(mdo sde): nas gtong ba dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas don dam pa'i lha dran pa ste/ de dag de bzhin du klog pa dang / de bzhin du phyag bya ba dang / de bzhin du sems thag pa nas
75b6(mdo sde): so sor 'chags shing 'thol ba/ thog ma'i nyin par nas/ zhag drug tu lon pa'i nang par dri chus yang chag chag btang ste/ lus la yang spos chus bkru bar bya'o// pog spos bzang
75b7(mdo sde): po bsreg cing / sems thag pas mchod pa byas pa/ de dag de lta bur sems thag pa nas so sor 'thol zhing bshags pas/ phyogs bcur bskul bar 'gyur te/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus
75b8(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma sreng dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snang dang 'grags so// sgra dbyangs kyi rjesu khang du
76a1(mdo sde): / nang du phyin cing mngon tu 'grub pa'i dbang bya'o// de bzhin du nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du byas na/ gdon mi za bar sdig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar sdig 'byung bar shes
76a2(mdo sde): zhe na/ so so'i skye bo rnams kyis don dam pa rang dung ma grub pas/ rmi ltas kyi mtshan pa la rtag su byas te/ rmi lam rnam gcig rmis na/ mtshams med pa rnam gcig 'byung ngo // rmi lam
76a3(mdo sde): rnam lnga rmis na mtshams med pa rnam lnga 'byang ste/ nges nub mo rmi lam na chu klung chen po rgal bar 'dod de/ zam pa chen po'i steng du 'gro bar rmis na/ des ni nges par rnam par grol
76a4(mdo sde): ba thob pa yin// gal te de'i rmi lam na gzhan gyis bdag la khrus byas pa dang / lus la chang ba' bar rmis na/ de nges par rnam par dag pa thob pa yin no// gal te re
76a5(mdo sde): rmi lam na/ bdag dge 'dun mang po'i nang du zhugs te/ gral du 'dug par rmis na/ de ni nges par sangs rgyas kyi sku bam yang dag par gyur to// gal te de'i ros las na/ 8/ 
76a6(mdo sde): mchod rten nas/ gtsug lag khang du zhugs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan mthong bar rmis na/ de ni chos kyi sgo mo ngas par zhugs par gyur to// gal
76a7(mdo sde): te rang gis shing thog rnyed cing za bar rmis na/ de ni tshe 'di nyid la yon tan gyi 'bras bu 'grub par mngon no// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/ gal
76a8(mdo sde): dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge sbyong ngas/ dge sbyong ma 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa can gang la las dran pa nyams te/ nang cing 'khrul pas sdom pa'i tshul khrims
76b1(mdo sde): rere nas zhig pa 'am/ nyams pa de bzhin du so sor 'chags shing 'thol na/ sdig mi 'byung mi srid de/ sems thag pa nas ma byas pa ni ma gtog so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
76b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis 'di skad ces zhuso// bcom ldan 'das cho ga 'di ltar bgyi ba'i tshe/ mi mang na rung ngam mi rung / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi gcig yan cad nyi shu
76b3(mdo sde): man cad rung // cho ga 'di ltar spyod pa'i tshe/ mdo sde gzhan mi bas mo// de ltar 'thol tshangs bgyis pa'i 'og tu phyin chad nyes pa mi byed na/ de ni 'thol tshangs zhes bya'o// de ltar
76b4(mdo sde): dran par gyis shig/ bdag cag rnams da ltar 'chi ba las slar 'tsho ba dang 'dra bas/ da ni bdag tshul khrims sru'o// da ni bdag brtson 'grusu spyod do// da ni bdag theg pa chen
76b5(mdo sde): po'i mdo sde klog pa dang / kha don bgyi'o zhes de'i tshe de'i dus na/ dran pa de ltar gyis shig/ bdag deng nas snga ma pa bzung ba ni rdo rje dang 'dra bar sran thub par smon to// 
76b6(mdo sde): des de ltar dran pa'i tshe/ skyes bu dam pa dri ma med par grags pa yang / byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dang lhan cig tu de'i mdun tu 'greng ste/ dbang du byed // 'phags
76b7(mdo sde): pa kun tu bzang po yang / 'gyod tshangs kyi mkhan po bye'o// 'phags pa 'od srungs kyang zhu gnas kyi rten byed // 'jam dpal 'di ni sdig sbyangs pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni rnam
76b8(mdo sde): par grol ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni gnas thob pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
77a1(mdo sde): po 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gang la la zhig gis rtsa ba bzhi dang / sdom pa brgyad dang / sdom brgyad dang / sdom pa byed can dang / khrims
77a2(mdo sde): bcu dang ngagasum la skyabasu song ba dang / khrims lnga dang / dge ba bcu dang / tshul khrims dang / 'dul ba re re nas zhig pa 'am/ nyams pa 'am/ mtshams med pa lnga byas
77a3(mdo sde): pa 'am/ mnyam pa nyid la skar pa'i sdig byas pa zhig yod pa de log spong ma gtogs par/ so sor ma bshags ma 'thol na/ mi de tshe 'phos ma thag tu gdon mi za bar
77a4(mdo sde): mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyu ro// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci 'i slad du/ mnar ma mchis pa'i dmyal ba zhes bgyi
77a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slang du/ de ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis ltung ba dang / dmyal ba'i dbyibs che chung dang / rnam par smin pa'i sdug bsngal
77a6(mdo sde): bskal pa'i grangs ci tsam gyi bar du gnas par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol zhes bgyis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal shin tu'ang mkhaso// shin tu
77a7(mdo sde): 'ang mkhaso// don 'di lta bu 'dri ba yang shin tu mkhas te/ legs par nyon la phal mang po rnams kyang legs par soms shig/ ngas bye brag phyed par bshang ngo // ci ltar na
77a8(mdo sde): mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya zhe na/ skad cig kyang mnar zhing bstir med pa'i phyir/ mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o// gcig tu ma 'gag pa 'am/ 'ong bar ba
77b1(mdo sde): 'ang med 'gyur ba yang med de/ tsha ba ni rab tu tsha/ sdug bsngal ba ni shin tu'ang mi bzang ba/ skad cig kyang mi dal/ skad cig kyang mi sdod cing bar skabs med pa'i phyir/ 
77b2(mdo sde): mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o// yang rnam pa gcig tun/ me chen po 'bar ba/ rab tu che ba/ kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar zhing mched ba/ khong du zhugs pa'i phyir/ mnar med
77b3(mdo sde): ba'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dmyal ba chen po mnad med pa'i dbyibs ni/ gru bzhi lham pa/ dpag tshad
77b4(mdo sde): brgyad khri yod de/ lcags kyi rab ris pa bdun gyis bskor cing / steng du yang lcags kyi dra ba rim pa bdun gyis g.yogs te/ 'og tu bar chad bco brgyad ngo // de'i khor khor
77b5(mdo sde): tu ral gri tshal rim pa bdun gyis bskor to// lcags kyi rab rim pa bdun gyi nang log su nags tshal ral gri'i lo ma can yod do// lcags kyi khang pa bar chang
77b6(mdo sde): brgyad po rtseg mar 'dug ste/ rim pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yod // de'i grwa bzhir zangs kyi khyi chen po bzhi 'dug la/ lus kyi bong tshod ni 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi bcu la/ mig
77b7(mdo sde): ni klog gi 'od bzhin/ mche ba ni ras kyi sdong po dang 'dra/ so ni spu gri so gtams pa'i ro dang 'chungs/ lce ni lcags kyi mchil ba bzhin/ sder mo ni lcags kyi gsal shing
77b8(mdo sde): dang mtshungs/ mjug sa ni lcags kyi sprul dang 'dra/ spu'i bu gu re re nas/ 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched cing / kun tu 'bar rab tu 'bar ba 'byung ste// de'i drang pa mnam pa ni/ 
78a1(mdo sde): / 'jig rten gyi rdzas gnas pa gang dang yang bskrun tu med do// dmyal ba de'i sde bzhi la/ sgor re nas dmyal ba'i srungs ma bco brgyad 'dug go// mgo ni srin po
78a2(mdo sde): mgo kha ni srin po'i kha dang 'dra ste/ mgo la ra bco brgyad yod pa/ lag na lcags kyi gsal zhing thog so// rab rings pa bdun gyi nang logasu/ lcags kyi rgyal mtshan
78a3(mdo sde): grangs med pa zhig yod de/ rgyal mtshan gyi mgor me 'byung ba ni/ chu mig pa dang 'dra bar 'byung ngo // lcags 'ju ba'i khu ba 'bab pa ni/ kun tu khyab par 'bab ste/ dmyal ba'i sku
78a4(mdo sde): bzhir sgo re re'i steng na/ zangs po che bco brgyad yod pa'i nang na/ lcags khol ba'i khu ba khar ldang cing / sgo bzhir 'bab pa/ dmyal ba'i nang du gang bar 'bab bo// khang pa bar
78a5(mdo sde): chang re re'i nang du yang / lcags kyi sbrul chen po brgyad bri bzhi stong long bas/ khar gdug po'i me skyug cing rang kun tu gang bar gtong ngo // sbrul gyi sgra sgregs pa na
78a6(mdo sde): 'brug sgra chen po zer ba bzhin no// lcags kyi thu lus chen po'i char bab yang pa nar byed pa kun tu gang ngo // der sdug bsngal mi bzadang pa ni 'bum phrag brgyad khri ste/ sdug bsngal gyi nang
78a7(mdo sde): na sdug bsngal/ mi bzang ba'i nang na mi bzad pa/ kun kyang der 'dus pas dpe zla re // mnar med pa'i dmyal ba de'i sgo bzhir/ ske re re'i phyi rol tu 'bar ba'i mi shin tu bcad
78a8(mdo sde): cing 'bar ba/ lho byang shar nub bsnol zhing phyed par rgya'o// 'bar ba yang lcags kyi ra ba kho ra khor yug dpag tshad brgyad khri nas/ steng lcags kyi dra ba las thug gi bar du/ yang tha
78b1(mdo sde): mar thal zhing bla za 'og dang / phyogs bzhir kun tu 'bar rab tu 'bar bar gyur te/ sdug bsngal cig car ldang ba ni/ gang du smos pa bzhin no// rtsa ba bzhi dang / sdom pa brgyad 'jig
78b2(mdo sde): ba dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la bskur ba 'debs pa rnams/ mdo sde 'di las 'byung ba bzhin mthol tshangs ma byas la/ gnod bkur ba 'am/ khrel ba med na
78b3(mdo sde): mi de tshe 'phos ma thag tu/ stobs chen po che'i dpung po g.yas pa brkyang zhing bskums pa tsam gyis mnar med pa'i dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// lus kyang de'i nang du gang ste/ 
78b4(mdo sde): tsha ba'i bzing bas phongs nas/ kha gdangs mig btsums/ mig gdangs kha btsums kyang kha 'thams pas smra ma nu so// de sdig mang ba'i phyir ral gri 'khor lo grangs
78b5(mdo sde): med pa du ma zhig na mkha' nas char bzhin 'bab ste/ klang par phog cing rkang par byung ba'i sdug bsngal thams cang ni sngar gong du bshad pa bzhin brgya stong khri brag
78b6(mdo sde): bsgyur ba'o// gang la la rtsa ba bzhi po tshang bar zhig par gyur na/ sdug bsngal chen po nyam su myeng pa ni/ bskal pa chen po lnga rdzogs kyi bar du'o// sdom pa brgyad 'jig pa ni de las
78b7(mdo sde): gyur cig gis mang ngo // mtshams med pa lnga yang gyur cig gis mang ngo // mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo sde la skur pa 'debs pa yang / gyur cig gis mang ngo // dkon mchog gsum la slong
78b8(mdo sde): ba dang / dge 'dun gyi nor bskus pa dang / dge slong dang dge slong mtshangs par spyod pa la/ dri ma can du spyod pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon la dbang za ba dang / ma la g.yem pa rnas
79a1(mdo sde): gong ma dag las kyang gyur cig gis bskye // log spyod rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba gtan chad pas/ nams kyang mnar med pa'i dmyal ba nas mi thar pa
79a2(mdo sde): ni der ma gtog so// de la sogs pa'i sdig can rnams/ sdug bsngal nyam su myong ba'i tshe/ 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched pa khong du zhugs te rmugs nas 'chi'o// de nas srin
79a3(mdo sde): po dmyal ba'i srangs mas/ lcags kyi gsal shing sa la brdabs te/ sos sos zhes bos pa dang / bos pa'i sgra bzhin du yang sos yang sos nas/ nyin mtshan gcog la lan
79a4(mdo sde): khri ni 'chi/ lam dri ni 'tsho ste/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pa chen po nyam su myong ba ni gong du bstan pa bzhin no// nam zhig mnar med pa'i dmyal ba nas slar phyin na yang tshul khrim
79a5(mdo sde): bshig pa dang / yon bdag dad pa can gyi yon blangs pa'i las kyis/ yang dmyal ba chung ngu rnams kyi nang du 'jug ste/ de la dmyal ba grang sbrebs pa dang / dmyal
79a6(mdo sde): ba rus nag pa dang / dmyal ba rab tu tsha ba dang / dmyal ba spu gri so bsdams pa dang / dmyal ba ral gri 'khor lo dang / dmyal ba me'i shing rta can dang / dmyal ba phyi sa'i 'dam
79a7(mdo sde): dang / dmyal ba chu tshan dang / dmyal ba me mur klung dang / dmyal ba nags tshal ral gri lo ma can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi 'khrul 'khor can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi
79a8(mdo sde): sham ma li ka ba can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi khri can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi 'khor lo can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi phug dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi thu lum dang / dus
79b1(mdo sde): ba bsdus 'joms thug ri can dang / dmyal ba zangs khu lud dang / 'di rnams so so re re'i nang du yang lo khri phrag brgyad brgya'i bar du nyon mongs nas gdong thar te/ 'on
79b2(mdo sde): kyang rtag tum rab su skyes la/ tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du dkon mchog gsum gyi sgra mi thos so// brgya la dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa na ni/ byang chub sems bskyed
79b3(mdo sde): kyang srid/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma phrad na ni/ slar yang dmyal bar ltung ngo // nyes byas kyi sdig pa rnams ma 'thol ma bshags na/ dmyal bar sdug bsngal myong ba
79b4(mdo sde): rgyal chen ris pazhi'i lha'i lo grangasas khreng / khe khri thAg brgyang brgya'i 'dzidz+ranyam su myong ba gyung// ngal ltung ba rnams kyi sdug pa ni mamo nyis kyur dri skyed de// dge 'dun
79b5(mdo sde): kyai lhag ma yang de las nyis gyur du bskyed do// sdig can deng / ga gis sdug bsngal nyas su myong ba'i cha/ tshig gan/ mi phyin te/ a pa ba/ a taH/ a la la/ a ba ga
79b6(mdo sde): shig zer zhing 'dug go// de bas na sdig can rnams rings par so sor 'thol zhing bshags la/ dkon mchog gsum gyi skyabasu song bar bgyis shig/ 'jam dpal yang 'di lta ste/ sdig
79b7(mdo sde): pa myur du bsal cing 'byung bar 'dod na/ mdo sde 'di'i nang nas 'byung ba bzhin du so sor 'thol bshags te/ 'gyod tshangs byos shig/ cho ga nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin cig za cig tu byas
79b8(mdo sde): la yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyasu grub pa'i tshe/ mi chen po'i mtshan dang / mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i mtshan dang / mi g.yo ba'i mtshan dang / 
80a1(mdo sde): / par grol ba'i mtshan dang / 'od zer can gyi mtshan dang / ye shes yongasu rgyas pa'i mtshan dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba la sogs
80a2(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i mtshan rnams bsam par bya'o// yang gcig tu na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i yid dam pa'i ting 'dzin las langs te/ yid 'gog pa'i ting
80a3(mdo sde): 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o// yid 'gog pa'i tingange 'dzin las langs te/ slar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin las langs te/ shes rab sgron
80a4(mdo sde): ma'i ting 'dzin la 'jug/ shes rab sgron ma las langs te/ chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi ting 'dzin la 'jug// chos rnam sa kyi mtshan nyid las langs te/ mtshan ma 'od zer can gyi
80a5(mdo sde): 'dzin la 'jug/ mtshan ma 'od zer can las langs te/ seng+ge nga ro'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ seng+ge'i nga ro las langs te/ sing+ge sprug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ seng+ge sprug pa las la
80a6(mdo sde): te/ rgya mtsho yid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ rgya mtsho yid las langs te/ kun tu ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ kun tu ye shes las langs te/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i tingange 'dzin la 'jug/ 
80a7(mdo sde): gzungs kyi phyag rgya las langs te/ kun tu snang ba'i lus gzugs can gyi ting 'dzin la 'jug/ kun tu snang ba'i lus gzugs can las langs te/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi ting 'dzin la
80a8(mdo sde): 'jug chos kyi dbyings nyid las langs te/ seng+ge'i rgyal po'i ting 'dzin la 'jug/ seng+ge'i rgyal po las langs te/ chos kyi rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug chos kyi rgyal po las langs
80b1(mdo sde): bdud rnams kyi mtshan ma 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ bdud rnams kyi mtshan ma 'gog pa las langs te/ stong pa nyid kyi shes rab kyi ting 'dzin la 'jug/ stong pa nyid kyi shes
80b2(mdo sde): las langs te/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa'i tinge 'dzin la 'jug/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa las langs te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi tingange 'dzin la 'jug
80b3(mdo sde): chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes las langs te/ gnas thams cad du khyab pa'i lus gzugs can gyi ting 'dzin la 'jug/ gnas thams cad du khyab pa'i lus gzugs can las la
80b4(mdo sde): te/ sems kyi mtshan nyid la rnam par rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ sems kyi mtshan nyid la rnam par rtog pa las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i
80b5(mdo sde): mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshan nyid kyi ting 'dzi na las langs te/ rdo rje gtsug tor gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug
80b6(mdo sde): daM rje gtsug tor las langs te/ rgya mtsho thams cad kyi ting 'dzin la 'jug/ rgya mtsho thams cad las langs te/ gzungs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ gzungs thams
80b7(mdo sde): rgya mtsho khas langs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi rgya ma ti 'dzin la 'jug/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul rgyal po las langs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyirnapa
80b8(mdo sde): grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i rgya
81a1(mdo sde): las langs te/ gdod thabs kyi ting 'dzin mtha' med pa'i rgya mtsho'i sgor 'jug par bya'o// mtha' med mu meng pa'i rgya mapo'i sgo nas langs te/ yid 'gog pa dang / 'i
81a2(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ yid 'gog pa dang zhi ba las langs te/ rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i rnam par grol ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o// 'jam dpal nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'o/ 
81a3(mdo sde): tung rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me gang la las dang ba skad cig ma'i sems bskyed de/ mdo 'di yi ger 'dri ba 'am/ klag pa 'am/ kha thon tu skad cig par dran te/ bsam pa'i 'du shes
81a4(mdo sde): dang / dran pa'i 'du shes dang / rtog pa'i 'du shesu dad pa'i sems grub na/ skad cig mar bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bru ma phrag dgu bcu'i gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi 'khor ba'i sdig
81a5(mdo sde): phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur ro// ma rig pa'i sgrib pa yang gta na bral bar 'gyur ro// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag tu mtsho skyeng zhing bshes te/ mya ngan las mi 'da' ba
81a6(mdo sde): mngon no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la tshig su bcang bka' stsal pa/ yi dgas mthu chen thams cad dang // dud 'gro glang po ma rungs dang // bud med g.yes
81a7(mdo sde): dang ma rungs klu// dpag tu med pa'i ma rungs rnams// ba su dang ni ma skyes dgra/ lnga sbyin dang ni ser mo'i 'phreng // lus dang sems kyis sdig spyad pas// dmyal ba mnar med ltung 'os
81a8(mdo sde): kyang // phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la// dad pa bskyed de phyag 'tshal phyir// thub pa mya ngan 'da' ba'i khar// bskal pa grangs med phyir bshel// ma ga d+ha'i skye bo dag/ kun kyang byang
81b1(mdo sde): chub sems skyed pa 'ang // phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la// gus par phyag byas dbang giso// ko'u dri myar la sogs pa dang / nyan thos lnga brgya rnams ngag gis// me 'ongs dus su
81b2(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya ba 'ang // phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la// gus par phyag byas dbang giso// mu stegs dang ni bram ze dang // sngags 'chang chen po drang srong bcu// da ltar dgra bcom grub pa
81b3(mdo sde): yang sa 'das pa'i phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi// rgyal ba rnam la phyag byas yon// dam pa'i don la chad pa dang // phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i zhing rnams na// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
81b4(mdo sde): thams cad// tshe dpag med par skyes pa yang // phyogs pa cu dus gsum rgyal ba la// gus par phyag byas dbang gis so// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste// sngon nga rgyal po byed pa
81b5(mdo sde): na/ drang srong chen po sprin zhes bya// de tshe sangs rgyas ma byung ste// bram ze lnga brgya rnam zhig la// kha zas da nga ni gos rnams dang // khang khyim dang ni mal cha'i bar// 
81b6(mdo sde): grangs nyi shu tshang bar du// rab tu byung ba'i mchod pa phul// ngas ni de che bsgo ba la// khyed rnams byang chub sems bskyed cig/ bram ze lnga brgya de dag gi/ mchod pa phul ba blangs
81b7(mdo sde): kyis kyang / dkon mchog gsum la ma dad pas// mod bzhin nga la slar smras pas// 'jig rten nang na byang chub dang // rnam par grol ba medo zhes// de skad smras pa ngas thos nas/ 
81b8(mdo sde): mnyam nyid mdo sde bsrungs pa'i phyir// bram ze lnga brgya'i srog bca // bram ze de dag tshe 'phos nas// dmyal ba mnar med ldang bar 'gyur// sems can dmyal bar ltung na su
82a1(mdo sde): dran pa rnam gsum g.yos nas kyang // dus gsum rgyal la phyag byaso// mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo sde dang // byang chub dge 'dun dang skyed la// dran pa rnam gsum byas
82a2(mdo sde): bas na/ mod la dmyal nas byung ste dong // 'jig rten zil dang ra rnga ru skyes// tshe ni bskal pa chung bcu thub// de yang gus pa'i sems kyis su// phyogs bcu'i rgyal la phyag bya yA/ 
82a3(mdo sde): bram ze de dag thams cad kyis// thog mar skur pas dbul lhung yang // phyis ni dad pas med la thar// byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams ni// khrel dang ldan pa smos ci dges// 
82a4(mdo sde): sdig gi rang bzhin thog ma nas// med pas sems can rnams kyi phyid// rtsa ba bzhi po'i sdom pa dang // mtshams med lnga po'i sdig rnams kyang // log spang bar du 'thol bshags/ 
82a5(mdo sde): so so'i skye bo la la zhig/ de lta bu'i sdig byas pa// de ba zhin 'thol 'tshangs byed nus na// tsa ba bzhi dang maHmas med lnga// log spyod bar du sdig 'byung ste// sangs
82a6(mdo sde): rgyas 'grub pa'ang gdon mi za// ma dad pa ni der ma gtogs// gang zhig dad pa'i sems skyes te// rgyal ba rnams la phyag byas na// chos las mi 'grub mi srid // de nas rgyal
82a7(mdo sde): bu dge mthong dang // mi sus stong pa'i mi rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshig 'thun par// 'di skad gsol te bdag cag rnams// sangs rgyas grub nas skye shi las// 'khor ba'i
82a8(mdo sde): rnam dag bsgral bar smin// lha mi'i nang na btsun bzhugs pas// bye brag phyed par bshad du gsol// de la gzugasu bzung ba dang // yi ger bris shing klog 'chang ba// de yi bsod nam
82b1(mdo sde): ci tsam mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bye brag phyed par ngas bshad kyis/ rgyal bu dge mthong legs par nyon/ gang zhig rin chen sna bdun gyis// stong kha
82b2(mdo sde): gang ba'i sems can la// sbyin pa byas shing yon phul nas// de'i steng du chos bshad kyis// dgra bcom 'bras bu thob byas pas// la la zhig gis rgyal ba'i mtshan// thos nas
82b3(mdo sde): dad pa'i sems bskyed de// skad cig dus su phyag byas nas// de yi bsod nams de bas 'da'// yi ger bris shing klog 'chang dang // ngad pas phyag 'tshal spos ci dgos// de yi bsod
82b4(mdo sde): rnams dpag tu med// gang gis yi ger bra ba dang // klog/ pa dang ni dongon pa dang // dus phyag 'tshal sems bskyed na// mchod rten stong khams chub pa ru// brtsigs pa'i bsad
82b5(mdo sde): rnams pas ni che// de nas 'od srung chen po dang // shA 'i bu dang kun dga' bo// mchod rten srung ba mthu'i cha tshangs lnga rnams dang lnga dbang po// 'khor lo sgyur dang
82b6(mdo sde): rgyal chen bzhis// bcom ldan zhabs la mgos btud nas// skad 'thun par ni 'di skad gsol// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das slad na// bdag cag rnams kyis sems can la/ 
82b7(mdo sde): khyab par spel zhing bstan par gyis// lus sems rtag tu bde ba'i phyir// phyag 'tshal rnams la bsrung bar bgyi// gang zhig sdom pa zhig pa dang // mtshams med lnga'i
82b8(mdo sde): sdig pa dang // mnyam pa nyid la bskur ba rnams// sangs rgyas de dag mtshan thos pas// rnam dag sa ru bde bar gnas// dper na rgyal bu dge mthong bzhin// de dung ma 'ongs
83a1(mdo sde): / phyi dus na// sangs rgyas rang bzhin mthong bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas// tshogs chen po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
83a2(mdo sde): khyed rnams legs par nyon cig/ khyed rnams la sngon 'byung ba'i las kyi rgyu rkyen bshad par bya'o// nga sngon bskal ba dpag tu med pa 'das pa'i sngon ro lan/ de bzhin gash+ye
83a3(mdo sde): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mdzes pa'i 'od ces bya ba las/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos nas/ shin tu dga' ba'i sis
83a4(mdo sde): skyed te// thal mo sbyar cing spyi bor blang so// blangs nas kyi nga sems can gang nas gang du gnas pa de dang der dpag tu med pa mtha' yas pa'i sems can rnams la rgya cher
83a5(mdo sde): spel zhing bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos par bya so// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshogs rnams kyi nang du mi sum stong 'i che zhing / nga'i chos kyi don dang 'thun ste/ dang pa'i
