173b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' brgya la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' stong la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' khri la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' khri
173b8(mdo sde): phrag gcig la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag bcu la phyag 'tsha'o// byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag brgya la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems
174a1(mdo sde): dbang khri phrag nyis brgya la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag sum brgya la phyag 'tsha lo// byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag bzhi ba
174a2(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag lnga brgya la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag drug brgya la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'
174a3(mdo sde): rje phrag bdun brgyal phyag 'tsha'o// byang chub sems dpal khri brag brgyad bsngal gyus la/ byang chub sems dpa' khri bras dgu brgyal phyag 'a
174a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' wa~M thAg song gi byang chub mas sa dpa' sems dpa chen pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de rnams la phyag 'tshal ma bsal pa
174a5(mdo sde): tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba yang bsal ba ra 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bum phrag gcig la phyag 'tshalo// byang chu
174a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'bum phrag bcu la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag stong la phyag 'tshalo// byang
174a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag khri la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag khrag khrig khri yi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal
174a8(mdo sde): de rnams la phyag 'tshal na/ bskal pa dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khrag khrig
174b1(mdo sde): phrag gcig la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bcu la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag brgya la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems
174b2(mdo sde): dpa' khrag khrig phrag sdong la phyag 'tsha lo// byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag khri la phyag 'tsha lo// byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig 'bum la phyag 'tshalo// de rnams
174b3(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal na/ bskal pa dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba yang bsal bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ga gcig
174b4(mdo sde): gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dang 'a gang ga gnyis kyi bye ma snyeng la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' gang ga gsum
174b5(mdo sde): gyi bye ma snyeng la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sem sa pa' gang ga bzhi'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' gang ga lnga'i bye
174b6(mdo sde): ma steng la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' gang ga drug gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' gang ga bdun gyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshalo// 
174b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang ga brgyad kyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'alo// byang chub sems dpa' gang ga dgu'i bye ba snyed la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa
174b8(mdo sde): gangag bcu'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' gangag brgya'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tsha'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang ga stong gi bye ba snyed la phyag 'cha
175a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang ga khri'i byem snyeng la phyag 'ama'o// byang chub sems dpa' gangag 'bum phrag brjod kyis mi lang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
175a2(mdo sde): chen po rnams la phyag 'tsha'o// de rnams la phyag 'tshal na/ bskal pa grangs med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba yang dag par 'gyuraro// gang zag la las 'phags pa byang
175a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyi mtshan thos na/ mi de bskal pa 'bum phrag bzhi bcu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung zhing / khams
175a4(mdo sde): gsum gyi 'khor bar mi gtogs te/ rtag tu rnas par thar pa'i rgyal ba'i kham su gtogs par 'gyur// mtha' khang yul du ma su dag med yul du 'ang de bzhin / 
175a5(mdo sde): lus ngan len par mi 'gyur zhing // log par lta bar mi skye'o// pa rabs rigasu de mi skye// mu stegs can du'ang mi skye ste// lus kyi yan lag kun dang ldan// dam pa'i
175a6(mdo sde): chos ni rtag tu thos// dka' thub sdom pa ma blangs kyang // 'di dag kun dang ldan gyur te// theg pa chen po'i spyod lam mdzes// rtag par sangs rgyas bdag nyid mthong // de phyir gus par byag
175a7(mdo sde): 'tshal te// bcom ldan chos la bde bar gnas// ma 'ongs dus na sangs rgyas 'grub// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyi mtshan bsgrags pa na// rigs kyi bu po dang
175a8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo 'bum phrag brgyad bcu rtsa brgyad kyis/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// lnga dang mi 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa dgus/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// sems so/ 
175b1(mdo sde): ba'i dge slong 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa brgyad kyis/ sems kyi bdag nyid slar rnyed de/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu za'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam
175b2(mdo sde): phrag bcus gzungs chen po rnyed nas/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub kyi snying por mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems
175b3(mdo sde): dpa' chen pa sing+ga spras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ltar na/ theg pa yang gcig tu bas te/ gnyis dang gsum duH
175b4(mdo sde): mchis so// rtogs pa chen pos yongasu rgyas pa'i 'gyod tshangs kyi mdo 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad sa kyi yul/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
175b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi lam chen po rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi mig/ log par lta ba thams cad kyi sdud pa/ sems nyam sa pa rnams kyi skyong ba ngan 'gro gsum gyi sgo ni gcod pa/ 
175b6(mdo sde): na med pa'i byang chub kyi sgo ni 'byed pa/ nyan thos rnams ni rims kyis theg pa chen po la gzhol bar 'gyur lags te/ da bdag cog gis kyang gzungs sngags chen po 'di bzung cing
175b7(mdo sde): bsgrub par bgyi'o// gang zag gang la las tshul khrims kyi sdom pa dang / mdo sde 'phel sbom zhing klog par byed na/ de la yang de bzhin du bsrung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o// yang ga
175b8(mdo sde): la zhig mdo sde 'di la mchong cing rim gror byed pa dang / zhag bdun gyi bar du spyod cing sgom par byed pa la/ bdud sdig po can dkrug pa'i skabs tshal bzhig mchis na yang / 'ja
176a1(mdo sde): des kyang dkrug pa'i skabs mi rnyeng par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di yun ring du gnas pa dang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid mthar thug pa'i
176a2(mdo sde): du yang bskyang bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di srung ba ni/ dkon mchog gsum srung ba mir// yang bstan pa yang bsrung
176a3(mdo sde): yin no// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge sgras/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar gzus sngags smras pa// na po bud d+ha ya/ na so d+ha mA ya/ na maHsang gA
176a4(mdo sde): a dan te/ da ra ni/ tad+ya ya thA/ A kA shi nas sA b+hA bA/ saHd+harma nis sA b+ha bA/ i sha ma ta pi pa shA nA/ bI ma le su pa re/ dArma a ti ka na pA la nIs shA/ ya tha ma la
176a5(mdo sde): tsa le tsa le/ hu lu hu lu/ bi shad de/ ci shang de/ man d+ham na tra man tras swAhA// gzungs sngag/ sa 'dri dus gcig la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing
176a6(mdo sde): mchod rten la lan bdun bdun bskor ba dang / de bzhin du zhag bdun gyi bar du meng sde gzhan mi bsam par/ rdzogs pa chen pos yongasu rgyas pa'i 'gyod tshangs kyi mdo sa
176a7(mdo sde): 'di la sems rtse gcig tu bya'o// gzhan du mi g.yeng bar bya'o// gzungs sngags 'di sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgyad brgyas gsungs te/ bdag gis kyang bshad // gal
176a8(mdo sde): te gang zag la las gzungs sngags 'di la skur cing spang pa bgyid na/ sangs rgyas de snyed la skur pa lag so// gzungs sngags 'di la skur pa'i gang zag ni/ tshe rab su yang
176b1(mdo sde): bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu mi 'grub par 'gyur te/ khams gsum las kyang mi 'anga'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzungs sngags 'di ni sems stor ba las slang rnyed par
176b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / gzungs sngags 'di lan gcig tsam thos pa 'am/ thos nas yi ger dris shing / sha dang mang bcang de za cig par bgyid cing khrims srung ba dang bag
176b3(mdo sde): ma mchis pa'i rtsed mo g.yeng ba mi bgyid pa dang / 'du 'dzi'i nang du mi 'jug pa dang / rtag tu byams pa la sgom zhing / bsam gtan la dam par lta ba'i gang zag de
176b4(mdo sde): ni/ bskal pa dpag tu pa mchis pa nas sogs pa'i sgrib pa gsum dang / sdig lci ba la sogs pa yang gzungs sngags 'di thos te/ sems thag pa nas zlos shing
176b5(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / nyin gcig bzhin du klog cing kha ton pabying ba dang / ying ngas du mi brjed par bgyid na/ gang zag de mngon par byang chub pa'i bar du ngan song
176b6(mdo sde): du mi ltu // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i sgra la bka' stsal pa/ khyod dkon mchog gsum stong ba dang / skye bo mang po la yang phan par
176b7(mdo sde): sems cang / srid pa gsupa las bsgral shing gdon pa dang / slob pa grangs med pa la phan pa chen po byed pa dang / log par lta ba thams cad zlog pa'i phyir/ gzungs swAr+b+ba
176b8(mdo sde): phye zhing bstan pa leg so// legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi ming dang gzungs sngags kyi sgra 'di/ sems can la las thos nas mos pa dang gus pa skyed de la skur ba'i
177a1(mdo sde): de ni/ tshe 'di la yang bde ba nas/ shi 'pho nas kyang rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong zhing nga yang mthong la/ khyod dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan yang many+dzu
177a2(mdo sde): bar 'gyuraro// de thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po so so rang gi rig pa mngon par 'tshang rgya ba the tsom mi za bar 'gyuraro// kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad
177a3(mdo sde): spangs shing / dge ba thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam grub pa ni/ kun kyang mos pa dang / dang ba'i dbang gi so// nga 'das pa'i phyir rigs kyi bu dang / ri
177a4(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis// nyin gcig gam/ mtshan gcig gam/ dus gcig gam/ skad gcig la/ phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas da
177a5(mdo sde): gsung rab mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems da pa' rnams la phyag 'tshal nus shing / theg pa chen po'i tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / don dpa
177a6(mdo sde): ba'i bden pa ji bzhin par yid la byed pa'i gang zag de ni/ thang cig yud tsam gcig gis/ mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur pa
177a7(mdo sde): dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las thams cad kun ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro// yang dge slong pha dang / dge slom dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ dge tshul
177a8(mdo sde): pha dang / dge tshul mas ngo bo nyid kyis sems stor pa dang / rang gi rtsa ba bzhi bshig pa dang / sdom pa brgyad nyams pa dang / lci ba drug dang / mi dge ba bcu dang / 
177b1(mdo sde): mtshams med pa lnga byas pa dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur ba yang / phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan la
177b2(mdo sde): mos pa skyed de phyag 'tshal na/ de lta bu'i las mi dge ba kun ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu/ de nas sangs rgyas 'od nges pa
177b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba de'i drung nas de'i tshe rgyal bu dge mthong mi sum steng dang / blo bur du skad cig gcig gis dus der lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la
177b4(mdo sde): spyi bos gtugs te/ phyag 'tshal nas/ 'grin cig tu bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la sogs pas/ bskal
177b5(mdo sde): ba dpag tu ma mchis pa nas/ mi dge ba'i las bgyis shing bsags pa ni brjod kyis kyang mi rdzogs te/ la las ni mi dge ba bcu bgyis/ la las ni
177b6(mdo sde): mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis/ la las ni mnyam pa nyid kyi chos la skur ba la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing brjod kyis mi rdzogs pa'i sdig pa'i sdig pa
177b7(mdo sde): bgyis pa de dag dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / gsung rab bcu gnyis kyi mdo sde la brten nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i mdun du mthol zhing
177b8(mdo sde): bshags par 'tshal na/ de gnang bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jigs pa'i sems bskyed pa dka' ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
178a1(mdo sde): pa dka' ba las bskyed pa ni leg so// legs so// khyed kyis mi dge ba bcu bshags pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga bshags pa dang / 'dod chen la so/ 
178a2(mdo sde): pa bshags nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mthong bar 'dod pa de legs kyis/ yid la sems pa bzhin du mthol cig de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong
178a3(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i gsung thos nas/ chos gos tshul bzhin du bgos nas/ thal mo sbyar te spyi bas gtugs nas/ phrag pa g.yas pa chos bzhin du
178a4(mdo sde): byung / pus mo g.yas pa'i lang sa la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol lo// bdag cag la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
178a5(mdo sde): rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs gsol lo// phyog/ sa bcu'i chos la phyag skyabasu ga so lo// phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun la phyag 'jal 'ang stsa
178a6(mdo sde): su gsol lo// yang shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrug mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsolo// yang lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung
178a7(mdo sde): ldan la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsolo// yang nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs gsol lo// yang byang phyogs kyi debani/ 
178a8(mdo sde): gshegs pa gang nami 'ber grub pal phyag 'tshal zhing srub sugs pa'o// yang seng gi phyogs kyang canan gshegs pa kyis brtsegs pasang byag 'ang pa ning chu
178b1(mdo sde): gsol lo// yang 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum gzugs la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsolo// shar phyogs na 'phags pa kun tu bzang po la yang
178b2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsolo// lho phyogs na 'phags pa 'jig rten gzungs la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsol lo// nub phyogs na 'phags pa spyan ras
178b3(mdo sde): gzigs dbang phyug la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsol lo// byang phyogs na 'phags pa zla rgyas la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsolo// steng gi phyogs
178b4(mdo sde): na 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal zhing skya bsugaso la// 'og ma phyogs na 'phags pa yon tan brtan pa la yang phyag zhing skyabasu gsol lo// 
178b5(mdo sde): thog pa'i sten pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa 'od mi 'gyur ba la phyag 'tshal zhing skyab su gsolo// ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po
178b6(mdo sde): la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skabasu gsol lo// 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas sprul pa'i sku sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu
178b7(mdo sde): gsol lo// nga ltar bdag cag gi ston pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsol lo// bcom ldan 'das dri ma med par grags pa dang
178b8(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs gsol lo// kun dga' ba dang 'od srung la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsolo// 'phags pa'i lam
179a1(mdo sde): // bzhis mngon par byung ba rnams la yang phyag 'tshal zhing srub su gsal lo// sems bskyed pa dang po pa rnams la yang phyag 'tshal zhing sgrub sugs so/ 
179a2(mdo sde): mdzod chen po gsung rab mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / yang dag par mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo sde la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsol lo// chos kyi mdo sde gzhan ji snyed
179a3(mdo sde): bzhugs pa la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsol lo// sku gdung brgyan du bgos pa'i gzugs rnams la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsol lo// da ltar bzhugs
179a4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi don la yang phya ga 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsolo// phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lnga dang / 
179a5(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / bar snang gi ldang nga/ gnam gyi steng dang / sa'i 'og gi lha dang / ri'i lha dang / tshal gyi lha dang / shing drung gi lnga dang / rig
179a6(mdo sde): sngags 'chang dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan pa rnams dang / lha'i mig dang ldan pa dang / lha'i rna ba dang ldan pa de dag thams cad kyis gzigs shing gson te/ 
179a7(mdo sde): kun gyis dbang mdzad par gsol lo// sems can thams cad la ma mthol ma bshags pa zhig mchis na yang sdig pa thams cad byang bar gyur cig/ bdag
179a8(mdo sde): cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i khams tshun chad nas/ daltar gyi lus ngan pa 'di thob pa'i bar du rmongs shing bslad pa'i sems kyis/ log
179b1(mdo sde): par mthong ba dpag tu ma mchis pas las dang nyon mongs pa dang / mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa ni brjod kyis mi rdzogs te/ sdig pa mang po ci bgyis pa rnams dad/ 
179b2(mdo sde): nyid kyis mtshor ma rig pas/ mi dge ba'i sems rab tu rgyas pa'i dbang gis/ 'jig rten pha rol ma mthong zhing / tshe 'di 'ba' shig mthong ba la gnas te/ nyon mo
179b3(mdo sde): pa'i bag chags la mos pas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ring du gyur cing / mi dge ba'i las kyi bar chad du gyur cing bsgribs pa 'am/ sdig pa'i grogs po la brten pa
179b4(mdo sde): dge slong pha dang / dge slong ma la mi rigs shing tshul ma lags pa'i las bgyis pa 'am/ pa dang ma la mi rigs shing tshul ma lags pa'i las bgyis pa 'am/ yang rang
179b5(mdo sde): nyam gyi dbang gis phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi nor dang yo byad la sogs pa spyad pa 'am/ dge la dun sde lnga la yang mi rigs shing tshul ma lags pa'i las
179b6(mdo sde): bgyid pa dang / 'jig rten gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu dpag tu med pa snyed bshad pa dang / byang chub kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems can la ngan du spang ba 'am/ 
179b7(mdo sde): kyi mkhan pa la skur ba 'am/ dam pa'i chos ni chos ma lags par bshad pa 'am/ chos ma lags pa ni dam pa'i chos lags par bshad pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs
179b8(mdo sde): pa ni mi rtag ces bgyis pa 'am/ dam pa'i chos kyang mi rtag go zhes bgyis pa 'am/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang mi rtag go zhes bgyis pa 'am/ phan pa'i sbyin pa la ma
180a1(mdo sde): dad pa 'am/ chos log pa la dad cing 'dzin pa de lta bu'i slad du/ nga 'jigs shing skrag pa ni dpag tu ma mchis/ 'jom zhing gnong ba ni bsam gyis mi
180a2(mdo sde): khyab ste/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu gsol lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs rje dang byams pa mnga' bas/ kun la snyoms pa'i yab yum lags
180a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i gshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag la sogs pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas srid pa na 'khor ba'i tshe/ sdig lji ba bgyis pa
180a4(mdo sde): de dag thams cad 'gyod cing bshags pas tshangs pa ka nang bar gsol te/ slan chad kyang mi bgyid par gyur cig/ yang bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la sogs pas bskal
180a5(mdo sde): pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa 'am/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / nga ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
180a6(mdo sde): kyi sdom pa dang / tshul khrims nyams pa 'am/ 'dod chen pa'i las spyad pa 'am/ mi dge ba'i tshig rtsub mo sbas nas/ dge ba'i chos la skur ba'i sdig lci ba'i las
180a7(mdo sde): bgyis pa yang slar 'gyod cing bshags ma myong ba dang / yid la 'dzem pa dang / ngo tsha ma mchis pas/ mi dge ba bcu dang mtsham lnga'i dngos po lci ba la sogs
180a8(mdo sde): pa bgyis pa 'am/ thog ma nas yid la 'jigs shing 'dzem pa ma mchis pas de lta bu'i sdig lci ba bgyis par bdag nyid kyis nges par 'tshal kyang / nongs pa
180b1(mdo sde): bcabs shing dad pas byin pa blangs pa mthong zhing ma bshags pa 'am/ dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi zhing / rim 'gro mchod pa'i bsam pa ma
180b2(mdo sde): mchis te/ de la mi snyan par smad cing yang log par bltas pa 'am/ ngag gi sgo nas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa mang po bgyis pa 'am/ yang 'di skad ces
180b3(mdo sde): kyang smras te/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gsum ma mchis zhes bgyis pa la sogs pa mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga'i sdig lci ba
180b4(mdo sde): de lta bu bgyis pa'i slang du/ nga 'jigs shing skrag pa ni dpag tu ma mchis/ 'dzem zhing gnod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu
180b5(mdo sde): gsol lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs rje dang byams pa mnga' bas kun la snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa'
180b6(mdo sde): rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag la sogs pas 'gyong cing mthol bshags pas tshangs pa gnang bar gsol te/ bskal pa dpag
180b7(mdo sde): tu ma mchis pa nas/ srid pa na 'khor ba'i tshe/ sdig lci ba bgyis pa rnams bsal cing slan chad kyang mi bgyid par gyur cig/ yang bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
180b8(mdo sde): la sogs pas/ bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas log par mthol bas/ lci ba bzhi ni sbom por bshang/ sbom po bzhi ni lci bar bshad pa 'am/ zhig pa ni ma zhig
181a1(mdo sde): / pa zhes bshad/ ma zhig pa ni zhig pa zhes bshad pa 'am/ lci ba ni yang bar bshad/ yang ba ni lci bar bshad pa 'am/ gtsang ba ni mi gtsang bar mthong / 
181a2(mdo sde): gtsang ba ni gtsang bar mthong ba la sogs pa/ log par mthong ba 'am/ 'jig rten gyi gtsug lag ni bshad cing bsang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la gus pa ma bgyis
181a3(mdo sde): shing / mi dge pa'i don rnams la gzhung bzung zhing bsams pa dang / ma brtags pa rnam pa brgyad 'chang ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa ni bdud kyi tshig
181a4(mdo sde): ces bgyis/ bdud kyi tshig yang dag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' zhes bgyis pa 'am/ bar 'ga' ni mu stegs kyi ston pa drug gis rnam par bshad pa la pos
181a5(mdo sde): shing bzung ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs mya na las 'das par zhugs te/ dkon mchog ga sum la rtag pa ma mchis snyam sems la 'khrul 'byung
181a6(mdo sde): ba la sogs pa/ lta ba log pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de lta bas nang 'jigs shing ngogs pa dang / 'dzem zhing gnong ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ nga'or mchog gsuM
181a7(mdo sde): la skyabs gsol lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni kun la snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags
181a8(mdo sde): te/ bdag cag la sogs pas 'gyod cing mthol bshags pas tshangs pas gnang bar gsol te/ slan chad kyang mi bgyid par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
181b1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa las/ gal te rtsa ba bzhi 'am/ mtshams med pa lnga 'am/ yang dag pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa ma mthol ma bshags na/ nges par sems can
181b2(mdo sde): dmyal bar ltung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang de
181b3(mdo sde): la skyabs mdzad pa mi spyodado// dge 'dun dang / pa ma dang / lha rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi mis kyang de la skyabs byed mi nus so zhes thos pas na/ de'i phyir 'jigs shing
181b4(mdo sde): dogs pa dang / 'dzem zhing gnong ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu gsolo// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang / ma gshegs pa'i sar+b+ba
181b5(mdo sde): rgyas stong dang / de ltar gyi sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa rnams dang / sangs rgyus bcom ldan 'das thams cad ni thugs rje dang byams
181b6(mdo sde): pa'i mnga' bdag lags ste/ kun la snyoms pa'i yab yum lags byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bya zhes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag la sogs pas 'argya
181b7(mdo sde): cing mthol bshags pas tshangs pa gnang bar gsol te/ bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas/ nyod mongs pa'i sgrib pa 'ang/ las kyi sgrib pa 'am/ rnam par smin pa'i
181b8(mdo sde): sgrib pa 'am/ lci ba bani dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mi dge ba bcu la sogs pa'i sdig lci ba rnams bsal bar gyur cig/ yang bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
182a1(mdo sde): / sogs pas bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas srid pa na 'khor ba'i tshe/ sdig lci ba rnams bsal nas slar chad kyang mi bgyid par gyur cig/ 
182a2(mdo sde): yang bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la sogs pas bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas/ da ltar gyi tshe 'di'i bar du dge 'dun gyi spyi'i nor dang / phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi
182a3(mdo sde): spyi nor la thugs thung ngu spyad pa 'am/ da ltar gyi dge 'dun gyi nor la thugs thung ngu spyad pa 'am/ dge 'dun sde lnga'i nor dang / dge slong ngo cog gi nor la thugs thub du spyad
182a4(mdo sde): pa'am/ yon bdag thams cad kyi rdzas la thugs thub du spyad pa 'am/ bdag gis yang dag pa'i chos dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / 'bras bu bzhi thob bo zhes smras
182a5(mdo sde): pa de lta bu'i las ngan pa'i rgyu nges/ kun nas nyon mong sa pa'i rgyur gyur te/ khyim nas rab tu byung na sa/ rtsa ba bzhi'i sdom pa bzhi pa dang / lci ba'i chos brgyad
182a6(mdo sde): dang / sdom pa drug dang / dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum dang / ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang / spang ba'i ltung byed sum cu dang / ltung ba dgu bcu rtsa gcig dang / so sor bshags
182a7(mdo sde): pa'i chos bzhi dang / bslab pa mang po'i chos rnams dang / shin tu zhi ba'i chos bdun rnams dang / nongs bgyis nas phas phas pa bzhi dang / mtshams med pa lnga la thag gi ba
182a8(mdo sde): du re re nas bgyis pa 'am/ yang dag pa'i chos nyid ngam/ mdo sde zab po la skur pa 'am/ 'dod chen po'i las bgyis pa yang bcabs shing gas pam nas/ nyin nag rer zhing 'a
182b1(mdo sde): bar gyur pade dag la sogs pa/ de ring skye bo mang po la sman pa'i slang du bdag cag nyid kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'gyong ming bshags pa 'am mo// ma sa'i sku
182b2(mdo sde): ngo thams cad kyis/ bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas/ sangs rgyas dang pha ma'i drin klo bar ma chung cing / rnam par byang ba'i chos ma 'chal bas mi dge ba sna tshogs bgyis pa 'am/ 
182b3(mdo sde): bdag gi rigs bsnyems pas ngang cing rgyags pa'i tshe/ mi dge ba'i las rnams bsams bzhin du bgyis kyang / nongs par ma mthong bas/ byis pa lta bur blun pa'i sug las bgyis
182b4(mdo sde): pa 'am/ mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du nye bar mchis shing / nyon mongs pas sems dkrug pas/ 'jo nga pa'i yon tan lnga la cho ga ma 'tshal to// mi dge ba'i las rnams
182b5(mdo sde): bgyis pa dang / 'gro ba bzang mos bslus pa 'am/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mdu pa sa sems dkrugs shing bskyod pa 'am/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid
182b6(mdo sde): la sogs pas rnam par bsdus pa'i srog mang po de rnams 'gyod de/ ngam lus par bshag so// yang sangs rgyas dang / dam pa'i chos dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la gus pa'i tshul
182b7(mdo sde): gyis bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa/ de lta bu'i sdig mang po de dag kun 'gyod de mthol zhing so sor bshag so// yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la
182b8(mdo sde): gus pa'i tshul gyis rim grol bgyis pa de la bu'i sdig mang po de dag kun 'gyong de mgrol zhings sor bshamaso// gti mug pas mongs shing bsgribs te/ dregs shing le lo dang / 
183a1(mdo sde): rang nyam gyis mi dge ba rnams bgyis pa de lwa bu'i sdig mang po kun 'gyod de mtshal zhings sar bshags so// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad bdag
183a2(mdo sde): gis mchod nas/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad sa bcu la gnas par bgyis te/ kun gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa nyid thugasu chud pa dang ldan par bgyis par
183a3(mdo sde): gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu dge mthong la bka' stsal pa/ leg so leg so// rgyal rigs dra ma chen po rab tu leg so// rgyal rigs dra ma chen po bdag nyid
183a4(mdo sde): kyis dge sdig gi las la rtog pa mkhas te/ 'jigs shing skrag pa chen pos 'gyod nas/ sdig pa'i las rnams mngon par bshags pa'i steng du/ sems can zad
183a5(mdo sde): kyi phyir yang mthol zhing so sor bshags pa de bas na/ khyod ni rgyal rigs dra ma chen po nyid yin te/ bdag sdig pa mi dge ba dang bral gyi steng du// sems can thams cad
183a6(mdo sde): kyang sdig pa dang bral bar byas pa dang / bdag nyid kyi phyir smon lam ma btab par/ sngar sems can gyi don du smon lam btab ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa
183a7(mdo sde): nyid thugasu chud pa dang ldan pas bsngos pas na/ khyod ni rgyal rigs dra ma chen po yang dag pa nyid yino// de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong gis mthol ring bshags
183a8(mdo sde): zin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pas bstod pa/ bcom ldan nyag cig rab kyi mchog/ khams gsum rgyan lags yab yul dang // thams cad snyoms hA
183b1(mdo sde): ye shes lags// kun la snyoms pa'i dpe ma mchis// sangs rgyas dkon mchog la phyag 'tshal// byis pas shes rab bdag phyir spyang // nor rdzas byin la lan 'dod phyir/ 
183b2(mdo sde): byams chen sangs rgyas te min te// dgra sdang nye byams snyoms mdzad pa'i// brtson 'grus che la bdag skyabs mchi// rkang gnyis kun la sangs rgyas gtso// shes rab spyan
183b3(mdo sde): ldan mkhyen gzigs khyab// lha rnams shes rab de ma 'tshal// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad la// bdag cag kun gyis gus phyag 'tshal// de bzhin sangs rgyas bdag
183b4(mdo sde): skyabs mchi// dus gsum sangs rgyas mchod byas 'dra// de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis/ rgyal bu dge mthong dang / mi sum stong la tshogasu bcad
183b5(mdo sde): de bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas chos 'di tshol 'jo nga na// thos pa mang po'i mi phyir 'brongs// dge ba sa mkhan po bzhin du bkur// sangs rgyas myur du 'grung ba
183b6(mdo sde): 'gyur// tshul khrims rnam dag srung byed na// ming ni dge slong nges pa yin// stong nyid gang gis brtag nus na// de ming rnal 'byor sgrub pa yin// brtson 'grus la las sgrub
183b7(mdo sde): nus na// de ming 'phags lam spyod pa yin// la las mya ngan 'das bsgrubs na// de ming yang dag bde ba yin// tshul khrims sdom pa'i dge tshul dang // rnam dag khrims 'dzim
183b8(mdo sde): dge slong dag/ zla ba phyed cing gso sbyong bya// chos gos brtags pa rnams bgos te// lhung bzed khar sil sogs bkur zhing / dag pas bsod snyoms gtsang blang bya// lha
184a1(mdo sde): // rnams thams cad dga' lagu ste// gus pas phyag 'tshal thal sbyar nas// lnga rnams nged kyis mi 'ang dag/ de'i yangag bzhug bsgrub par bya// dper na lnga dbang
184a2(mdo sde): byin la// sum cu rtsa gsum lnga gzhan rnams// ril gro gus pa byed bzhin bya / rab tu byung zhing tshul khri bas sdom// sangs rgyas bka
184a3(mdo sde): lan bsgrubs yin// rgyal bu dge mthong nga yang 'on// nga dang byang chub ma gtogs par// 'jig rten mi rnams thams cad kyis// bas pa rnam ngag sems bskyed // phyogs
184a4(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas rtag bzhugs par// mya ngan 'das par mngon par shes// chos dang dge 'dun de bzhin te// de lta bu'i mi rnams ni// bcom ldan bka' dri lan bslab
184a5(mdo sde): yin rang yang rgyal bu dge mthong nyon// 'jig rten mi rnam sa thams cad la// bye brag dbye ba'i sems med par/ theg pa gcig chos mngon shes te// phyogs bcur
184a6(mdo sde): ma 'das pa dang // nga mar ma 'ongs dus rnams la// sangs rgyas theg chen gcig phu las// gnyis dang gsum zhes byang med par// bye brag dbye ba'i sems med do// nga ltar mos
184a7(mdo sde): bskyed nus na// de la bu'i mi rnams ni// sangs rgyas bka' drin 'tsha ba ba yin// rgyal bu dge mthong nga yang nyon// nga na~M 'das te gshegs byin// mi'i nangs la la zhig rnasams
184a8(mdo sde): rnams pa thams cad la// sangs rgyas snying po nyid yod ces// rtag tu mos pa'i sems bskyed na// de lta bu'i mi rnams ni// bcom ldan bka' drin lan bsgrubs yin / la
184b1(mdo sde): thang cig dge spyang de// 'bras bu srid par mi bsgrub la// bla med 'bras bung bas byed na// sangs rgyas bka' drin 'tshab pa yin// nga yang rgyal bu dge mthong nyon// nga ni mya ngan
184b2(mdo sde): 'das 'og na// mi yi nang na la la dag/ dkon mi chog gsum la rim gro gus// skad cig mang sde 'di blugs te// mkhan la sring nus yon phul na// de lta bu'i mi rnams
184b3(mdo sde): ni bder gshegs drin la lan bsgru bas yin// la las nor zas snga 'ga' dang // gos dang kha zas bdog rnams kyis// kun la khyab par sbyin byas na// bcom ldan
184b4(mdo sde): bka' dron 'tshab pa yin// rgyal bu dag mthong nga yang nyon// nga mi chos 'di za ma'i tshe// la las mi 'ga' gros btab cing // thang tshig mdo sde 'ang mnyan na// byang chub sems
184b5(mdo sde): dpa' 'bum brgya la// yon phul bas ni 'di don che// theg mchog mang sde 'di lta bu// sangs rgyas byang chub yum yin pas// sangs rgyas byang chub dang
184b6(mdo sde): bsams shing // 'di la rim gro gus bskyed la// gnyis med phan tshun sems snyoms na// sangs rgyas bka' drin lan bsgrubs yin// rgyal bu dge mthong nga yang nyon// 
184b7(mdo sde): la las chos 'di tha ma'i tshe// sangs rgyas bka' drin bsgrub bsams te// thang cig bsam gtan thun zhugs na// khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams// srog
184b8(mdo sde): byin pas ni 'di don che// dge 'dun bsams gtan dkru gas skur na// khams gsum gang ba'i mi rnams dang // sems can thams cad bsang dang mtshungs// bsams
185a1(mdo sde): / dge 'dun dkrugs skur na// de'i sdig kyang de bzhi no// la las dge ba spyod mthong na// dpyad shing skur te ma mos na// dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs kyang gca
185a2(mdo sde): bcas ldan dga'adrin bsgrubs pa mi'o// de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang // mi sum sang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ mas bstan zin nas/ dga' mgu ying rangs te/ 
185a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs spyi'i la blangs so// 'phags pa rdzogs pa chen pos yongasasu rgyas pa'i mdo las phyag 'ang la ba tshig dang / 'gyong tshangs kyi le'u mi / rdzogs
185a4(mdo sde): swA/ glegs bam mang po la/ gtugs te batshan rnams ci nus gsabs so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya rata ra le bA rA pa ma hA
185a5(mdo sde): yA na sU tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin ces bya ba them pa chen po'i mdo// bas po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub
185a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad dang 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'ama'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
185a7(mdo sde): ga ya na/ ga la mgo'i ri la/ dge slong bdun khri nyis song gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen pa dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zang
185a8(mdo sde): pa nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnas par grol ba/ tsang shes pa grang ba ches pa// bya 'a byas pa/ 
185b1(mdo sde): byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba bdag gi don rje su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyong ba yong su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang
185b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa/ chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/ sems rnyed pa dang / bkur sti thams cad dang bral ba/ legs par
185b3(mdo sde): rab tu byung ba/ legs par bsnyen par rdzogs pa/ brnab pa yongasu rdzogs pa/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam la gnas pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni
185b4(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ba'o// byang chub se mas dpa' brgyad khri ba ni song gi byang chub sems dpa'i tshigs chen po dang yang thabs gcig ste/ thams cad
185b5(mdo sde): kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ thams cad mthunanyid la mngon du phyogs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
185b6(mdo sde): 'bab pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bab pa/ tshogs pa med gzungs dang ting 'dzin thob pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la shin tu gnas pa/ mngon par shes
185b7(mdo sde): pa chen pos rnam par rol pa/ lam gyi rgyun ma bcad pa/ sgrib pa dang / tshong pa dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos
185b8(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ stong pa nyid spyod yul pa/ mtshanas
186a1(mdo sde): // med pa la gnas pa/ smon lam la gnas pa thams cad bral ba/ sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad
186a2(mdo sde): la mkhas pa/ ye shes mtha' yas pa/ sems na mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ sems rgya mtsho ltar zab pa/ sems ri'i rgyal ba'i rab ltar mi skul ba/ sems pad+ma ltar ma
186a3(mdo sde): gos pa/ sems rin po che ltar shin tu yongasu dag pa/ sems gser ltar shin tu yongasu byang ba rnams/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po
186a4(mdo sde): tog dang / lag na rin po che dang / lag na phyag rgya na po che dang / rin tha man cad pan dang / gtsug na rin pa che dang / rin po che brtsegs pa dang / rin pa che 'thung
186a5(mdo sde): gnas dang / rin po che'i rtse mo dang / rin po che'i \u0f7fla mtshan dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / gser gyi snying dang / rin po che'i snying po dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / 
186a6(mdo sde): dge ba'i snying po dang / dge ba dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / ye shes kyi snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / ting 'dzin gyi snying po dang / pad+ma
186a7(mdo sde): snying po dang / rnam par grol ba'i snying po dang / kun tu zla ba dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob pa dang / kun tu bzang po dang / kun nas mig dang / pad+ma'i
186a8(mdo sde): mig dang / dri ma med pa'i mig dang / yangs pa'i mig dang kun tu spyod lam dang / kun tu mdzes dang / kun tu spyod pa'i blo gros dang / ye shes kyi zla gros dang / chos kyi
186b1(mdo sde): blo gros dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros dang / bla ma'i blo gros dang / rdo rje blo gros dang / khyad par blo gros dang / saMng+ge rnam par rol dang / sgra chen po'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang / se
186b2(mdo sde): sgra sgrogs dang / sgra dbyangs brjod pa zab po sgrog dang / gos pa med dang / dri ma kun bral dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / ye shes kyi 'od dang / ye shes kyi dpal
186b3(mdo sde): dang bzang po'i dpal dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / pad+ma'i dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa
186b4(mdo sde): bcu drug dang / byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa/ rgyal che/ 
186b5(mdo sde): bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i dbang po rgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha li'u rnams dang / lha'i bu rab 'thab bral gyi lha'i
186b6(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha'i bu yongasu dga' ldan la sogs pa/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu rab 'phru la dga' la sogs pa/ 'phrul dga'i ris kyi lha
186b7(mdo sde): bu rnams dang / lha'i bu dbang byed la sogs pa/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnapas dang / ded dpon la sogs pa dkar po'i phyogs kyi bdud kyi bu rnams dang / tsha
186b8(mdo sde): pa chen po la sogs pa tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang / lha'i bu ngadabang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang / 
187a1(mdo sde): / ma yin gyi dbang po zag zangs ris dang / stobs can dang / sgra can dang / de dag la sogs pa/ lha ma yin brgya stong phrag du ma dang / klu'i rgyal po ma
187a2(mdo sde): dros pa dang / gzi can dang / rgya mtsho dang / mtha' yas dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po brgya stong dus dang / dpal gyi gzi brjid la so/ 
187a3(mdo sde): pa klu'i rgyal po'i khye'u brgya stong du ma dang / klu'i bu mo mang po rnams dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / 
187a4(mdo sde): na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / ste 'phye chen po brgya stong ngag dang yang thabs gcig no// yang ngo'i cheg/ ya na ga ya'i mgo'i ri'i dpag tshang ba'i khor khor
187a5(mdo sde): lug du/ skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi rdul phra rab tsam yang / gang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'ab tsi dang / 
187a6(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis ma gang bar gyur pa'i sa phyogs sam/ bar snang gi phyogs de me // 'khor de lta bu 'dus shing 'khod pa'i dbus na/ btsa
187a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi seng+ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad gcig khor khor lug tu dpag chad byed pa la/ lha'i ras bcas bu brgya stong du ma ni gting / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'ing+ka
187a8(mdo sde): bas ni bla re bres/ rang gyi lnga ldi brgya stong du ma ni sbyangs/ me tog sil mas ni gtor ba zhig bshams te/ seng+ge'i khri 'i khang khor yug gi sa'i phyogs debs rdo rje la mang
187b1(mdo sde): du 'ong zhing lag mthil ltar mnyam pa dang / chag chag legs par btab pa dang / phyag dar legs par byas pa dang / dri rab tu zhim zhing lha'i me tog brgya stong du mas
187b2(mdo sde): gtor bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis yongasu longs spyad pa'i phyir phyogs den/ gser gyi pad+ma shing rta'i bang lo tsam mngab ma brgya stong du ma yod pa/ chu ba ni bairU/ 
187b3(mdo sde): snying po ni anang rnyil/ ze ba ni rdo'i snying po ste/ dri rab tu zhim zhing yid du 'ong la/ reg na dga' bar 'gyur ba dag skyes par gyur to// seng+ge'i khri de'i grwa bzhir ha cang yang mi nye ba nas
187b4(mdo sde): rin po che'i shing srid du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis/ sboms rgyang grags gsum gyis 'khor ba bzhi skyeso// sing+ge'i khri legs par bshams pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das blon
187b5(mdo sde): rab tu rnam par dag/ chos kyi 'khor lo ni rab tu bskor bdud 'ang phyir rgol ba ni bcom/ 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis ni ma gos lam bsnyengs shing mi 'tsham
187b6(mdo sde): ste/ seng+ge ltar bag tsha ba med pa/ mtsho dang 'dra bar gdang ste/ rnyog pa med cing shin tu rnam par dang ba/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar zab cing gting dpag dka' la/ rin po che'i 'brung
187b7(mdo sde): gnasu gyur pa ri rab ltar mngon par 'phags pa/ nyi ma ltar rab tu ldan pa/ zla ba ltar rab tu sim pa/ klu chen po ltar chos kyi char ba mngon par 'bebs pa/ tshangs pa chen po lta
187b8(mdo sde): 'jig rten kun las mngon par 'phags pa/ slob ma shin tu dul ba mtha' yas pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor mnga' ba/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong bye ba khrag khrig
188a1(mdo sde): / brgya stong du mas zhal du bltas shing / ma 'ongs mdung par bzhugs te/ 'khor tshogs pa der lnga pa me/ ldan de/ ldang por/ bcom ldan 'das nga ltar ldam pa
188a2(mdo sde): ldan ne ldang nge ba'i nganga'i gtsug gi gtsug tar gyi gseb nas 'od zer kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'od zer gyi 'khor brgya sdang phrag du ma yang pa byung ste/ de byung nas phyogs bcu
188a3(mdo sde): thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad snang bar byas te/ phyir 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bstar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgra
188a4(mdo sde): nas zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo phye ba 'am btsums par yang mi mngon no// 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od na mkha'i khams thams cad kyi gsab
188a5(mdo sde): du nags kyang / mamakha'i khams kyi gseng phye ba 'am ba tsums par mi mngon pa de bzhin du na 'od zer re dag zhugs kyang / bcom ldan 'das
188a6(mdo sde): zhal gyi sgo phye ba 'am/ btsums par mi mngon no// 'di lta ste dper na/ phye ma'i phung po la par ras/ 'bru bar ram/ chu zhugs na mi mngon pang bzhin du// do pa'ang zer re sa
188a7(mdo sde): zhugs kyang bye ba'am btsubs par mi mngon// de nas shar phyog su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye sa sbeng 'das pa dang / padz+ra can zhes
188a8(mdo sde): ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams den/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa bang bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen
188b1(mdo sde): pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lnga dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i spyan zhes bya ba de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
188b2(mdo sde): rnams la/ theg pa gcig la/ 'di lta ste/ theg pa gcig la brtsams nas chos ston te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing den nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa 'a
188b3(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i ming yang med sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rdzus te skye ba ma gtogs par bud med dang mngal na gnas te 'thung zhing skye ba'i sgra yang mi grag go 'jim
188b4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams de'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha sta// 'jig
188b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams den bza' ba dang btung ba dang / zas kyi bya ba yang mi shes// byang chub sems dpa' nga ngag thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi dga' ba'i za
188b6(mdo sde): can dang / ting 'dzin gyi dga' ba'i zas can dang / chos kyi dga' ba'i zas can// de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi 'od kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams de khyab cing dri ma med pa
188b7(mdo sde): gyur pa sa gtogs par 'jig rten gyi khams der zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / skar pa dang gza' rnams kyi 'od kyang mi shes// 'jig rten gyi khams de lag mthil bzhin du
188b8(mdo sde): mnyam par gyur pa las/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na rtswa dang / shing dang / dong ba dang / rtsig pa dang / ril sogs pa yang mi sna ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de 'dra ba na/ 
189a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba de'i ming thos pa tsam gyis sems can gyi sgrub pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ba
189a2(mdo sde): zhig gnas te/ de 'od des reg ste bskul nas rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de b.rin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan de ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de'i 'a
189a3(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ pad+ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dab kyang 'ong nges reg sde bskul ba dang / rang rang gi gnas
189a4(mdo sde): byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma spyan de ga la ba der song de byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ pad+ma'i snying po la
189a5(mdo sde): so so ci rigs par 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems pa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bstan las langs nas/ bla gros phrag pa
189a6(mdo sde): gcig tu bzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad+ma'i snying po la gtsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbar pa btud sa
189a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i 'od bzang po dri ma mchis pa rnam par dag pa ying du mchis pa lus dang / sems 'im tu riga' bar
189a8(mdo sde): babyung ba 'di su'i lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan des byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'dis
189b1(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu nu phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dzinas 'jim rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung mi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ mi mjed ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi
189b2(mdo sde): yod do// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul
189b3(mdo sde): ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis sems can rnams bla na med pa
189b4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las byir mi ldog par 'gyur/ bzhig bzhugs te/ des 'od bzang po dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa yid du 'ong ba lus dang sems shin tu dpal
189b5(mdo sde): bar byed pa 'di byung ngo de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / ma ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan nga la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa
189b6(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag
189b7(mdo sde): bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i sgra
189b8(mdo sde): nges/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa nges sngon bya chu
190a1(mdo sde): sams ba'i srung bzung ban/ 'as sems can su gang ngag gis bdas mngan par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pang mang zas pa ngas thams cad rnan
190a2(mdo sde): yangangs par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyi pa rdzog par shos shig ces slor mam btang po// zung chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas mas
190a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi lags/ 'jig rten gyi khams ngo'i sems can de ngag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das nges bka' stsal pa/ rigs
190a4(mdo sde): kyi bu ma yino// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sems can de dag gis de bzhin
190a5(mdo sde): pa de'i mtshan ma thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das nges bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu tho so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i ci'i slad du phyir mi ldog pa ma khags
190a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nges bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad ni phyir mi ldog pa'ang yin la/ phyir mi ldog pa'ang ma yin// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang
190a7(mdo sde): de lta bur de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa yang lags la/ phyir mi ldog pa yang ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das nges bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhir gshegs pa man
190a8(mdo sde): thas pasasems ca de ngas mi phyir tshe ldog pa'i sa bom smras pa mching ma sems can dengag byang mi ldag par zung sro te// mdza mas pa sa ngas marung ma
190b1(mdo sde): sdug par 'byung ba yang mtshanas/ dbus rnarigs kyi bu ngan zhing rab tu grub par bya ba'i phyir khyong yang ba bshang do// rigs kyi bu'ang la spong ba na/ shing la lams tsham
190b2(mdo sde): nam mas ca nyanas pa thams cad se gu m+b+ha nri nu 'aras rdzogs pa'i yang du rgya ma // rigs kyi bum can mdzes rgyas byams
190b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das zhes pa thams cad dang bral bas na/ de ni yong su rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'o// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du nge ba'in gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos
190b4(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon yod pa'i sa mas can rnams ni bla na bang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yino// de skad ces bka'
190b5(mdo sde): stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ba dra'i spyan de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas
190b6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de lta ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
190b7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la yang phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / btsun par bgyi ba dang / ri mor bgyi ba dang / bkur bsti bgyi ba dang / mtshang ba
190b8(mdo sde): 'chang mchi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bad+ma'i spyan nges/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa thams cad
191a1(mdo sde): sel pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na khyed song shig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan de la/ 
191a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de blta ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
191a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la yang phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / btsun par bgyi ba dang / 
191a4(mdo sde): ri mor bgyi ba dang / bkur bsti 'gyi ba dang / mchod par bgyi ba'i slang du mchi'i// de skad ces gsol pa dang / co ma ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan nges/ 
191a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu ngag de'i dus la dbab paran sa na khyed deng shig/ 'jig rten gyi khams dang nga
191a6(mdo sde): yod par gnas par gyis shig/ dza ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams po'i sems can re dag ni/ rab tu 'dod chags mang ba/ zhe sdang mang ba/ ga'i lug pa / 
191a7(mdo sde): dge sbyong dumi 'dzin pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ par mi 'dzin pa/ mar mi 'dzin pa/ chos ma yin pa 'dod pa mnga'/ brlang ba/ gtum pa//  gcad pa/ mu dzar skrag
191a8(mdo sde): theg can/ g.yengs pa/ brkam pa/ le lo can/ tshul khrims 'chal ba/ sdig pa'i chos can/ brag dog dang / ser sngas yongasu dkris pa/ nyon mongs pa du mas nye ba na
191b1(mdo sde): phongs par gyur pa rnams te/ sems can de 'dra ba de dag gi nang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ro chos ston to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
191b2(mdo sde): gang 'di 'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyi nang na chos ston pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dka' ba mdzad pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das nges bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// 
191b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin te/ gang 'di 'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyi nang na chos ston pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dga' ba mdzad pa yino// rigs kyi bu dag gang de lta bur
191b4(mdo sde): kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham sa na/ dge ba'i sems gcig tsam bskyed pa'i sems can de dag kyang dka' ba byed pa yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
191b5(mdo sde): gang yongasu dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sem sa can yongasu dag pa yong pa lta ci 'tshal gyi/ gang ngag de ltar kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa
191b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams de na se gol gtogs pa srid du yang dad pa rnyed pa dang / se gol gtogs pa srid du yang sangs rgyas la skyabasu 'gro ba dang / chos la skyabasu 'gro ba dang
191b7(mdo sde): dge 'dun la sgrubasu 'gro ba dang / se gol gtogs pa srid du yang tshul khrims yang dag par bzung ste/ spyod pa 'di ni ches po 'tshar to// de bas kyang gang dag se gol gtogs
191b8(mdo sde): ba srid du yang 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa'i sems yang dag par 'azung ste gnas pa 'di ni ches ngo mtshar to// de bas kyang gang dag sa gol gtogs pa srid du yang sna cheb
192a1(mdo sde): sengs nye bar 'anags// blan med ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bsgreng pa 'dzi na gyis ngo mtshang do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol
192a2(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bang gshegs pa ngo mtshar ro// de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis/ 
192a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la leg so zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das de las 'di lta bu 'thun pa'i rjesu bstan pa de mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag
192a4(mdo sde): 'tshal te/ rang rang gi gnas nas dong ngo // dong nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa'i phyir/ la las ni rin po che'i shing me tog dang bcas pa/ 'bras bu
192a5(mdo sde): bcas pa/ chu zheng du ldan pa rnams mngon par sprul/ la las ni n+datshwa'o shing rnams/ la las ni shal rgya shing rnams/ la las ni dpag bsam kyi shing rnams
192a6(mdo sde): la las ni gser gyi shing rnams/ la las ni me tog gi shing rnams/ pa las ni 'bras bu'i shing rnams/ la las ni gos kyi sprin rnams/ la las ni rgyan gyi sprin rnams/ la las
192a7(mdo sde): ni spos kyi sprin rnams/ la las ni 'phreng ba'i sprin rnams/ la las ni phye ma'i sprin rnams/ la las ni gdugs kyi sprin rnams/ la las ni rgyal mtshar gyi sprin rnam la las ni
192a8(mdo sde): sil snyan gyi sprin rnams mngon par sprul to// mngon par sprul nas gcig tu 'dus te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang lhan
192b1(mdo sde): du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ga la ba der dong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad
192b2(mdo sde): ces smra so// kye ma'o grogs po dag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams sdug bsngalo// de bas na gang gis sems can de dag thams cad bde ba mchog
192b3(mdo sde): mis bstabs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba legs par mngon par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de kun gyis len so zhes smras nas/ byang chub ses
192b4(mdo sde): dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel po'i ltar maHna to// de ras byang chub sems dpa' sprob pa thams cad rnam par sel pas/ ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par byas pa
192b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par se la pa'i lus las 'od dang ba dri ma med pa rna ma par dag pa yid du 'ong ba lus dang sems shin tu dga'
192b6(mdo sde): bar byed pa byung ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab cing snang bar gyur pa dang / gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
192b7(mdo sde): kyi khams 'di'i sems can dmyal ba pa'i lusu gnas pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i lus su gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten po'i lusu gnas pa de dag
192b8(mdo sde): 'od des reg nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang bral te/ bde zhing khro ba dang / gnod sems dang yang bral te/ phan tshun du pha mar 'du shes par gyur pa dang / yang
193a1(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzin// 'jig rten gyi bar mun pa mun nag mang du'i ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba
193a2(mdo sde): ltar dbang che bar grags pa/ 'di dag gis kyang lha me ldan ljang nger ma gyur pa/ de dag kyang 'od nges khyab nas snang bar gyur te/ gang der skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang gcig
193a3(mdo sde): gis gcig mthong ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i gang khor yug gi ri rnams dang / khor yug gi ri chen po rnams dang / ri btang zung da
193a4(mdo sde): ri btang zung chen po rnams dang / de ma yin pa'i ri nan po gzhan de dag kyang 'ong des khyab ste/ snang bar gyur pa dang / slar ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad
193a5(mdo sde): 'og tu ni mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po yan chad / de'i bar du gang 'ong nges snang bar ma byas pa'i sa phyogs de gang yang med pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul
193a6(mdo sde): mngon par bya ba mngos par byaso// de ba yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis kyang ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas pas/ zas 'dong ba'i sems can rnam
193a7(mdo sde): ni zas thob/ btung ba 'dod pa rnams ni btung ba/ gos 'dod pa rnams ni gos/ 'anor pa 'dod pa rnams no bzhon pa/ nor 'dod pa rnams ni nor thob/ long ba rnams ni mig thog
193a8(mdo sde): ba rnams ni sgra thos/ sgren po rnams ni gos can du gyur/ myos pa rnabs ni dran pa thob/ sdug bsngal ba rnams ni bde bar gyur/ sbrum pa rnams ni bde bar bcas pa/ de lta bu'i
193b1(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par bya'o// de nas sgrib pa thams cang rnam par sel ba la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad yul ga ya dang / ga ya ma
193b2(mdo sde): ga 'a dang skyes zungs pa dengam nye bar byung ma tham du song na sung rtsi po chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di tshar ma tshal dra bas khengs par kun tu sa
193b3(mdo sde): steng bi bar snang las kyang lnga'i pad+ma'i chang mngon par rab tu phab bo// lha'i me tog gi sprin rnams dang / lnga'i shing tog gi sprin rnams/ lnga'i 'phreng ba'i sprin rnams dang
193b4(mdo sde): smos kyi sprin rnams dang / lnga'i thos kyi sprin rnams nga nga/ lha'i phye ma'i sprin rnams dang / lha'i chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdar gyi sbyi
193b5(mdo sde): gyi char mngon par rab tu bab bo// de rag mngon par rab tu bab pas sems can gang la reg pa deHmas cad rab tu bde bar gyur/ yul ga ya dang / ga ya
193b6(mdo sde): ril shing tha ral pa dang / sa phyogs tha mal pa gang yod pa de dag thams cad kyang med par snang // sa phyogs de dag na rin po che'i shing rnams dang / dpag bsam
193b7(mdo sde): gyi shing rnams dang / me tog mi shing rnams dang / 'bras bu'i shing rnams dang / can ngan gyi shing rnams dang / a ga ru'i shing rnams kun tu snang ste// de dag kun tu bzang po
193b8(mdo sde): 'dug par gyur ro// bar snang ma lnga'i sil snyam ngas sgra 'byin cing / sil snyar de dag las 'dzis bu'i tshig su bcang ba 'di ngag kyang byung / sum pa'i chas rab mchog tu ba skyes
194a1(mdo sde): ma'am med ma' yang nyon mongs dbang mi 'gyur/ mamakha' mtshungs mnyam de la phyag 'tshal du ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag ljags byang chub mchog sus
194a2(mdo sde): byang chub shing ra' drung // bdud rtsi sde stobs btsam nas sangs rgyas pa// dri meng gzi ldan de la phyag 'tshal du// ribo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag ljags/ chos tshul 'di dag snam
194a3(mdo sde): smig rgyu dang // chu zla 'dra bar gang gi rdzogs gyur pa// bsod nams zhing rab de la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag ljags/ chos rnams sna tshogs 'ja' dang 'dra ba dang
194a4(mdo sde): gar la lnga 'dra gang gis rab rtogs pa// mi g.yo bsod nams gter la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lpags// gang gis bskal pa brgya phrag mang
194a5(mdo sde): bor ni// thugs rje'i thugs kyis tshogs kun rdzogs mdzad pa// dri med rnan pa de la phyag 'tshal du/ ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lcags byang chub sems
194a6(mdo sde): dba' bye ba brgya mang dang /  lha yi tshogs kyis de bzhin gang mchod pa// gti mug mun bral de la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lpags gang gi ma ga gis
194a7(mdo sde): chos kyi gter brnyes shing // thugs rje nyid kyis 'jig rten dag la btang // mnyam med par mdzad de la phyag 'tshal du ka ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag ljags
194a8(mdo sde): zhig thugs ni rtag par byams pa'i ying/ pad+ma chus ltar nyon mongs ma gos pa// yon tan mchog rab mnga' la byas 'tshal du ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag ljags
194b1(mdo sde): mtshan gyi me tog rgyas pa yongasu ngas pa'i sku// dpe byang bzang po'i 'bru chags 'gro ba'i tsho ba gang / yal ba mtha' yas rin chen shing la phyag 'tshal du// bdag cas thams
194b2(mdo sde): cang lhan cig mchod pa thogs de ljags// tshig su bcad pa 'di ngag byung ma than du/ de nas tshe drang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu
194b3(mdo sde): bzar nas// pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bder log su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
194b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sdom ma thos sngon ma mthong ba'i snga/ sa ganga' ba 'dings su'i lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa po'u
194b5(mdo sde): bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo du la gyi bu shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dzin sa 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das
194b6(mdo sde): pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba zhig yong de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i spyan zhes bya ba da ltar ba#
194b7(mdo sde): so// mtsho'o gzhes so// chos kyang ston to/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
194b8(mdo sde): sel ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan bye ba khrag khris brgya stong gang skyes bu dam pa de nyid da
195a1(mdo sde): lhan cig tu/ mi mdzad kyi 'jig rjeran gyi khams 'dir 'ongs pa de dag gi snga ltas 'di yino// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu de nas byung
195a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam pa sel pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khral khrig brgya stong phrag dums bskor cing mdun du bang ngate/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen po
195a3(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das pa la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems
195a4(mdo sde): dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyar sngar la 'ong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshogasu bcad pa 'di ngag gis mngon par bstod do// grags chen
195a5(mdo sde): shes rab chen po la// thub chen dpa' ba chen po la/ sring ba'i mya ngan rgal ba'o// nyon mongs rgal ba la b+h+yas lo// thams cad du yang tha le ste// kun nas rab tu ldan
195a6(mdo sde): bzhugs// kun nas rnam par grol ba'o// phyag 'tshal mi mtshungs batshungs med la// rab tu mi sbrul ri bo bzhin// gting tshong yang ba rgya mtsho 'dra// mu stems kun nas mi bskyong ba
195a7(mdo sde): chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshalo// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na// gzod nas ni zhing ma skyes pa// rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa yin// chos rnams mgon po khyod kyis bstan// la la lan
195a8(mdo sde): lam yang bstan// la la yang ngag nyid la bkod // la la yang dag mya ngam bzlas// la la byang chub sa bstan// bag la nyal dang bas pa nga mkhyen// khyod kyis mi mkhyen ci yang med/ 
195b1(mdo sde): de phyir 'dul ba'i bya ba rnams// gzigs pas khyod kyi bka' 'grub bo// byang chub snying por bzhugs pa na// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mus dang // dris sna tshogs gzhan rnams kyang / 
195b2(mdo sde): khyod kyi ye shes me yis bsregs// rgal nas sems can rnams sgrol zhing ka grol nas skye dgu grol mdzangaka/ srid pa'i mya ngan 'khyams pa yi// 'jig rten tshol ba khyod lagaso// 
195b3(mdo sde): srid pa'i bcom rar sems can dag yun ring mi shes gnyid log rnams// sad par mdzad pa mgon po khyod gnyen gyur khyod la phyag 'tshalo// khyod kyi sras mchog 'di dag kyang
195b4(mdo sde): thams cad byang chub skang bu zhugs// dam pa'i chos mi nyan 'tshal na// 'dren pas de dag bstan du masol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa
195b5(mdo sde): rnam par sel bas/ tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshig su bcad ba'i ngag gis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ pad+ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu
195b6(mdo sde): 'dus so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas pad+ma'i snying po la so so ci rigs par 'khongs de nas byang chub sems dpa' snyi
195b7(mdo sde): pa thams cad rnam par sel ba stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig du bzar nas pus so g.yas pa'i ldang pad+ma'i snying po la gtsugs rnga/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
195b8(mdo sde): los su thal po sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te nus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slang du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs bye na// bdag bcom ldan
196a1(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi byang
196a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtag tu skabs phyes/ de bzhin pa
196a3(mdo sde): ba la khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de nyid du lung bstan pas nga khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye ba dang / bcom ldan
196a4(mdo sde): 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa phun cu
196a5(mdo sde): tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na tshul khrims phun su ma tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na bzod pa pu na sum tshogs pa rnams lags 'ji ltar na brtson 'grus phun
196a6(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na shes rang phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na thabs mkhas pa rnams la
196a7(mdo sde): ji ltar na smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags ji ltar na ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar
196a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sa dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na chu dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na me dang mtshungs pa rnams lags ji ltar na rlung mar dang mtshungs pa rnam
196b1(mdo sde): lags/ ji ltar na na mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na zla ba sams rnams lags/ ji ltar na nyi ma dang mtshungs pa lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na seng+ge lta bu rnams lags
196b2(mdo sde): ji ltar na dul ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na cang shes pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na pad+ma lta bu rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams lags
196b3(mdo sde): ji ltar na sems rnam par dag pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na sems nem nur ma mchis pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho lta bu rnams lags
196b4(mdo sde): ji ltar na blo zhib pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rigs pa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ ji ltar na grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ ji
196b5(mdo sde): ltar na rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ ji ltar na sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ 
196b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' tshig bzung ba rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rjod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na chos kyi rjes 'brang ba rnams lags/ 
196b7(mdo sde): ji ltar na chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na mtshan ma med pa
196b8(mdo sde): gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na smon lam la gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams lags ji ltar na byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams lags/ ji ltar na snying rje'i bdag nyid
197a1(mdo sde): can rnams lags/ ji ltar na dga' ba la gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na btang stoms la gnas pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon
197a2(mdo sde): bar shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi sems ma stor ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na re rabs
197a3(mdo sde): dran pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na sdig pa'i grogs po yongasu spangs pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems
197a4(mdo sde): dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos 'ang thob par 'gyur/ ji lam ma khris rdo rje lngar sra ba rnams lags/ bcom lnga na 'das ji lta na byang chub sems dpa' deng dpon rnams
197a5(mdo sde): lags/ ji ltar na lam la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar ngan lam ma log par ston pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par
197a6(mdo sde): sems mnyab bar bzhag pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na chos gos gsum pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na bying
197a7(mdo sde): ba can rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod snyoms pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na stan gcig pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na zas byis mi len pa rnams lags
197a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na shing drung ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na bla gab med pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na dur khrod pa pral sra
197b1(mdo sde): ji lta par cog pu pa rnams lags/ ji ltar nag ni ji bzhin pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor skyong ba rnams lags/ ji ltam na mang sde 'dzin
197b2(mdo sde): pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams lags/ ji ma na cho ga dang spyod yul dang spyong las phun sub tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji wAr na ser snga dang phra rog dang bral ba rnam
197b3(mdo sde): lags/ ji ltar na sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro 'gying mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na nga rgyal
197b4(mdo sde): bcom pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na ngang pa mang ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na kun rdzob la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na don dam pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na rten cing 'brel
197b5(mdo sde): par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na bdag she sa pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na 'jig rten shes pa rnam sa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems
197b6(mdo sde): dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par skye/ ji ltar na mang la gyi drims ma gos par skye/ ji ltar na khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na 'tshol
197b7(mdo sde): yongasu dag pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na yid yong su mi skyo ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dka' bzhin bgyid pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na bzhin 'dzum zhing
197b8(mdo sde): khro gnyer ma mchis pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na mang du thos pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams lags/ 
198a1(mdo sde): / ji ltar na brgya byin pang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong bas bsu ba rnams lags/ ji lngar na bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba 'tshal ba rnams lags ji ltar na sems can
198a2(mdo sde): yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i cho ga 'tshal ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na nges pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na 'grogs pa bde ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa
198a3(mdo sde): rnams lags/ ji ltar na tshul du shis pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na gnas bca' ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na bsod nams
198a4(mdo sde): bgyi ba la brtson pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na sprul pa la mkha sa pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
198a5(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems pa pa sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
198a6(mdo sde): ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu leg so leg so// yang rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo
198a7(mdo sde): phal po che dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod 'di lta bu'i don 'di zar sems pa legasaso// rigs kyi bu nga
198a8(mdo sde): phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad // bcom ldan 'das leg so zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/ bcom ldan
198b1(mdo sde): 'das kyi ltang mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di sad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams
198b2(mdo sde): yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs
198b3(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ snying rdzoba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi brnyas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum
198b4(mdo sde): tshogs pa rnams yin/ bsti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mchod pa dang rim gro'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum cho
198b5(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ yongasu dag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yino// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi
198b6(mdo sde): bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' zang zing med pa'i sems kyi sa chos rnams 'dzin cing / kun chub par byed de/ rnyed pa dang / bkur bsngo'i phyir ma yin/ shes kyi khe 'dod pa'i
198b7(mdo sde): phyir ma yin/ grags pa 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin/ gzhan du na de 'di ltar sems can 'di dag gi sdug bsngal thams cad ji ltar zad par bya snyam ste/ chos de dag kyang zang zing
198b8(mdo sde): med pa'i sems kyis gnyi su med par gzhan dag la yang yang dag par ston to// ji ltar rgyal po ma blon po la yang yang dag par ston pa de ltar gdol ba'am/ gdol bul
199a1(mdo sde): yang yang dag par sdom pa de ma yin pa grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi gzhan dag la lnga ci smos chos kyi smin pa nges khengs par yang mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi
199a2(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yino// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa'i sbyir pa bun sum chags pa yin 'am/ rigs
199a3(mdo sde): bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bdag gis dbyig pa bor ba dang / mtshon cha bor ba yin te/ gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid laM gzhog go// de sems can thams cad la radu
199a4(mdo sde): shes pa yin/ mar 'du shes pa yid bur 'du shes pa yi ma rtsa lag du 'du shes pa yin/ nye bu'am/ snam mi gnyen mtshams ngag kyang rung bar 'du shes pa yino//  ci'i phyir
199a5(mdo sde): zhe ma nge 'di snyam du sems te nge bzhi ma gshegs pas kya nga skye ba 'pho ba de dang de dag du/ sems can gyi sa su gang khyed kyi pha 'am ma 'ab bu 'am rtsa lar
199a6(mdo sde): gam nye pu'am/ snag gi gnyen mtshams gang yang rung ba'i gnasum gyur pa'i sems can de lta bu ma ngo zhes gsung so snyam nas de srog chas su gyur pa phra mo'i phyir yang bdag kyis
199a7(mdo sde): sha ngag gis kyang phan 'dogs pa na srog chags chen po che ba ba'am ngas la lnga ci spos te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'joms pa smis pa phu sum tshogs pa yimo
199a8(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dbang sems can gang dag mi dge ba'i las rab tu byed pa
199b1(mdo sde): mthong na/ de dag zang zing gis sdang cing zang zing gis bsdus nas myi dge ba'i gnas de nas blangs te dge ba'i gnasu 'god do/ de yang 'di snyam du sems te bcom ldan 'das kyis
199b2(mdo sde): kyang sbyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chu'o// byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa ni/ mi dge ba'i chos phrang dog dang ser sna dang ngam sems gsum spangs pa yino zhes gsu
199b3(mdo sde): ngobs rang dag gis de bzhir gshegs pa'i rjesu bslab cing sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o sA pa ste/ de sbyin pa yang spyin zhing sbyis pa des langs par yang mi 'gyur te/ de lngar na byang chu
199b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' zang zing gi sbyin pa phum rgyam tshobs pa min na byang chub sems dpa' la bam du 'am mas pa la ma mdza' gyur ba phun su ma rigs pa yin na byang
199b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sbyir pa sbyin pa yang / 'dod pa'i phyir sbyin pa mi sbyin pam ngos su re ba'i phyir ma yin ngon rgya phyir ma yin na yog ni phyir ba yin/ 'dzim rten
199b6(mdo sde): tshul gyi phyir ma yin gyi gzhan du na 'di snyam du sems te gang byang chub sems dpa' spyir ba'i ngang tshul can du 'gyur ba 'di ni chos nyid yin/ sA ma ste de rmyang dang rkyen de dang
199b7(mdo sde): gzhi nges par btags pa'i lam du phan 'dogs pa thams cad la mi re bar smin pa/ sbyin par byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'i sbyim
199b8(mdo sde): pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yim chen 'di la byang chub sems dpal sems can sdug bsngal
200a1(mdo sde): dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / gcer bu dang / gos ngan pa dang / bgo ba ngan pa dang / mgon med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa dang / skyabs med pa dang / gan
200a2(mdo sde): med pa dang / rten med pa lta bu bsod nams med pa dag mthong mthong na/ de dag la snying rje ba'i sems rab tu sbeng cing nge 'di sA ba du sems te/ sems can gang ngag gi phyir/ bad
200a3(mdo sde): gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag ni sdug bsngal ba mgon med pa/ dpung gnyen med pa/ skyabs med pa/ gnas med pa// 
200a4(mdo sde): med pa 'di dag yin te/ kun tu 'khyam na nam zhig bdag sem sa can de dag gi lagan dang / dpung gnyen dang / s+yA bas dang / gnas dang / rten du 'gyur sA pa nas
200a5(mdo sde): snying rjes rab tu mi zad de/ bdog cing yod pa'i dngos pos sems can de dag la phan 'dog so// phan btags pa'i maung la skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nges kyang / khengs par
200a6(mdo sde): mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yino// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mo brnyas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin
200a7(mdo sde): zhen byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ bor ba'i sbyin po mi sbyin/ brnyas shing sbyin pa sa sbyin/ gshe zhing sbyid pa mi sbyin/ sngon spangs shing sbyin pa mi sbyi// phyug pas rgyags
200a8(mdo sde): shing dregs te sbyin pa mi sbyin/ grags pa 'dod cing sbyin pa mi sbyid/ yang du thos pas rgyags shing dregs pas sbyin pa mi stun+da n+ya/ tsaM smin pa de yang bsti skang du byas shing / sbyin pa
200b1(mdo sde): sbyin par bye'o// btsun par byas shing sbyin pa sbyin par bye'o// ri mor byas te mchod cing rang gi lag nas sbyin pa sbyin par bye// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa
200b2(mdo sde): sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' srisang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin na na/ byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon dang / mkhan pa dang / 
200b3(mdo sde): bla ma lta bu dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag mthong na/ lus kyis gus pa pang bcas pa yin/ sems kyis ri mo dang bcas pa yin te/ des gus pa skyed ri mo bskyes nas
200b4(mdo sde): bus par sba ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsdu ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / gdung pa'i las ngag bye // de dag gis dge ba dang ldan pa'i bya ba de dang de dag la 'ang grog su 'gyur
200b5(mdo sde): te/ nge lngar na byang chub sems dpa' sti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin// ji ltar ra byang chub sems da pa'i mchod pa dang rim gro'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs
200b6(mdo sde): pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la bya ba de dag byed// ji ltar na sangs rgyas la bya ba dag byed ce na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
