229a4(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de'i stobs la/ gang stobs kyis thub pa'i sems na de lta bu sems can gyis ris na med de/ de ltar
229a5(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' mi tshugs pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang
229a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpas ma bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa de gang yang med de// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi stobs
229a7(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa yin// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yid zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ma gtog
229a8(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang / yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ma mthong ba dang mngon du ma byas pa dang / khong du ma chung ba de dag med/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi
229b1(mdo sde): stobs phun sum tshogs pa yi no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor tshul khrims nyams pa ma
229b2(mdo sde): yin/ lta ba nyams pa ma yin/ cho ga nyams pa ma yin/ 'tsho ba nyams pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs par spyod pa rnams nyid yin
229b3(mdo sde): te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yino// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang
229b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi yul thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi yul thams cad zil gyis non te/ de yang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs
229b5(mdo sde): bskyed pa mchog gis zil gyis gnon te/ de 'dong na 'dzam bu'i gling skra 'ag ma gcig gi rtse mo la 'jog go// de bzhin du gling bzhi pa dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams
229b6(mdo sde): dang stong gnyis dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang de bzhin no// 'dod na gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab gcig la 'jog/ dbazhi
229b7(mdo sde): dugad+hA klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyeng dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu nas brjod du med pa'i yang gang+gA'i klung gi byes
229b8(mdo sde): snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab gcig la 'jog kyang / rdul phra rab de la gang ba dang / bri bar yang mi mngon te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de rnams kyang phan tshun du 'dod par mi
230a1(mdo sde): // 'gyur/ sems can de rnams la gnod par yang mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yino// ji ltar na byang chub sems
230a2(mdo sde): dpa' dbang gi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod na/ song gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis gang bar byin
230a3(mdo sde): rlob bo// de 'dod na brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongasu gang bar byin gyis rlob ste// de ltar na byang chub sems
230a4(mdo sde): dpa' dbang gi stobs phun sum tshogs pa min// dzi/ ran byang chub sems dpa' gzungs hU~M stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin ne na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brjod dus
230a5(mdo sde): pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/ ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig don tha dad par nga/ tshig dang yi ge tha dad pa dang / brjod pa tha dad pa dang / tshu
230a6(mdo sde): tha dad pa'i chos bshad pa de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' skad cig yud tsam thang cig gcig la thams cad 'dzin par byed/ khong du chung bar byed/ sgom par byed de// de ltar na byang chub
230a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' gzungs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yino// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ de bzhin
230a8(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpas byin gyi rlabs byin du brlabs pa la gang rnam par 'khrugs par byed pa'i sems
230b1(mdo sde): de lta ru/ sems can gyi ris na med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub
230b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' bka' mi gcog pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ thabs mkhas pa ma gtogs par gang byang chub sems dpa'i bka' bcog pa'i sems can de d+ha/ 
230b3(mdo sde): sems can gyi ris na ma mthong ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bka' mi gcon pa'i spobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu por dag dang ldanas
230b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' ye shes phan sum tshogs pa yin no// bcu gang ni
230b5(mdo sde): na 'di lta ste/ gang zag la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ chos la bdag me nga ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin// nyi tshe ba ma
230b6(mdo sde): yin pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ ting 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams
230b7(mdo sde): yin/ mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ lhun gyis grub
230b8(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum
231a1(mdo sde): // tshogs pa rnams yino// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gang zag la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin ne na/ rigs kyi
231a2(mdo sde): 'di la byang chub sems dpas phung po rnams skye ba yang yang dag par mthong / 'jig pa dang / 'gog pa yang yang dag par mthong ngo // des phung po skye ba rnams snying po med pa dang / 
231a3(mdo sde): byed pa med pa dang / gsog du yang dag par mthong / phung po 'gag pa rnams 'jig par yang dag par mthong ste/ de 'di snyam du phung po 'di dag ni bdag med pa/ sems can med bsro
231a4(mdo sde): meng pa/ gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa yin mo dkyi/ 'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa 'di dag ni/ 'di ltar bdag cag gi phung
231a5(mdo sde): rnams bdag go// bdag cag gi phung po rnams la ba ngag yod ngo // bdag cag gi bdag la phung po rnams yong ngo // bdag cag gi bdag ni phung po can no snyam ste// de nga
231a6(mdo sde): bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par bzhen pas/ de kho na nyid khong du ma chung ngo // de kho na nyid khong du ma chung bas mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar 'khor ba na 'khyamo snyam du sems shing / de
231a7(mdo sde): kyang byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gang zag la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yino// ji
231a8(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos su sgro 'dogs pa dang / chos la skur pa yang yang ngag pa
231b1(mdo sde): lnga ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de 'di snyam du glo bur du byung ba'i chos la kun brtags pa'i ming bdags te/ chos de yang de'i jo bo nyid ma min/ yi ge de ngag kyang ngo ngango bo nyid ma min
231b2(mdo sde): mod kyi/ 'di ni ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam du bya'o// 'di la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o// glo bur du byung ba'i chos de yang thams cad kyi thams cad du med pa ma yin te/ gzhan
231b3(mdo sde): gyi rkyen dang gzhan gyi rkyen la sdong pa dang / gzhan gyi rkyen rnams kyis 'byung zhing rkyen dang bral na 'gag pa'i chos 'dzi ni yang zhes de thams cad byang chub sems dpas yang dag
231b4(mdo sde): lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chums dpa' chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yino// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyi chebam
231b5(mdo sde): yin pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ bya nga chub sems dpa' nyi tshe ba'i ye shes skad cigs/ cig la 'jug cing skad cig gnyis pa la mi 'jug pa ma yin
231b6(mdo sde): gyi byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes mthong ba ni/ skad cig thams cad la thogs pa med par 'jug ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i ye shes phun sum tsho/ 
231b7(mdo sde): pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi ting 'dzin rnams kyang
231b8(mdo sde): rab tu shes/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shes/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kya
232a1(mdo sde): / rab tu shes so// des ting nge 'dzin gang dang ting 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la nyan thos spyod pa de yang rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzin gang dang ting 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la/ 
232a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas spyod pa yang rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzin gang dang ting 'dzin gyi spyod yul gong la byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa de yang rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzin gang dang ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod
232a3(mdo sde): yul gang la de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa de yang rab tu shes te/ de bzhin gshegs pas skabs phye nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu shes kyi/ rnam par smin pas grub
232a4(mdo sde): pas rang gi ye shes kyis ni ma yin no// ting 'dzin gzhan rnams ni rnam par smin pas grub pa'i rang gi ye shes kyis rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ting nge
232a5(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byin gyi rlabs kyi ye she sa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sa
232a6(mdo sde): dpas nyan thos kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes rang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyang ji
232a7(mdo sde): lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes na/ sems can de ma yin pa gzhan dag gi lnga ci smos te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yino// ji ltar na byang
232a8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mi 'phrog pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zher/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes ni mu stegs can thams cad dang / bdud thams cad dang / nyan thos
232b1(mdo sde): dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yino// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
232b2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi spyod ba la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yong su dag pa/ dang zhing rnyog pa med pas sem
232b3(mdo sde): can gyi khams la rnam par lta ste/ des de na sems can la la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag dang / la la byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa dag dang / la la byang chub kyi sems
232b4(mdo sde): bsgrubs pa dag dang / la la byang chub kyi sems ma bsgrubs pa dag dang / la las dang po la gnas pa dag dang / la las bcu pa'i bar la gnas pa dag dang / ma la mngon par
232b5(mdo sde): rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dag dang / la la mngon par rdzog/ sa par sangs rgyas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba ngag dang / la la bya ba kun byas te yongasu mya ngan las
232b6(mdo sde): 'da' ba dag dang / la la nyan thos kyi theg pas yongasu mya ngan las 'a' ba dag dang / la la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba dag dang / la la bde 'gror skye ba
232b7(mdo sde): ngag dang / la la ngan 'gror skye ba dag mthong ngo // de ltar sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lnga ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyong ba la
232b8(mdo sde): rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpe
233a1(mdo sde): // spyod pa 'am/ 'greng ba 'am/ 'dug pa 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba na lhun gyis grub cing ye shes 'byung ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ mi gnyid kyi log pa'i dbugs 'byung ba
233a2(mdo sde): dang rngub pa dag ldan gyis grub cing 'byung // byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes de yang de bzhin du blta'o// ye shes de yang thams cad du mi chags par 'jug ste// de ltar na byang chu
233a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yi no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 
233a4(mdo sde): 'di la byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad mtshan nying mtshungs par yang rab tu shes/ mtshan nyid gcig par yang rab tu shes/ mtshan nyid du mar yang rab tu shes/ 
233a5(mdo sde): rgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang rab tu shes/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid du yang ra tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos tha~Mng
233a6(mdo sde): kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 
233a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' zag pa med pa'i ye shes 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa dang ldan pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
233a8(mdo sde): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yino// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// 
233b1(mdo sde): na mtsham ldan/ bas pa gsas pa/ rigs kyi thams bca nga ldanan/ byang chubamams dpangs dang sardungs pa rnams med// bcug pa dang/ sa
233b2(mdo sde): shing tshang med pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa rnams yin/ gnod pa dang lan du phan 'jogs pa dang / bral ba rnams yin/ cho saM tsa sbyin
233b3(mdo sde): chen po kun zad pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas gyur pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa rnams yin/ rin po che'i snod du
233b4(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ rtsi chen po'i sdong du gyur pa rnams yin/ mi sprul pa rnams yin/ mi spangs pa rnams yino// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na/ byang chub semamo pa
233b5(mdo sde): yangs shing chang med pa yinanan/ tshogs kyi ji ga sa bar na/ ma chen po ni thams cad meng // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa
233b6(mdo sde): ya 3 bam masakyi tshogs kyi sa yang snang pa sa su byang chub sa // 
233b7(mdo sde):  tsho ra byung ma nan/ lags kyi tha napa sa brgyang sa sa
233b8(mdo sde): cad kyi 'tsha bar byung ba 'das bzhin du byang chubasams dpa' yang tsun pa dang / tshul rnams dang / bdong pa pa/ bcon thus dang / bsams
234a1(mdo sde): pa byang chub kyi tshogs rnams dang / phan par 'gyur ba'i yo byad rnam pa du ma de dang de dag gis sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub
234a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnod pa dang / lan du phan 'dogs pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rig
234a3(mdo sde): kyi bu dper na/ sa chen po ni gnod pas kyang ni 'gras par mi 'gyur/ phan pas kyang rjes su chags par mi 'gyur te/ de la gnyisu 'du shes pa mi 'byu // de bzhin du byang chub
234a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' yang gnod pa dag gis kyang ni 'gras par mi 'gyur/ phan 'jogs pa dag gis kyang sa su chags par mi 'gyur te/ de ni sems can de dag la chags
234a5(mdo sde): pa dang / khong khro ba yang mi skye ste/ de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' gnod pa dang / lan du phan 'dogs pa dang bral ba yino// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi
234a6(mdo sde): sprin chen po kun zed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po ni sprin chen po las bab pa'i chu'i klung chen po kun zeng ngo nge/ bzod cing kun 'dzin to// de bzhin du byang
234a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sprin chen po las chos kyi 'ong ba chen po rab tu phab pa kun zad cing bzod la 'dzin to// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
234a8(mdo sde): chos kyi sprin chen po kun zed ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi gnasu gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po ni sem
234b1(mdo sde): can thams cad 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i gnasu gyur pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad kyi bde 'gro dang mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i gnas
234b2(mdo sde): gyur pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi gan su gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa yin
234b3(mdo sde): zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa bon thams cad ni sa bon chen po'i gzhir gyur pa las skye'o// de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon thams cad kyang
234b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i gzhir gyur pa las skye ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa yin// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i
234b5(mdo sde): sdong du gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po ni rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi snod yin te/ sa chen po la rin po che sna tshogs kun snang // 
234b6(mdo sde): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yon tan rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi snod du gyur pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' la yon tan rin po che sna tshogs kun snang ste// de ltar na
234b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i sdong du gyur pa yino// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rtsi chen po'i snod du gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rtse chen po gang dag
234b8(mdo sde): nang rnam pa sna tshogs zhi bar 'gyur ba dag kyang sa chen po la gnas te 'jig rten na snang // de bzhin du gang dag gis nyon mongs pa'i nang rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams zhi bar 'gyur
235a1(mdo sde): / ba'i chos kyi rtsi chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' la gnas shing 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rtsi chen po'i snod du gyur pa yin no// 
235a2(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi sprul ba yin ne na/ rigs kyi bu 'di sa sde dper na/ sa chen po ni 'di ltar sha spyang dang sbrang bu dang / rlung dnga'i ma dang / sbrul gyis reg pa'i sdug bsngal pa
235a3(mdo sde): cad kyis mi skul ba yino// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad las byung ba'i phyi nang gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis po sprul ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub
235a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' mi sprul ba yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi spangs pa yin de na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lnga ste dper na/ sa chen po ni glang po che'i rgyal po 'am/ ri dgas kyi
235a5(mdo sde): rgyal po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra thos kyang mi skrag/ mi dang dang bar mi 'gyuraro// de bzhin du byang chub sem sa pa' yang bdud dang su stegs thams cad kyi sgra thos na ma
235a6(mdo sde): spagang mi dngang dngangs par mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi dngang ba yino// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sa chen po nga
235a7(mdo sde): mtshungs pa rnams yino// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chu dang mtshungs pa yino// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos la gzhol ba rnams yin/ dka
235a8(mdo sde): po chos thams cad skyed pa rnams yin/ dga' ba dang ngang pa dang rangs pa'i gsher ba can rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad srul ba rnams yin/ ngang zhing rnyog pa med
235b1(mdo sde): gsal ba rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i yong su gdung ba thams cad rab tu ni bar byed pa rnams yin/ 'dod pa la sreng ba zlog pa rnams yin/ zab cing gcing dpag dka' ba rnams yin
235b2(mdo sde): mthon dman 'gengs pa rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa rnams yin// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i chos la gzhol ba
235b3(mdo sde): yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chu ni gzhol bar 'gro ba dang / gzhol bar rgyu ba yin// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang dge ba'i chos la gzhol zhing / dge ba'i chos
235b4(mdo sde): kyi phyir rgyu ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos la gzhol ba yino// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dkar po'i chos thams cad skyed pa yin zhe na/ 
235b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chu ni rtswa dang ni dgel pa dang rtsi dang nags tshal thams cad skyed/ sa pa rnams kyang byir zhing rgyas par byed do// de bzhin du bya
235b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yang ting 'dzin gyi chus byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad rnab par bskyed do// skyes pa rnams kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing du gyur gyi bar du phyir
235b7(mdo sde): zhing rgyas par byed// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing du gyur pa dag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis sems can rnams 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ de
235b8(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dkar po'i chos thams cad bskyed pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang ngang pa dang rangs pa'i gsher ba can yin zhe na/ rigs
236a1(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chu ni ngo bo nyid kyis gsher ba can yin te/ gzhan yang gsher bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ngo bo nyid kyi
236a2(mdo sde): dga' ba dang dad pa dang rangs pa'i gsher ba can yin te/ sems can gnan yang dga' ba dang ngang pa dang rangs pa'i gsher ba can du bye'o// de la dga' ba ni 'jig rten las
236a3(mdo sde): 'das pa'i chos tshol ba'o// ngang pa ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la rten pa'o// rangs pa ni gang sems dag pa ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang
236a4(mdo sde): dang ba dang / rangs pa'i gsher ba can yino// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad srul ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di las
236a5(mdo sde): dper na/ tshuni shing gi rnam pa dang / rtsa'i rnam pa'i rtsa bang ga gi rgyun rnams su'o// de bzhin du byang chub sa mas dpa' slom pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chus
236a6(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad srul te/ ji ltar na nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun 'di ngag ni ming yang mi shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i dri nga ba'i chags kyang med par
236a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de lta bur srul te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad srul pa yino// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dang zhing rnyog pa med
236a8(mdo sde): gsal ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chu ni rang bzhin gyis dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsalo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang rang bzhin gyis dang ni
236b1(mdo sde): rnyog pa med de gsal ba yin no// de la bag la nyal dang kun nas ldang ba dang bral bas na dang ba'o// 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang bral bas na rnyog pa med pa'o// 
236b2(mdo sde): dbang po rab tu dang bas na gsal ba ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dang zhing rnyog pa me de gsal ba yinano// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i yongasu
236b3(mdo sde): gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chu ni sa chen po dpyid kyi tsha bas gdung ba dang / de las gzhan yang sems can rnams dpyid kyi tshabs
236b4(mdo sde): gdungs pa rnams rab tu ni par byed do// de bzhin dudabyu chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pas gdungs pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad chos kyi nus pa
236b5(mdo sde): tun bar byed de// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon/ mongs pa'i yong su gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed par/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa la sred pa
236b6(mdo sde): zlog pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chu ni skom pas nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi sgom pa rnam par zlog go// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yul la
236b7(mdo sde): sred pas nyen pa'i sems can nyen par gyur pa dag la gang gis sems can de dag gi yul la sred pa ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bu chos kyi char mngon par 'bebs te/ de la
236b8(mdo sde): na byang chubasams dpal 'dod pa la sreng brnog par byeng // ji sar nga byang chub sems dpa' rab cing gting bag dga' ba yin ne na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta dper na/ chu'i
237a1(mdo sde): ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yang dag par grub pa yang 'di lnga ste bdud thams cad dang / mu stegs thams
237a2(mdo sde): cad kyis gting dpag dka' zhing zab pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yino// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mthon dman bgengs pa yin
237a3(mdo sde): zhe na rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chu'i klung ni sa phyogs mngon dman 'geng so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi chu klung gis sems can gyi khams mthon ngas
237a4(mdo sde): 'gengs te/ ji ltar na chus 'gengs pa ltar sems can la gnod par byed pa de lta bu/ byang chub sems dpa' ma yin gyi/ sems can de rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir chos kyi chu
237a5(mdo sde): klung 'bebs shing de dag la gnod par mi byed de// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mthon dman 'gengs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa
237a6(mdo sde): rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'a ngi la ste dper na/ chus ni sa'i phyogs skam zhing / rdul 'thul ba thams cad snum par byed cing rdul dengs
237a7(mdo sde): bar byeda'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can sems rtsub pa rnams 'di lta ste/ shes rab la gnas pa'i ting 'dzin gyi chus sems snum par byed cing / sems can
237a8(mdo sde): de dag gi nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu ni bar byed de/ rtsub pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yino// rigs kyi bu chos
237b1(mdo sde): bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chu dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan da/ byang chub sems dpa' me dang mtshungs pa rnams yino// bcug
237b2(mdo sde): zhe na 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i phyag dar khung thams cad kyang bsreg par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang yong su smin par byed/ 'on mongs pa'i 'jam thams cad kyang skam
237b3(mdo sde): bar byed/ me'i phung po dang 'dra ba rnams yin/ snang bar gyur pa rnams yin/ skrag par byed pa rnams yin/ dbugs 'byin pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyu
237b4(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ mchod pa byed pa rnams yin/ mi brnyas pa rnams yi no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i phyag dang khung thams cad sreg ce na ra
237b5(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mes ni phyag dar khung dang rtswa dang / shing nga dgel ba dang / rtsi dang sdong po thams cad sreg go// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis
237b6(mdo sde): bag la zhal dang / kun nas ldang ba dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa'i phyag dar khung thams cad sreg ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs
237b7(mdo sde): pa'i phyag dang khung thams cad sreg pa yino// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yong su smin par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mon lo rto/ 
237b8(mdo sde): dang rtsi dang sdong po'i rnam pa thams cad yongasu smin par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis nang gi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yong su smin par byed pa
238a1(mdo sde): / yang / ji ltar 'jig par mi 'gyur ba de ltar yong su smin par bye'o// de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yong su smin par byed pa'o// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa
238a2(mdo sde): na mongs pa'i 'angam thams cad snyam par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu 'dis su dper na/ mes ni chu bran gyi'angam thams cad skam par byed// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes
238a3(mdo sde): rab kyis zag pa tshan mongs pa'i 'angs thams cad sem par byed de// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa tshan mongs pa'i 'angam thams cad snyam par bya'o// ji lngar na byang chub sems
238a4(mdo sde): me'i phung po dang 'dra ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sems can grang ba'i nad kyis nyen pa rnams kyi grang ba med par bya ba'i phyir/ mo'i phung po byed do// de
238a5(mdo sde): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang / nyon mongs ba'i grang ba'i nad kyis btab pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i grang ba'i nad med par bya ba'i phyir/ shes
238a6(mdo sde): rab kyis rab tu dro bar byed// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de'i phung po dang 'dra ba yino// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snang bar gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lnga ste dper na
238a7(mdo sde): gangs kyi rtse mo 'am/ ri bin nga'i rtse mo mamo'i phung po chen po 'bar ba nges dpag tshad gcig khor khor yug du snang bar byed/ dpag tshad ga'is khor khor yus pang / rabs chang
238a8(mdo sde): gsum khor lor yug du snang bar bye'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ye shes kyi sdang bas dpag tshad brgyar yang khyab par byed// dpag tshang stong du yang khyab par byed/ 
238b1(mdo sde): dpag chang song phrag brgyar yang khyab par byed pa nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu bang ba grangs med pa'i bar du yang khyab par byas nas/ sems can thams cad la ye shes
238b2(mdo sde): snang bar byed de/ ye shes kyi sdang ba des mi shes pa'i mun pa bud gnag thams cad rnam par sel to// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snang bar gyur pa yino// ji ltar na byang
238b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' skrag par byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ri dgas khro bo 'am/ ri dwags kyi rgyal po khro bos me'i phung po chen po mthong na/ skrag rab tu skrag shin
238b4(mdo sde): tu sbag par gyur cing / 'di lta ste/ me'i 'jigs pas skrag pas gnas te/ de ring ba bas kyang shin tu ring bar spong ngo // de bzhin du bdud rnams sam/ bdud kyi ris kyi
238b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas/ skrag rab tu skrag shin tu skrag par gyur cing / 'dzin/ ste gzi brjid chung ba'i phyir/ gang du byang chub sems
238b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi ming yang mi thos na/ mthong ba lta smos kyang ci smos par/ ring ba bas kyang shin tu ring bar sa'i phyogs de yongasu spyong ngo // de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skrag pa byed
238b7(mdo sde): ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mi la la zhig 'brog dgon par 'khyams pa las me'i phung po chen
238b8(mdo sde): po mthong ste/ de de logasu song ba dang / des ni grong ngam/ rdzi'u brang mthong nas/ de shugs phyin te/ rab tu dathugs phyin nas/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro/ 
239a1(mdo sde): / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'khor ba'i 'brog mgon par 'khyams pa'i sems can rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong na/ shugs phyin
239a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ rab tu dbugs phyin par 'gyur/ nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa yino// ji
239a3(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ me ni sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa ste/ ji lta
239a4(mdo sde): na rgyal po la phan par nye bar gnas pa ltar gdol bu la yang de bzhin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad kyi thun mngo du gyur pa yin
239a5(mdo sde): te ji ltar na rgyal po la phan par nye bar gan sa pa ltar gdol bu la yang de bzhin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi thun mongs
239a6(mdo sde): du gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la sbe dper na/ me la ni bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul
239a7(mdo sde): gyi mi rnams kyis mchod ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/ lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis ston par 'du shes pas ma
239a8(mdo sde): de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya ba yino// ji ltar na mi brnyas pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ me sdug chung ngu yang 'tshig pa'i bdag nyid
239b1(mdo sde): yin pas na mi brnyas pa yi no// de bzhin du mos pas spyod pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mthu stobs ma rnyed pa theg pa chen po la las dang po pa yang / lha dang / mi dang / 
239b2(mdo sde): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis ma brnyas pa min// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ g+ha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri zadang lha ma yin rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'angang
239b3(mdo sde): mi thogs par byang chub la 'dug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar khong du chud de// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi
239b4(mdo sde): brnyas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' me dang mtshungs pa rnams yino// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
239b5(mdo sde): dpa' rlung mar lta bu rnams yino// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas med par spyod pa dang spyod yul du na tu mu med pa dang / sems can nga rgyal gyis snyems pa'i
239b6(mdo sde): rtse mo 'khor zhing 'jig la rab tu rnyil bar byed pa dang / chos kyi char sprin chen po kun skyed pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / 
239b7(mdo sde): chos dkar po lus 'thun par 'byung ba'i ngabugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa'i srog nye bar sbyor ba dang / chos kyi char sprin dpag tu med pa kun 'dzin pa dang / chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i
239b8(mdo sde): gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yong su 'god pa dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsams kyi shing las shin tu byung ba'i/ 
240a1(mdo sde): // chos kyi gtam yang dag pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog ming du 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa dang / bskal pa grangs med par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor
240a2(mdo sde): yongasu bsags pa ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang 'ong dang / zla ba dang nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul dang / nags tshal dang / khang pa dang / 
240a3(mdo sde): ba'i 'khor yug ri la sogs pas yong su bskor ba'i/ sems can gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khong tu dz+dza smin pa mang po yang dag par gnas pa/ bla na med cing lus med par gnas 'a
240a4(mdo sde): bar 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ga/ nas med par spyod pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di
240a5(mdo sde): lnga ste dper na/ rlung mar ni thams cad du thogs pa med cing gnas med de/ gzugs med kyang nags tshal dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / ri rab dang / rgya batsho
240a6(mdo sde): la sags pa thams cad la rang gi dgos pa byed par snang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang / chos thams cad la kun tu mi gnas pa yin te/ phung po dang / kham
240a7(mdo sde): dang / skye mched rnams dang / gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par
240a8(mdo sde): shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang
240b1(mdo sde): lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi
240b2(mdo sde): khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / mig gi skye mched dang / gzugs kyi skye mched dang / rna ba'i skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched
240b3(mdo sde): dang / snga'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye mched dang / reg bya'i skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched dang / chos kyi skye
240b4(mdo sde): mched la mi gnas pa yin/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / 'khor
240b5(mdo sde): los sgyur ba dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag tu 'gyur ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dag / tu 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
240b6(mdo sde): rgyas dag tu 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag la yang gnas pa byed de/ de thams cad la mi gnas pas dngos po dang
240b7(mdo sde): dngos po med pa dang / gcig pa dang / tha dad pa dang / de bzhin nyid la sogs par rlom sems kyi rnam pa du mas ma gyur cing / dmigs pa med la rnam par thar pa'i sgrib pa
240b8(mdo sde): med pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa yang byed la phyogs bcu mtha' yas su med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu
241a1(mdo sde): / sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par thams cad du yang rgyal/ chos kyi lus kyis mi snang
241a2(mdo sde): yang yin zhing / mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas med par spyod pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul kun tu
241a3(mdo sde): mu med pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lnga ste dper na/ rlung mar ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dag tu reg par byed de g.yob cing rgyu'o// rigs kyi bu de
241a4(mdo sde): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang / chos su med pa dag kun rdzob dang / don dam par kun nas mthong zhing rgyas par byed reg par byed/ rnam par 'god ceng spyan te/ 
241a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ngag dang / 'khor ba thams cad kyi gnas rab tu ying
241a6(mdo sde): mgyogs pa dang ldan zhing phyogs bcu thams cad kyi mthar thug pa'i spyod yul bar 'gyur nas rgyu zhing 'gro ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dbang spyod yul kun tu
241a7(mdo sde): mu med pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis snyems pa'i rtse mo mthong zhing 'jig la rab tu rnyil bar byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi
241a8(mdo sde): bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni ri dang khyim dang nags tshal gyi rtse mo dag 'dud par byed/ rab tu rnyil bar byed/ rnam par 'jig par byed/ 'thor bar byed/ mi sdar bar bye/ 
241b1(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang sems can nga rgyal dang rlom sems dang / dregs pa dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtse mos snyems pa rnams/ gzugs dang ngangal bab pa dang / 
241b2(mdo sde): longs spyod dang / dbang dang / stobs dang / tshe dang nad med pa dang / 'tsho ba dang / bzo dang / thos pa dang / yid bzhungs pa dang / g.yog dang / smra mkhas pa dang / dpal che ba'i dregs pas
241b3(mdo sde): myos pa dag dang / yang dag pa'i nan tan gyis bdag sdod pa rnams la de dang khyad zhugs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa bsten pa dang / chos bstan pas nga rgyal choms par byed cing dge ba dri ma
241b4(mdo sde): me pa la sbyong bar byed/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis snyems pa'i rtse mo mthor zhing 'jig la rab tu rnyil bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sem
241b5(mdo sde): dpa' chos kyi char sprin chen po kun nas skyed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lnga ste dper na/ rlung mar ni phyogs bzhin sa sprin gyi dkyil 'khor kha dog sna tshogs can dang / zab
241b6(mdo sde): cing gsal la mnyen zhing 'jam pa'i 'brug sgra rgya mtsho'i dbyangs can krung ro sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byin cing yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs rje su grag pa glog gi 'phreng ba'i rgyan gyi rnam par
241b7(mdo sde): brgyan pa gang dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgya dag kun nas yongasu khebs par byas te/ 'gro ba thams cad dga' ba dang / lo tog dang / sdong po yongasasu bskye
241b8(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ char gyi rgyun rin po che rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mngon par 'bebs pa'i sprin chen po kun nas spong ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang / lus sna tshogs kyi sgo
242a1(mdo sde): / sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa/ phyogs bcu'i tshig rten gyi khams mtha' mas su med ba snang bar byed pa/ 'ong zer kha dog mtha' mas pa'i klog pa 'ja
242a2(mdo sde): rgyan 'byung ba yang dag pa de kho na nyid kyi chos kyi 'brug sgra yan lag stong phrag drug cu pas sgrog pa snying rje chen po'i rlung mar gyis yang dag par 'thor ba/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa'i
242a3(mdo sde): 'gro ba thams cad kyi na mkha' khyab par byed pa ngag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun nas/ khebs par byas shing / ngan song dang / mi khom pa la sogs pa nas/ sems can
242a4(mdo sde): rnams rnam par bslang ste/ rnam pa thams cad du mtshan dang dpe byang ba zang po dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snang ba rnam par dag pa yang byin gyis brlabs te/ bkod pa thams cad
242a5(mdo sde): kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ngas kyang / byin gyisabarlabs nas/ lha dang / mi dga' ba dang / mgung dang / rangs pa mchog tu gyur pa dga' ba dang
242a6(mdo sde): mchogathob pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'angs pa'i chos dkar brdzam chog dang / rgya chen po dang sdong po thams cad rnapa par bskyed pa dang / 
242a7(mdo sde): ca du sring bar chos kyi dbang bskur ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / chung pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi char chen po mngon
242a8(mdo sde): 'bebs te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin chen po kun nas skyed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mo
242b1(mdo sde): ba'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar dri zhim po'i char gyi rgyun gyi snying po can ldang na/ sems can thams cad kyi gdung ba yongasu zhi
242b2(mdo sde): bar byas shing lus shin tu sim pa dang / bsil bar bye // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 
242b3(mdo sde): ngan 'gro dang / ngan par lta ba dang / nyes byas dang / the tsom dang / phongs pa mi bzad pa dang / yul la sred pa dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang bral zhing phrad pa dang / nad rnams bcis
242b4(mdo sde): nas dam pa ma yin pa'i chos la sred pa la sogs pa'i gdung ba dag dam pa'i chos kyi char dang 'dres pa'i bla na med pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang / smon lam dang / mthong ba dang / 
242b5(mdo sde): reg pa dang / 'grogs pa dang / bstan pa don yod pa la sogs pas rab tu ni bar byed de// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpal 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i
242b6(mdo sde): gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed cing nyon mongs pa med pa'i sa la 'god pa yin// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la chos dkar po las 'thun par byung ba
242b7(mdo sde): dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa'i srog nye bar sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa'i rlung gi mthus sems can thams cad tsho'o// 
242b8(mdo sde): bzhin du byang chub sems dpas mngon par bsdigs pa dang / byang chub sems dpas bsrabs pa'i chos dkor po'i rlung sar nye ba srung ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad stsa
243a1(mdo sde): // kyang sems can thams cad dpa' bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'ang lnga ste/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'jo
243a2(mdo sde): rnams dang / khor yun ri dag/ khor yug rin po che rnams dang / gling chen po bzhi yongasu 'dzin pa'i gser gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang / rgya mtsho rin po che'i dbyung gnas bcas pa rnam
243a3(mdo sde): dang / ri rab dang / ri rab chen po dang / de ma yin pa rin po che'i ri dang / gangs dang / ri spos kyi ngang ldang ba dang / grong rdal dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang ngag dang / 'dzam+bu'i
243a4(mdo sde): gling dag dang / gling chen po bzhi dag dang / sto nga ngag dang / stong gnyis pa dag dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po dag dgod pa rnam par phye ba sna tshogs par sgrub bo// de bzhin du
243a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang phyogs bcu kun tu sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po phun sum tshogs pa nye bar bsgrub bo// skyeng yongasu gzhog go// de la rdza
243a6(mdo sde): ltar sangs kyi ri phun sum tshogs pa de ltar 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa rnams balnga'o// ji ltar na gling chen po bzhi pa dang /  ri rab phun sum tshogs pa de lta
243a7(mdo sde): ni nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// ji ltar sdong gi 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum chogs pa de ltar ni rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// 
243a8(mdo sde): lngar sdong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// ji ltar na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
243b1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi namakha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa
243b2(mdo sde): tu rnam par dag par grags pa/ mchod la dmigs pa thams cad yang dag par gnas pa rnams kyi thams cad mngon du byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsod nams brgya pa'i
243b3(mdo sde): mtshan dang ldan pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// de la rgya mtsho ltar ni ting 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho rnams blta'o// gling dang bar gyi gling dang / ri gzhan dang / 
243b4(mdo sde): gling chen po bzhi la sogs pa ltar ni sbyor ba dang / gzungs dang / sems can yong su smin par bya ba dang / slob ma'i dge 'dun la sogs pa blta'o// grong rdal dang nags tshal dang / gan
243b5(mdo sde): med khang ltar ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ning yongasu dag pa'i yon tan bkod pa rnams blta'o// dpag bsams kyi shing gi nags tshal rnams ltar ni/ sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa
243b6(mdo sde): dang tinge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / mngon bar shes pa dang / rig pa dang / ye shes snang ba dang / dbang dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
243b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi stobs de mi 'dzags pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / thugs rje chen po la sogs pa dbang sgyur ba dam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i chos rnams blta'o// rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas bco
243b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ yongasu brtag pa bzung ste/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams ca
244a1(mdo sde): ga'i klung grangs meng pa'i bye ma snyed dag na sems can gang ji sed yod pa de dag thams cad stong gsum phrag bcu'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan
244a2(mdo sde): bar gyur pa/ de lta bu'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po nyid dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de bsdoms pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba chen po gcig cig
244a3(mdo sde): ldan par gyur te/ rnam grangs nges shing phyogs 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'das te/ de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi zas su gtogs pa'i sems can de stong cig 'khor los sgyur ba'i ngos
244a4(mdo sde): bo de 'dra ba zhing dang so sor ldan par gyur la/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam kha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na/ sems can yong
244a5(mdo sde): de cog ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba'i ngos po de lta bu sha dag dang / so sor ldan par gyur te/ de bzhin du bgrang ba de nyid kyis 'jig rten gyis khams de snyed
244a6(mdo sde): du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams/ brgya byin gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa'i brgya byin sha stag du gyur la/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
244a7(mdo sde): meng ba'i bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i brgya byin rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de dang / brgya byin gtsog cig ldan par gyur te/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings
244a8(mdo sde): kyis klas pa/ rnam pa'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad brgya byin de dang 'dra ba sha stag du gyur la/ bgrang ba de nyid kyis phyogs ba
244b1(mdo sde): phyogs mo 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i byem snyed du gtogs pa'i sems can dag thams cad tshangs pa chen por gyur pa/ bsod nams de thams cad gcig du bcom
244b2(mdo sde): pa dang tshangs pa chen po gcig ldan par gyur la/ tshangs pa chen po ji lta bar sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin du gyur te/ snga ma bzhin du bgrang ba de nyid kyis nyan thos dag dang rang sangs
244b3(mdo sde): rgyas ngag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa chen po thob pa 'od zer gyi sprin chen po'i dbang bskur bas/ dbang bskur ba dbang bcu thob pa sha smag du gyur te/ de ltar rigs kyi bu de lta bu sen
244b4(mdo sde): thams cad phyogs bcu'i mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / nam kha'i kham su gtogs pa dus gsum pa thams cad kyi bsod rnams kyi phung po jo tsam 'di dus gsum gyi nam 'a
244b5(mdo sde): kham du gtogs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gto/ sa pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdzu phra ba brgyar bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i baspu'i khu
244b6(mdo sde): gcig mngon par 'grub bo// ba spu'i khung bu thams cad du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po brgya stong grangs med pa bcur bsgyur bas/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu las/ dpe byang ba
244b7(mdo sde): pa re re mngon par 'grub bo// dpe byad bzang por gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de thams cad brjod du med pa bcur bsgyur bal/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa dgu las
244b8(mdo sde): mtshan re re mngon par 'grub bo// de yang brjod du med pa bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spyi zla ba nya ste/ dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor srung bas kyang lhag
245a1(mdo sde): / par mdzes pa'i 'od dang ldan pa mngon par 'grub bo// de yang brjod du med pa bye ba stong phrag bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug 'gro ba thams cad la
245a2(mdo sde): mngon par 'phags shing / bltar mi snang ba gtsug tor gyis yongasu brgyan pa mngon par 'grub bo// de yang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcur
245a3(mdo sde): bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag stong drug cu pa/ dmigs pa thams cad las gsung gi sgra mtha' yas pa 'byung ba lhun gyis grub pas sems can
245a4(mdo sde): thams cad bsam pa yong su tshim par 'gyur ba/ 'jig/ rten gyi khams thams cad du go bar byed pa/ mngon par 'a grub ste/ rigs kyi bu de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
245a5(mdo sde): kyi bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dang / ye she sa kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang ldan zhing kun tu rgyas par byed pa
245a6(mdo sde): bkod pa dang ldan pas sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu yongasu brtag pa bzung na/ gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ 
245a7(mdo sde): nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa/ thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams sa bcu pa/ chos kyi sprin la gnas pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i lus dang ngag dang
245a8(mdo sde): yid kyi rgyan 'chang ba dbang bcu la dbang sgyur ba sha stag tu gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po le/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i na
245b1(mdo sde): las byas pa'i sdong rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spras pas/ na mkha'i tshad tsam gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed so so nas thogs te/ phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i skal bar lo
245b2(mdo sde): su bkang zhing skad cig skad cig du blangs shing khyer yang spu'i khung bu gcig tu gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de gang ba 'am bri bar mi mngon te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar
245b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// de las bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i sa dang / rab tu dag
245b4(mdo sde): dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / 'od 'phro can dang / shin tu spyang dka' dang / mngon du gyur dang / ring ngu song dang / mi g.yo ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang / chos
245b5(mdo sde): kyi sprin dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'ong nges bcug/ nyis po de dag go// de la byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i sa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i phyi spyod pa dang
245b6(mdo sde): log pa'i nan tan thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
245b7(mdo sde): dang / khyad zhugs shing 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa thams cad du dpal dang ldan pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
245b8(mdo sde): gyi khams su med pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i tshums kyi shugs 'chang ba 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par skang cig rim
246a1(mdo sde): zhing 'ong na/ dri zhim po dang 'od zer gyi dra ba'i tshogs chen po gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'byung ba/ pad+mas rkang pa yongasu brtan pa/ stong gi 'jig rte
246a2(mdo sde): gyi khams kyi mtha' dang mnyam pa'i stan gyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad shin tu rnam par gnon pa'i lhag mthong rnam par bsgoms pas/ thogs pa med cing yid du 'ong ba'i dmigra
246a3(mdo sde): pa'i mtshan ma chen po bcu la sogs pa grangs med pa'i ltas bzang po mthong ba/ phyir mi ldog pa phyogs kyi nags tshal thibs po mtha' yas pa thams cad du 'od kyi dra ba bsam gyis
246a4(mdo sde): mi khyab par rab tu 'gyed pas ring dpag tu med pa'i rgyar byed ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi mnga' bdag dpag du med pa snyed kyi bdag gi gzugs ldan
246a5(mdo sde): gyis dbang bskur ba yang dag par gnod pa'i dbang dang byin/ gyi rlabs la mkhas pa 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten sa 'das pa'i chos rin po che char gyi snang ba'i spo
246a6(mdo sde): tu med pa thams cad gtan pa med par kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i mchod sbyin chen po'i sprin gtong ba lhur byed pa/ bldan bzang zhing yid du 'ong la mdzes shing dge la 'gro ba thams
246a7(mdo sde): cing dang mi mthun pa med cing / don yod par bsam pa thams cad yo su rdzogs par byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par rab tu g.yo bar byed cing 'gro ba ngan 'gro la
246a8(mdo sde): bamamams can mapa yas pa yang su skyob/ batha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas mtshang ba pa cas kyi sgo cin nus/ ting 'dzin gyi gzungs dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mngor bar shes pa sa
246b1(mdo sde): rig pa grangs med pas rnam par rol pa chos mtha' yas pa la dgra' zhing mos pas zang zing med par phyi ma'i mtha' bskal pa'i mthar thug par rnab par mi rtog cing spun gyis 'grub
246b2(mdo sde): pa'i dga' ba'i shugs kyi sdang ba thob pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong zer 'bum dpag tu med par theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i bsgom pa sna tshogs yong su rdzogs kyi/ 
246b3(mdo sde): gzhan gyi don gyi nan tan char phyin pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa grub pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba brgya sdong phun sum tshogs pa'i mos pa chen po'i yang
246b4(mdo sde): chen pos spyod pa'i chos nyid kyis sa dang po de ma thag tu 'pho ba par gang gnas pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chu dkyi sems bskyed pa'i sa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste
246b5(mdo sde): dper na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni mi'i kha dog la sa ni 'das la/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa yin te/ deng zhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten pa dang / 
246b6(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad las ni 'angs pa yin/ don dam pa'i byang chub sems dba'i sa ni ma thob pa yino// sangs rgyas kyis kun tu 'ong ni mtha' dang dpung med
246b7(mdo sde): ma lus pa dri ba med pa'i chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba ste/ kun tu shin tu lta ba sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad thob par byed pa'i mtshan nyid ngo // de la ting nge 'dzin rnam
246b8(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ bcu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting 'dzin rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rin po che chen po kun tu 'phags pa dang / shin tu gnas pa dang / 'i sku
247a1(mdo sde): ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / nyi ma'i 'od kyi gzi brjid dang / don thams cad grub pa dang / ye shes sgron ma dang / nga ltar gyi
247a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs pa dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i tinge 'dzin te/ de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin ni mtha' yas so// gzungs ni bcu gnyis
247a3(mdo sde): te bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dbang bskur ldan dang / ye shes ldan dang / sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa dang / mi zad pa'i za mchog dang / 'khyil pa mtha' yas pa dang / rgya
247a4(mdo sde): mtsho'i phyag rgya dang / pad+ma bkod pa dang / chags pa med pa'i sgor 'jug pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyi byin gyis
247a5(mdo sde): brlabs pa dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i kha dog rdzogs pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'i gzungs te/ de dag la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du smra
247a6(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa ni drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lnga'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjesu drar ba'i shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul
247a7(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa'i shes pa dang / zag pa zang par shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste drug po de dag go// dbang ni bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lnga ste/ tshe'i tshad bskal pa grangs
247a8(mdo sde): meng dpag tu med par byin gyis rlob pas/ tshe la dbang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin 'jod du meng pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i nges par rtog cing 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sems la
247b1(mdo sde): ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bkod pa'i rgyan du mas brgyan par byin gyis rlob pa smon pa'i tshul gyis yo byad la dbang ba dang / dus ji lta ba bzhin du las kyi rnam
247b2(mdo sde): par smin pa byin gyis rlob pa ston pas las la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba ston pas skye ba la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
247b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyis yong su gang bar ston pas mos pa la dbang ba dang / dus dang zhing gang du 'dong bar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par ston pas smon lam la dbang ba dang / 'a
247b4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul ba mtha' yas pa ston pas rdzu 'phrul la ngab nga ba dang / chos kyi sgo sdang ba mtha' dbus med pa yong
247b5(mdo sde): ston pas chos la dbang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'i stabs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang mtshan dang / 
247b6(mdo sde): byang bzang po dang / mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dam pa dang / dus thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi grangs la sogs pas
247b7(mdo sde): gcig gcig la yongasu shes pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ston pas/ ye shes la ba
247b8(mdo sde): ste bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang rnam so// de la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa'i stobs dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa
248a1(mdo sde): / stobs dang / sbyor ba'i stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang / smon lam gyi stobs dang / spyod pa'i stobs dang / theg pa'i stobs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i
248a2(mdo sde): dang byang chub kyi stobs dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i spobs te/ bcu po de ngag ni// byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rnamaso// de la byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs
248a3(mdo sde): pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyis thos pa 'dzin cing don bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / bdag med pa khong du chud pas gzhan gyis gtse ba'i mtshan ma mi 'byung zhing ra
248a4(mdo sde): bzhin gyis spyod lam spang du med pa'i las gsum yongasu dag pa'i bsrung ba chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang / chos bzung ba yun du mi brjed pa dang / thabs pa
248a5(mdo sde): rab mthar phyin pas sems can sgrol zhing ngang pa ston pa dang / dge ba'i bar chad du mi 'gyur ba'i mi 'jigs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma nyams
248a6(mdo sde): theg pa gzhan gyis mi 'byung bar dashing yong su rdzogs pa dang / sems can gyi don rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par thob par bya ba la mi 'jigs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni bya
248a7(mdo sde): sems nga pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ma bstan pa'i sbyin bca
248a8(mdo sde): rnams yin/ ma bstan pa'i tshu la khrims can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i bzod pa can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i bsam gtan can rnam
248b1(mdo sde): dang ma bstan pa'i shes rab can rnams dang / bsdu ba'i dngos pos sems can thams cad bsdud pa rnams dang / yongasu sngo ba'i cho ga shes pa rnams dang / thabs mkhas pas
248b2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dbang gis theg pa'i mchog gis 'byung ba ston pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po las ma nyams pa rnams dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das
248b3(mdo sde): sgo ston pa rnams dang / zung dang snrel zhi'i rgyud la mkhas pa rnams yin/ ye shes sngon du 'gro bas mngon par 'du mi byed cing wa na pA tho ba med par tshe rabs thams cad du mngon
248b4(mdo sde): ra zhugs pa rnams dang / lus deng ngag dang yid kyis kyi mtha' na pa bcu dang ldan pa rnams dang / swA gabasngal gyi phung ba thams cad bzod pa'i yum lan
248b5(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams thams cad yongasu mi gtong ba rnams dang / 'gro ba thams cad mngon par dga' bar ston/ pa rnams dang / byis pa dang nyan thos mi bzang ba ji snyed kyi
248b6(mdo sde): gi nang na yang dge ba mang po'i rin po che'i shing dpag bsams ltar brtan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems yongasu ma nyams pa rnams dang / chos thams cad kyi thabs
248b7(mdo sde): sbyin pas dbang bskur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal ba bstan pa las mi ldog pa rnams te/ bco brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres
248b8(mdo sde): po rnams so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ 'dis ste/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / nga ltar
249a1(mdo sde): // las kyi rgyu'i rnam par smin pa len pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / thos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / dbang po
249a2(mdo sde): mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par
249a3(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i kun nas nyod mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / ldang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rje su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / shi 'pho dang skye ba
249a4(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / zag pa zad par mkhyen pa'i stobs te/ bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam so// de la de ba'in gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs po ban
249a5(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mngon par rdzog/ sa par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / zag pa thams cad zad par shes pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / 
249a6(mdo sde): du gcod pa'i chos rnams gzhan du mi 'gyur bar nges pa'i lung bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba 'byung ba'i lam de bzhin du
249a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnam so// de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhinas
249a8(mdo sde): pa la 'khrul pa med pa dang / ca co med pa dang / bsnyel med pa dang / sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa dang / tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang / so sor ma rtags pa'i bang
249b1(mdo sde): snyoms med pa dang / mos pa 'ams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus 'bas pa med pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / ting 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa med pa dang
249b2(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang / 'das pa'i dus lam chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong
249b3(mdo sde): ba 'jug pa dang / nga ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / lus kyi las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjesu 'brang ba dang / 
249b4(mdo sde): dag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing yonas kyi rjes 'brang ba dang / yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro lding ye shes kyi rjesu 'brang ba ste/ 
249b5(mdo sde): bco brgyang ngo nge dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres parnam so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i thu
249b6(mdo sde): rje chen po'i rnam pa subacu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu bsam gyis mi khyad pa'i rang bzhin 'byung ste/ sum cu rtsa
249b7(mdo sde): gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thabs cad ni bdag med pa yin// sems can rnams ni bdag med par ma mos pas de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
249b8(mdo sde): thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni sems can med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni sems can du smra ba'o// zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje
250a1(mdo sde): chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni srog med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni srog tu sba'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po
250a2(mdo sde): skye'o/ chos thams cad ni gang zag med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni gang zag la gnas so zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po sde'o// chos thams
250a3(mdo sde): cad ni med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni yod par lta'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni gnas med pa yin na/ sems
250a4(mdo sde): can rnams ni gnas la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni gzhi med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni gzhi la dga'o zhes
250a5(mdo sde): sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni nga'ir bya ba med pa yi na na/ sems can rnams ni nga'i bya ba la rten to zhes sems
250a6(mdo sde): can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni yongasu bzung ba la brtson no zhes sems can rnams la
250a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni dngos po la rten to// zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thug
250a8(mdo sde): rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni skye ba la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad
250b1(mdo sde): ni 'chi 'pho dang ma skyes pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni 'chi 'pho dang skye ba la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni/ 
250b2(mdo sde): kun nas nyon ma mongs pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs so zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni 'dod
250b3(mdo sde): chags dang bral ba yin na/ sems can rnams ni 'dod chags par byed do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni/ 
250b4(mdo sde): zhe sdang dang bral ba yin na/ sems can rnams ni ne sdang bar byed do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhi na gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad
250b5(mdo sde): ni gti mug dang bral ba yin na/ sems can rnams nig/ ci mug par gyur to nas de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos tham/ 
250b6(mdo sde): cang ni 'ong ba med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni 'ong ba la gnas pa'i zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni 'gro ba
250b7(mdo sde): med pa yin na/ sems can rnams 'gro ba la gan so zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa
250b8(mdo sde): med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad spros
251a1(mdo sde): pa med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni spros pa la dga'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni stong pa
251a2(mdo sde): yin na/ sems can rnams ni lta ba la zhen to zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa yin na/ sems can
251a3(mdo sde): / rnams ni mtshan ma spyod yul can no zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa yin na/ sems can rnams
251a4(mdo sde): ni smon lam la spyod zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni phan tshun rtsod pas yong su zin cing gnod sems
251a5(mdo sde): kyi tha ba dang / zhe sdang la zhugs par gzigs nas de dag la gnod sems kyi za ba dang / zhe sdang spang ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs
251a6(mdo sde): ba'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni phyin ci log dang ldan zhing nyam nga bar zhugs pa/ lam gol ba la gnas pa yin gyis de dag yang dag pa'i lam du gzud par bya'o// 
251a7(mdo sde): zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni brkam zhing 'dod pa'i zil gyis non pa ste/ chog mi shes shing gzhan gyi nor la
251a8(mdo sde): 'brog pa yin gyis de dag 'phags pa'i nor dang pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / gtong ba dang / shes rab dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i nor la dgod do zhes
251b1(mdo sde): sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma sems can de dag ni bu sgang dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru la sred pas/ 'khor ba ste/ snying po
251b2(mdo sde): ba la snying por 'du shes pa yin gyis/ de dag la shin tu mi rtag par bstan par bya'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma
251b3(mdo sde): sems can 'di dag ni mi rigs pas 'tsho ba ste/ gcig la gcig 'drid par gnas pa yin gyis/ de dag la 'tsho ba yongasu dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to zhes sems can rnams
251b4(mdo sde): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma sems can 'di dag ni chog mi shes pa ste/ rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti dang / tshigasugacangad ba la spyod kyang bdag cag
251b5(mdo sde): ni chog shes pa snyam du 'dzin gyis de dag la gang 'dzi sdug bsngal shin tu 'i zhing bde ba'i mya ngan las 'ang sa bas/ shin tu chog par bya'o zhes sems can rnams
251b6(mdo sde): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma sems can 'di dag ni khyim gyi gnas sdug bsngal gyi sdong shin tu nyon mongs pa la rtag tu dga' ba yin gyis de dag las
251b7(mdo sde): byung zhing khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'das par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po sgo'o// chos thams cad
251b8(mdo sde): rgyus nye bar 'gro ba ste/ bsgrub pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan 'od yin na/ de la sems can rnams ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba la le la byed kyis de dag la rnam par grom/ 
252a1(mdo sde): bar lhur blang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams par chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// sems can rnams ni chag
252a2(mdo sde): pa med pa'i ye shes dam pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i yong su mya ngan las 'das pa 'di btang zhing gang 'di nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dman pa tshol ba yin gyis
252a3(mdo sde): de dag la gang 'dis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la dmigs par bya ba'i phyir/ rgya chen po la blo mos par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skyes
252a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan na/ sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po
252a5(mdo sde): la gnas pa zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig sems can dag la rnam pa su cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa'i snying rje chen po skye na/ byang
252a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bsod nams kyi zhing gzi brjid chen pos rgyas pa phyir mi ldog pa sems can gyi don la brtson par rig par bya'o// snying rje chen po'i chos kyi
252a7(mdo sde): sgo'i le'u 'dri/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na/ srog chags stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye so// srog chags
252a8(mdo sde): brgyang stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// lha'i bu stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing drim dang bral ba rnam par dag go// rigs kyi rdza
252b1(mdo sde): de ltar de dag la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang sgyur gyi chos rnam par dgod pa ni dpag tu med grangs med de// de dag phyi ma'i
252b2(mdo sde): mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par de bzhin gshegs pas bstan kyang mtha' med na/ sems can rnams kyi dga' ba dang / ngang pa dang rangs pa bskyed pa'i phyir phyogs tsam zhig stan
252b3(mdo sde): tede ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mchos dkang po las 'thun par 'byung ba'i dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa'i srog nye bar spyong pa la mkhas pa yin no// 
252b4(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin dang ga tu med pa kun 'dzin nus pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bya 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor
252b5(mdo sde): med cing rgya che la brtan zhing sra bas 'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs pa dang 'byung ba char sprin dang bcas pa/ rgyadang gling chen po bzhi par bcas pa/ ri rab dang ri btang
252b6(mdo sde): bzung dang / ri btang zung chen po dang / gangs dang / khor yug ri dang / khor yug ri chen po dang / ri spos kyi ngang ldang dang / grong rdal dang / 'bab chu dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal
252b7(mdo sde): med khang gi rnam par bcas pa dag yong su 'dzin to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang gzungs kyi rlung mar gyi dkyil 'khor mu med bas yang dag
252b8(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprin gyis phab pa'i gtan pa med pa'i chos kyi char gyi rgyun chen po thams cad yongasu 'dzin to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad chags pa'i tshe/ 
253a1(mdo sde): ji skad du brjod pa'i phyi rab dang / rgya mtsho dang / gling chen po bzhi pa dang / ri 'ang zung dang / ri bdang bzung chen po dang / gangs dang / khor yug ri dang / khor yug
253a2(mdo sde): chen po dang / ri spos kyi ngang ldang dang / grong rdal dang / 'bab chu dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang gi rnam pa lta bu bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan dang / sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang
253a3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / dbang dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / snying rje chen po la sos
253a4(mdo sde): pa sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa thabs cad yongasu 'dzin to// 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi phung po brgya stong bu med pa
253a5(mdo sde): supa tshogs pa thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa ra yong su 'dzin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin dpag tu med ba kun 'dzin nus pa yin
253a6(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongasu 'gong pa yin de na/ rigs kyi
253a7(mdo sde): bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung bar ni gzhal med khang dgod pa'i rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs thams cad kun nas gnog par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byang de/ nabs tshal dang / shi
253a8(mdo sde): dang lal gdang / 'dab ma dang / ldum bu dang / myu gu dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo ma dang / sdong po la sogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi yan lag nyid lag rnam par
253b1(mdo sde): dbye ba sna tshogasu rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang par yongasu gzhog cing rnam par 'byed de/ gsal bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mang yang so so yang dag par rig pa
253b2(mdo sde): dang spobs pa'i ye shes ma thogs ma chags shing mtha' yas pas/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad sgo sna tshogs nas yong su gzhog pa
253b3(mdo sde): byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed/ snang bar byed/ yongasu ston par byed/ thob par byed cing rnam pa 'di dag 'di lta ste/ chos 'di dag ni ngan song spyad pa'o// 'di dag ni bde 'gro sgrub pa'o// 
253b4(mdo sde): 'di dag ni bdag por sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni sems can da myal ba sgrub po// 'di dag ni byol song gi skye gnas sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten sgrub po// 'di dag ni
253b5(mdo sde): sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni lngar sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni 'kho ra los sbyor rang sgrub pa'o// de bzhin du mdor bsdus / 'di dag ni brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skya
253b6(mdo sde): ba sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni gzugs dang / g.yog dang yid gzhungs pa dang / dpal chen po bsgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni reg pa'o// 'di dag ni sgyu rtsa lo// 'di dag ni bzo'i gan so// 'di dag
253b7(mdo sde): bstan bcos sna tshogs la rnab pa thams cad du mkhas pa'o// 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa ste/ nyan thosu 'gyur ba'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ste/ rang sangs rgyasu 'gyur
253b8(mdo sde): 'khor 'di ni theg pa chen po ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa bdag pang gzhan gyi don yang dag par 'thob par byed pa kun tu bzang po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'a
254a1(mdo sde): // pa'o// de bzhin du mdor bsdus te/ 'di dag ni sa rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnams dang / rigs pa rnams dang / dbang rnams dang / gzu
254a2(mdo sde): rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / ma 'dres pa rnam
254a3(mdo sde): so zhes rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag la sogs pa rnam pa tshad med pas/ gzungs pad+ma bkod pa la sogs pa la mkhas pas chos bkod pa rnam par bkod pa
254a4(mdo sde): ngag byeng de// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshas rnam pa ba dang pa'i gnam zeng khang chen po'i bkong bar rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yangs 'gong ba yin
254a5(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'jo ra dpag bsam gyi shing las shin tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me chog
254a6(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa yin ne na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni dpag bsam gyi shing gi nags tshal dag las gang gis lnga dang mi rnam
254a7(mdo sde): shin tu dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ mya ngan med par rnam par rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang bar kha dog dang stobs dang / mthu dang yid
254a8(mdo sde): bde ba las yongasu mi nyams pa de lta bu'i spos dang / me tog dang / rgyan dang / gos dang / sil snyan dang / rol mo'i sgra la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i char mngon par 'tham
254b1(mdo sde): yongasu skyed cing 'byin par bye'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung bar yang yongasu dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems
254b2(mdo sde): dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas/ sems can dag la gang nas sems can de dag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos kyi dga' ba la mos shing 'dun pa dang / lus dang ngag dang
254b3(mdo sde): yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / gzi dang ldan pa dang / yongasu skyo bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nyam su myong bar byed pa dang / mi
254b4(mdo sde): nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyis sdang bar gyur pas/ rtag tu khyad par gyi rnam par la dong bar 'gyur pa'i mdo sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyang ba'i sde
254b5(mdo sde): dang lung bstan pa'i sde dang / tshig su bcad pa'i sde dang / cheng du brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / to/ gas pa brjod pa'i sde dang / 'di lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes
254b6(mdo sde): ba rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmang du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang / gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde ngag dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos rin po che'i me tog la sogs
254b7(mdo sde): pa'i char 'angon par 'beb so// rjesu 'thun pa dang / rjesu mi mthun pa dang / snrel ni dang / spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud la sogs pa'i gtam rnam par gdon mi za ba nye bar bsgrub bo// tha snyad
254b8(mdo sde): kyi dmigs pa thams cad la bdag med pa zhi zhing rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid rjod cing ston la rnam par byang bar bye'o// chos thams cad sgo kun tu yang dag par gzhol ba yongasu
255a1(mdo sde): / ston to// sgyu ma'i rnam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa nye bar sbyar ro// ye shes sgyu ma rnam par rgyas par byeda'o// chos thams cad la dga' bar rtse ba'i rnam
255a2(mdo sde): 'phrul pa rnams kyis sems can rnams yongasu rgyas par byed do// 'dri ba thams cad kyi lung bstan pa mi tshim par bye'o// mtha' dang dpung med pa'i rdzu 'phrul la mkhas pa skye
255a3(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsam gyi shing las shin tu byung ba 'i chos kyi gang ma yang dag par rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog yid du 'ong
255a4(mdo sde): rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa yod// ji rgya byang chub thams dpa' bsal pa rnas ming kyi dgar po'i dkyil 'khor yang su bsags pa ming 'dzin dang / rnam par bar ba
255a5(mdo sde): gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang / 'ong dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul dang / nags tshal dang / khang pa dang / dge ba'i 'khor yug gi ri la sogs pas
255a6(mdo sde): yongasu bskor ba'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na/ gdul ba yongasu smin pa mang po yang dag par gnas pa bla na med cing lus med pa'i gnas 'gyur bar 'jig pa'i ye she
255a7(mdo sde): kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta sde dper na/ rlung mar ni bskal pa'i mthar thug ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus na
255a8(mdo sde): gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang / ri rab dang / khor yug ri dang / rgya mtsho la sogs par bcas pa kun nas 'jig cing rna
