255b1(mdo sde): bar 'khor ba dang / dmig med par byed cing nam kha'i rang bzhin du byed pa de lta bur stobs kyi shugs thogs pa meng bar ldang ngo // rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems
255b2(mdo sde): dpa'i rlung mar yang bskal pa mang por tshogs bsags pa'i sems can bsod nams ye shes sna tshogs rnam par bkod pa'i ri mthon po dang ldan pa rnams la byang chub se
255b3(mdo sde): dpa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yongasu bstan pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med par rab tu bsor ba'i sgra skad kyi dbyangs
255b4(mdo sde): rab tu bsgrags pas/ chos kyi phung po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gang gis 'dul ba chos snang ba'i lhag mthong ngam pa dang ldan pa bzod par mi nus pa'i 'du byed kyi ston
255b5(mdo sde): thams cad mnyam par gzhog pa tshul byas nas yang dag par sems nang du gnas pa'i ting 'dzin phun sum tsho gas pa la brten te srid pa dang / phung po dang / khas
255b6(mdo sde): dang skye mched kyi 'du byed kyi lus thams cad bshig cing rnam par gtor te lus med par byas nas/ yang ngan pa ma yin pa kun btags pa rnam par bshig ste/ 'jig
255b7(mdo sde): rten thams cad las yong su 'das pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab cing gzugs med pa'i bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs thams cad yongasu bstan pa rnam par
255b8(mdo sde): bshig pas gnas gyur pa/ rnam par dag pa/ phyi ma'i mtha' mur thug par gnas pa/ rnam pa thams cad du mtha' dang bral ba rnams thob par byed pa lta bu kun nas rab tu
256a1(mdo sde): // gtong ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongasu bsags pa ting 'dzin dang / rnam par thar
256a2(mdo sde): pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang / 'ong dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul dang / nags tshal dang / khang pa dang / dge ba'i khor yug ri la sogs pas/ 
256a3(mdo sde): yongasu bskor ba'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang 'dul ba yongasu smin pa mang po yang dag par gnas pa/ bla na med cing lus med pa'i gnas 'gyur bar ye shes
256a4(mdo sde): kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu tha~M ngag dang ldanan/ byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar lta bu yi no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang
256a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba sa 'di skad ces gsol to// a la la de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang
256a6(mdo sde): ldan zhing / sems can rlabs po che rnams yongasu tshim par 'gyur ba'i chos bcu po 'di bstan pa bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom
256a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das lha dang mi gang la la chos 'di dag la mos shing nan tan bgyid na/ de dag thams cad ji snyed du gsungs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa/ bde ba dang bcas pa yid
256a8(mdo sde): ba dang bcas par thob par 'gyur te/ brgya byin ngang/ tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten sbyong ba la sogs pa zhig bgyid na yang / gzhan gyi don la gzhol zhing tshe 'di dang / tshor
256b1(mdo sde): gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang thob par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhino// de de bzhin te/ sems can gang de lta
256b2(mdo sde): chos rnams la nan tan du byed pa de dag ni/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang / kun tu rnam par bltas pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad rab
256b3(mdo sde): spangs pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ro// gang spong ba'i skyes bu glen pa de dag ni mun pa nas mun par gzhol ba ste/ 
256b4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal thams cad la sten pa'o// lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya ngan du bya'o// / bam po bzhi pa/ 
256b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin// bcu gang zhe na/ de lta ste/ dri ma med pa rnams yin/ ma chags pa
256b6(mdo sde): rnams yin/ zhi ba rnams yin/ shes rab mtha' yas pa rnams yin/ ye shes mtha' yas pa rnams yin/ chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid rjesu song ba rnams yin/ 
256b7(mdo sde): chos thams cad na mkha'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid du mos pa rnams min/ so sor mi rten pa rnams yin/ mtshan ma'i spyod yul las 'das pa rnams yin/ rtog ge'i spyod yul las 'das
256b8(mdo sde): rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sem
257a1(mdo sde): // dpa' rnam pa dang mtshungs pa rnams yino// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs rnams la chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong
257a2(mdo sde): bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra rnams dang / dri rnams dang / ro rnams dang / reg rnams dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la
257a3(mdo sde): chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang / rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / bstod pa dang / 
257a4(mdo sde): smad pas chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'a gyur pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnam
257a5(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa 'azlab lta du rnams yi'o// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim
257a6(mdo sde): byed pa dang / mthong na dga' ba rnams dang / chos dkar po rnams skye bar byed pa dang / chos nag po rnams 'bri bar byed pa dang / rab tu bsngags pa rnams yin/ lus yongasu dag pa
257a7(mdo sde): rnams yin/ bzhon pa mchog la zhon pa rnams yin/ rtag tu brgyan pa rnams yin/ chos kyi dga' ba la mos shing 'dun pa rnams yin/ 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba rnams yin no// 
257a8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed pa nas/ ji ltar na 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rings
257b1(mdo sde): bu 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba shar na 'di ltar sems can thams cad lus bsil ba dang / yid du 'ongs pas rab tu bsil bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zlab
257b2(mdo sde): na'ang 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad dang bral ba dang / dga' ba dang ngang pa dang rangs pa dang / yid du 'ong bas sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par bye'o/ 
257b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba shad na 'di lta ste/ zhi ba dang / dang ba dang / sems shin tu dga' bar byed pas sems can thams cad mthong na dga' ba yin// de bzhin du
257b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shar na'ang 'di lta ste/ dbang po rnam par gsal ba dang / sems kyi rgyud dang ba dang / spyod pa dang / spyod lam dang / yon tan phun sum tshogs
257b5(mdo sde): pas sems can thams cad mthong na dga' shing yid du 'ong ba'i na no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba ya rgya ngo la zla ba nya ste/ rnam par thams cad du rgyas par
257b6(mdo sde): gyur gyi bar du ny+tsi ma re re zhing 'phel lo// yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang thog ma sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po
257b7(mdo sde): ga sa bar du zhe ma ra ma chis dbang po rnams 'phel zhing yong rdzogs par 'gyu / sa byung chu kyi snying po la 'dug gi par don rnam pa thams cangs su rdzogs pa
257b8(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba mar gyi ngo la bab pa dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor kha dog dang snang ba dang / chu zheng yang yongasu 'bri ste/ bco lnga la ji ltar rnam
258a1(mdo sde): / pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi mngon pa de ltar 'bri'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang / nam 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes thob par thu
258a2(mdo sde): pa de ni/ de'i mi dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du rab tu 'bri ste/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi snying po la thams cad kyi thams cad du med par 'gyur ba de ltar rab tu
258a3(mdo sde): 'dri'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lnga ste dper na/ zla ba shar na bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang bu mo rnams kyis rab tu
258a4(mdo sde): par byed pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal rdza ba shar na yang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rab tu bsngags par bya
258a5(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lnga ste dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba'i lus 'di ltar rang gi bsod nams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa ni yongasu dag pa ste/ rnyog pa ma
258a6(mdo sde): rang ba dang gsal ba yin// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i lus kyang 'di lta ste/ chos nyid kyis mngon par grub pa rdzus te skyes pa/ pha ma'i bsog pa dang mer mer po las kyu
258a7(mdo sde): ba ma yin te/ yongasu dag la rnyog pa med cing dang ba dang gsal ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba ni bzhon pa mchog la zhon te gling bzhir snang bar byed de/ 
258a8(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa mchog la non te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par snang bar byed// rigs kyi bu 'di
258b1(mdo sde): steng dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba ni rtag tu brgyan cing rgyan ma rnyings pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpang zla ba yang 'di ltar yon tan gyi rgyan rnams kyis rtag tu brgyan pa yin no// rigs
258b2(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par lha'i 'dod pa'i dga' ba la mos pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa
258b3(mdo sde): chos kyi dga' ba la mos shing 'dun pa yin gyi/ 'dod pas dga' ba la dga' ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba ni 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba man// de bzhin du
258b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rlab yang 'di r+Na ste/ bsod nams chen po dang / ye shes chen pos 'phru ring mthu tsho yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can
258b5(mdo sde): kyi lus rab tu sim par byed pa nas 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i bar du yino// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang 'dra ba rnams yin no/ 
258b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma lta bu rnams yino// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba rnams yin/ 'dul ba'i sems can rnam par
258b7(mdo sde): 'byed par byed pa rnams yin/ phyogs bcu thams cad du ldan ner bying ba rnams yin/ ngan pa'i chos mngon pang shar ba rnams yin/ de dag gi zag pa nub par gyur pa rnams yin/ 
258b8(mdo sde): snang bar byed pa rnams yin/ mu sngags can ngan pa'i lus rnams zil gyis mnan te 'dug pa rnams yin/ mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa kun ston pa rnams yin/ chos dkar po'i las kyis
259a1(mdo sde): thams cad 'byung bar byed pa rnams yin/ skye bo dge ba la dga' ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba
259a2(mdo sde): nas ji ltar skye bo dge ba dga' ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma shar na mun pa mun nag thams cad rnam par sel to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma
259a3(mdo sde): shar na'ang ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma shar da pad+ma rnam par 'bye // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi pa shar ba na yang 'dul
259a4(mdo sde): ba'i sems can gyi pad+ma rnam par 'byed par byed do// rig sa kyi bu 'di lnga ste dper na/ nyi ma shar na phyogs bcu thams cad du ldan nor bye'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ni pa
259a5(mdo sde): nangan yang phyonas bcu thams cad du shes rab byin rdzing ba kyi shes kyi 'ong bar gyis rag tu ldan ra byangasems can rnams la gnang por mi'i d+hA ro// rigs kyi
259a6(mdo sde): na mam parnams thams cad kyi thams cad dun ma meng par gyur gyi'o// can pa rang ces byar// rigs kyi bu 'dis su zer na/ nyis shang narang chung gling gi
259b1(mdo sde): snang bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ni ma shar na yang sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snang ba byed cing / gti mug gi mun pa'i rab rib kyis khebs pa rnam par sel/ 
259b2(mdo sde): to/ rigs kyi bu 'di lnga ste dper na/ nyi ma shar na 'ong thams cad kyi 'ong meng bar byed kyang / nyi ma ni ngas 'ong thams cad kyi 'od mi snang bar bya'o snyam du mi sems mod kyi 'on kyang chos
259b3(mdo sde): nyid thob pas 'od med par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang / mu stegs can ngan pa'i 'od dang / mu stegs can ngan pa'i lus thams cad 'ong med par 'gyur
259b4(mdo sde): mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi pa ni ngas 'di dga'o/ nga med par bya'o snyam du'i sems te/ 'on kyang chos nyid thob pas 'od med par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dpar
259b5(mdo sde): na/ nyi ma shar na 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa legs par ston to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang sems can thams cad la
259b6(mdo sde): ye shes kyi snang bas mnyas pa dang / mi mnyam ba legs par ston to// rigs kyi bu mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshig bla ngag so// rigs kyi bu yi mnyam pa zhi bya
259b7(mdo sde): 'di ni lam ngan pa'i tshig bla dag so// rigs kyi bu 'di lnga sde dper na/ nyis shar mo brko'i las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byu // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yid / 
259b8(mdo sde): ba'i chos kyi las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma shar na skye bo dge ba ni dga' bar 'gyur la/ mi srun pa'i rang bzhin can dag mi dga' bar gyu
260a1(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang skye bo dge ba rnams dang / mkhas pa rnams dang / shes rab kyi rang bzhin rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur// lam ngan
260a2(mdo sde): bar zhugs pa rnams dang / mi srun pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / byis pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / 'khor ba la mngon
260a3(mdo sde): bar dga' ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa las phyir phyogs pa'i rnams ni mi dga' bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma rig pa'i mun pa sel
260a4(mdo sde): ba nas/ skye bo dge ba'i bar du mi no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma la bu rnams yino// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub se
260a5(mdo sde): dpa' seng ge lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'ango lta ste/ bag mi tsha ba rnams yin/ mi brtabs pa rnams yin/ mi zlogs pa rnams yin/ seng+ge'i sgra sgrogs pa
260a6(mdo sde): rnams yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams yin/ nags tshal dang nags kyi mngabs na rgyu ba rnams yin// ri'i phug na gnas pa rnams yin/ len pa med pa rnams yin/ bangag gi brtson
260a7(mdo sde): 'grus dang / stobs dang mthu thob pas bdud kyi sde rab tu 'jom pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos kyi lo tog srung ba rnams yino// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa
260a8(mdo sde): bag mi tsha ba nas dge ba'i chos kyi me tog srung ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng+ge ni gar 'gro yang bdag dang 'dra ba med par mthong bas bag mi cha zhing
260b1(mdo sde): mi skrag par 'gro'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang bdag dang 'dra ba med par mthong bas gar 'gro yang bag mi tsha zhing mi skrag par 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste
260b2(mdo sde): dper na/ seng+ge ni wa thams cad kyi sgras mi brtams pa yino// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge yang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis brtsad pas brgal kyang mi brtabs shing
260b3(mdo sde): rgong pa dang zhum par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni bsnyugs na phyir mi ldog pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' song ge yang phas kyi rgol ba tham
260b4(mdo sde): cang kyis bstsags na mi rmugs shing mi num par b+huro// rigs kyi bu'adi ste ste dper na/ seng ge ni sgra gang gis ri dgas bram thams cad dang / rgya thams cad lcags
260b5(mdo sde): 'byer bar 'gyur ba de lta bu sprob go// de bzhin du byung chub sems dpa' seng ge yang bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra gang gis bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa mu stegs can
260b6(mdo sde): kyi ri dgas rnams dang / gzhan mu stegs can gyi wa thams cad phyogs bcur 'byed par 'gyur ba de lta bu sgrog ste/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge ni bdag tu 'dzin pa las bzlog par
260b7(mdo sde): bya ba dang / sems can gzhan dag 'dul ba'i dbang du bya ba ma gtogs par de dag la gnod par bya ba'i phyir bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra mi skrag go// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 
260b8(mdo sde): seng ge'i kun tu lta yang mi 'jigs pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang spyod pa yongasu dag pa'i nan tan la lnga yang mi 'jigs pa yino// rigs kyi bu 'di
261a1(mdo sde): // lnga sde dper na/ seng ge ni rang bzhin gyi nags tshal dang nags tshal gyi mngathun rgyu ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang rang bzhin gyis dben pa
261a2(mdo sde): la mngon du phyogs shing nags tshal dang / nags tshal gyi mang bas na spyod pa yino// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni ri phug na gnas pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub
261a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' seng ge yang ye shes kyi brag gi ri phug ra gnas pa yin rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni mi len par 'gro ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems
261a4(mdo sde): dpa' seng ge yang nyon mongs pa'i khur thams cad bor zhing len pa med par 'gro ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni gcig pu gnyis su med/  bdag
261a5(mdo sde): gi brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang mthu thob pas pha ro/ la gyi sde 'jom mo// de bzhin du byang chub sems pa ba' seng ge yang gcig pu gnyi su med par byang chub kyi
261a6(mdo sde): snying po la 'dug nas bdag gi brtsar 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu thob pas bdud kyi sde 'jom mo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ grong gi mngabs gang na seng ge rgyu ba der ri dwags pa
261a7(mdo sde): mo dag gis lo tog rnams chung mi gson to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang yul dang yul gyi phyogs gang na 'dug pa der mu stegs can gyi ri dwags phra mo dag gis
261a8(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos kyi lo tom chung mi gzon to// rigs kyi tha de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bag mi tsha ba nas/ dge ba'i chos kyi mchog srung ba'i bar du yin no// rigs
261b1(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge lta bu rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dul ba rnams yin
261b2(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems brtan pa rnams yin/ byang chub kyi sems kyi byi ngor shin tu byas pa rnams yin/ dbang po bsdams pa rnams yin/ lam du
261b3(mdo sde): zhugs pa rnams yin/ khur chen po khyer ba rnams yin/ sems can gyi don rnams la yongasu mi skyo ba rnams yin/ yang dag pas 'tsho ba rnams yin/ tshul bcos pa da
261b4(mdo sde): kha bsag gi steng pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ g.yo sgyu dang bral ba rnams yin/ drang ba'i rang bzhin can drang ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po dang / 
261b5(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dul ba rnams yi na no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa rnams yin no// bcu
261b6(mdo sde): gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang bas rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa med cing kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral bas lam gyi rgyun ma chad pa rnams
261b7(mdo sde): yin de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' mi bcog pas bka' bzhin byed pa rnams yin/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rtogs pas chos thams cad kyi tshul mnyam pa nyid khong
261b8(mdo sde): chung ba rnams yin/ dma' ba dma' ba'i yid kyis gdol bu lta bur 'jig rten na spyod pa rnams yin/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang bar bsod snyoms blang bar 'du shes nye
262a1(mdo sde): bzhag pas/ nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di ltar de mngon sum du shes pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
262a2(mdo sde): cang la nem nur med pa rnams yin/ chos rang gis rig pa'i phyir the tsom med pa rnams yin/ rang gis lam mthong bas gzhan gyis mi bkri zhing pha rol gyi dring mi 'jog
262a3(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ rab tu zhugs pas 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i gnas gyur pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' cang shes
262a4(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma lta bu rnams yino// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ ma gos pa rnams yin/ sdig pa chung
262a5(mdo sde): ngu dang yang lhan cig mi gnas pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims kyi dri zhim pa rnams yin/ gtsang ba rnams yin/ bzhin 'dzum pa rnams yin/ mi rtsub pa rnams
262a6(mdo sde): yin/ mthong na bkra shis pa rnams yin/ blo rnam par bye ba rnams yin/ blo yongasu smin pa rnams yin/ shin tu yongasu bzung ba rnams yino// rigs kyi bu de
262a7(mdo sde): la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma gos pa yin pa nas/ ji ltar na shin tu yongasasu bzung ba'i thar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pad+ma ni chu'i nang na
262a8(mdo sde): 'byung yang mi chags par skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i chu las 'byung yang mi chags
262b1(mdo sde): par skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i thabs dang shes rab kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyiraro// byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni 'khor ba na spyod kyang 'khor ba
262b2(mdo sde): nyes pa dag gis mi gos te/ de'i thabs de ni shes rab kyis yang dag par zin pa yino// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pad+ma la chu'i thigs pa chung ngu yang mi chag so// bzhin
262b3(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' la sdig pa chung ngu yang mi tshagaso// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa'i phyogs gang du pad+ma skyes par gyur pa'i sa phyogs de dris khyab par 'dug
262b4(mdo sde): de bzhin du yul dang yul gyi phyogs gang na byang chub sems dpa' gnas pa de thams cad tshul khrims kyi dris khyab par 'dug go// rigs kyi 'di lta ste dper na/ 
262b5(mdo sde): pad+ma ni sa'i phyogs gang skyes pa'i sa phyogs dag tsang zhing bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang / grong bar / yul gyi mi thams cad kyang 'du ba yi no// de bzhin
262b6(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' gang skyes kyang rung 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dang / gtsang sbra kun spyod pas gtsang ba yin te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sprin dang / dri za dang / 
262b7(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams 'du ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa
262b8(mdo sde): yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa yino// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pad+ma ni kha bye na 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams kyi yid du 'ong bas
263a1(mdo sde): 'dzub pa lta bur snang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang khro gnyer med cing dbang po shin tu dang zas bzhin rtag tu 'dzub pa yin no// rigs kyi
263a2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/ pad+ma ni rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing mi rtsub pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang rang bzhin gyis 'jab zhing ngal gyis smra ba yin/ mi brlang
263a3(mdo sde): zhing bu tshor mi smra ba'i rang bzhin can yino// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pad+ma ni rmi lam dang ltas dang / yud tsam dag la mthong na yang 'di lta ste/ don 'grub pa'i phyir bkri
263a4(mdo sde): shis shing rab tu bsngags pa yino// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba yang 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba la dus thams cad du yang bkra shis
263a5(mdo sde): shing rab tu bsngags pa yin// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pad+ma ni nam rgyas pa de na rnam par bye ba zhes bya 'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang na
263a6(mdo sde): rab dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog rgyas pa de na/ blo nir bye ba zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pad+ma ni nam yongasu smin par gyur pa de ni/ bltas na mig gi
263a7(mdo sde): dbang po tshim par byed/ mnyan na rna ba'i dbang po tshim par byed/ bsdams na sna'i dbang po tshim par byed/ myangs na lce'i dbang po chem par byed / reg na lus kyi dbang po
263a8(mdo sde): tshim par byed/ sems rab tu dga' bas yid kyi dbang po tshim par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nam shes rab kyi snang ba yongasu srin par gyur pa
263b1(mdo sde): tshe bltas na mig gi dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ mnyan na rna ba'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ tshul khrims dang yon tan gyi dri bsnams na sna'i dbang po rnam par
263b2(mdo sde): dag par byed/ myangs pa na lce'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ reg pa dang bsnyen bkur byed na lus kyi dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ yon tan rjod pa rnam par bas
263b3(mdo sde): pas yid kyi dbang po rnam par dag par byed// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pad+ma ni skye ba'i tshe/ 'di lta ste/ mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis shin tu yongasasu bzung ba yin
263b4(mdo sde): ting de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de ma yin pa gzhan brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
263b5(mdo sde): skyong ba dag gis shin tu yongasasu bzung ba yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma gos pa nas shin tu yongasasu bzung ba'i bar du yin te/ rigs
263b6(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma lta bu rnams yin// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams yin no// 
263b7(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yang dag par bsgrub po zhes sems rgya cher skyed ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya'o zhes sam
263b8(mdo sde): rgya cher skyong // sems can thams cad gdul lo zhes sems rgya cher skyed// byang chub kyi snying por 'dug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzo
264a1(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyo // mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten du dge sbyong 'am/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud 'am/ tshangs pa
264a2(mdo sde): 'am/ sus kyang chos dang ldan par sngon ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par song ste/ sems
264a3(mdo sde): gyi don bya ba'i dngos po de dang de dag gis sems can rnams kyi don bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// shes rab kyi gru sbyar te/ sems can rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las pa
264a4(mdo sde): tu bsgral lo zhes sems rgya cher skyeng ngo // mgon med pa dang skyabs med pa dang / gnas med pa dang rten med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa dang / rtsa lag med pa'i sems can rnams
264a5(mdo sde): kyi rtsa lag bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyeng ngo // lha dang bcas/ bdu nga dang bcas/ tshangs par bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / lha dang / mi da
264a6(mdo sde): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye gu'i nang du sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog nyid bstan to// sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pas rnam par rtse'o// glang
264a7(mdo sde): po che'i lta stangs kyis blta bar bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyong // sangs rgyas kyi che bas sems can rnams gdul bar bya'i spyod pa ngan pas ma yin/ bka' ba spyod pas ma yin/ 
264a8(mdo sde): pa'i spyod pas ma yin/ num pa'i spyod pas ma yino zhes sems rgya cher skyed// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams yin no// 
264b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dag pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bsam pa mi g.yo bas bsam pa phun sum tshogs
264b2(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa la sgyu med pas bsam pa shin tu gnas pa rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi byang chub la yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / rang sangs
264b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi byang chub ling la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / brtson 'grus chung ba'i yid la byed pa mi skyed pas tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ 
264b4(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang bral bas dri ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ sgyu'i spyod lam dang / bral bas lus kyi tshul 'chos dang bral ba rnams yin
264b5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste yang dag pa'i don kun ston pas ngag gi tshul 'chos ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyis 'du 'dzi med pa dang ngag gis 'dod pa chung ba dang sems kyi
264b6(mdo sde): smon pa med pa'i phyir/ sems kyi tshul 'chos pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ cung zad byas pa yang chung mi gson na mang po lta ci smos te/ byas pa bzo ba rnams yin/ byas pa tshor
264b7(mdo sde): ba rnams yin te/ dgos pa byas pa la mi spong mi sbyang yon tan ma yin par mi lta ste/ gzhan du na chung zad byas pa yang tshor zhing de la ston par byed/ gzengs bstod par byed
264b8(mdo sde): yang dag par dga' bar byed/ rab tu bsngags par byed/ de la yon tan du lta ba yin no// ji ltar lta ba de ltar byed pa rnams yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngan ni
265a1(mdo sde): snyan par ston cing sems kyis mi mthun par sems pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gis ston cing sems kyis ngan du bya ba'i sbyor ba mi byed/ 
265a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gis 'jam par smra zhing sems kyis zhe la non te shar gnyer ba ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyis nges pa ston cing sems
265a3(mdo sde): kyis khon gyi mdung par 'dzin pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyis ri mor bya ba ston cing sems kyis brnyas par byed pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rna
265a4(mdo sde): tshul mi 'chos kha gsag mi byed/ ser sna dang phrag dog gis kun tu glags pa ma yin/ sgyu dang g.yos mi spyod/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'thab sman mi byed
265a5(mdo sde): phan tshur ngu dpa' ba 'jug pa ma yin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus kyis kyang ri mo skyed pa yin/ ngag gis kyang yang dag pa'i don smra/ las su
265a6(mdo sde): yang sgrub po// byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur ba rnam
265a7(mdo sde): yin na// ji ltar nang bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur ba ma btab pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chubo tu sa
265a8(mdo sde): skyed ngo // skra dang kha spu bregs gos ngur smrig ngag gon nas/ yang dag par dang pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo // de rab tu byung ba na rgyal pos
265b1(mdo sde): mnar ba med par rab tu 'byung / rkun pos 'tshe ba med pa dang / bu lon gyis 'tshe ba med pa dang / 'jigs pas 'tshe ba med pa dang / 'tshe ba med pa'i 'jigs pas smras
265b2(mdo sde): pa med par rab tu 'byung // de dang de rab tu byung nas dge ba ci yin zhes tshol ba yin te/ de dge ba ci yin zhes tshol bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen par byed/ 
265b3(mdo sde): bsten par byed/ bsnyen bkur byed do// de dag las chos kyang nyan to// thos nas kyang nan tan du bye nga rgyal gyi zil gyis mnon pa yin te/ deng rgyal dang bral bsam
265b4(mdo sde): log par 'dzin pa yin/ ma log par 'dzin pas lam shin tu rtogs pa 'thob po// de lam shin tu rtogs pas chos nyid 'thob bo// chos nyid thob pas na ba
265b5(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur te/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur pa ma btab pa yino// rigs kyi bu chos bcu
265b6(mdo sde): po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dag pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems ner nur med pa rnams man/ 
265b7(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba dang / 
265b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub dang de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang / theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan pa dang / tshul sna tshogs bstan pa dang / de
266a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo dang / sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba mngon par dang ngo // rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na de bzhin gnas
266a2(mdo sde): pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dad pa nas/ ji ltar sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad pa'i bar du zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems
266a3(mdo sde): dpa' 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku dang zhi ba'i sku dang mi mnyam pa'i sku dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sku dang / tshad med pa'i sku dang / 
266a4(mdo sde): phal la med pa'i sku dang / rdo rje'i sku zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med the tsom med de// de ltar
266a5(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dang ngo // ji ltar na byang chub sem sa dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs gi gsang ba la mngon
266a6(mdo sde): bar dang ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa mngon tu lung ston pa dang / gsang ste lung ston pa dang / ldem pa
266a7(mdo sde): ngag gis sdang sems can rnams la lung tshun mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa'am/ tsatsam dang / ra phying ngal brdzun du smra ba'i nyes pa'i 'byungango // de ci'i phyir zhen/ 
266a8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ni kun thams cad spangs pa/ dri ma thams cad spangs pa/ rdul thams cad spangs pa/ yong su gdu ba thams cad dang bral ba/ tshan mongs pa med ga
266b1(mdo sde): du gyur pa/ zhig dang ba/ yong su dag pa/ rnyog pa med pa rnam par gsal ba ste/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'khrul pa'am/ ca co 'byung ba de ni gnas ma yin ning
266b2(mdo sde): skabs med do zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la nem nur med the tsom med de de ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
266b3(mdo sde): gsung gi gsang ba la mngon par dang ngo // ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sem so// gang 'di
266b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pas ci dgongs pa'i don gang sems dang 'grogs pa/ sems la gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi
266b5(mdo sde): rlabs kyis gyur pa ma gtogs par/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chu ba sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems can thams cad
266b6(mdo sde): shes par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni zab cing gting dpag dka' brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul las shin tu
266b7(mdo sde): 'das pa dpag tu med pa rgya che ba yangs pa na mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa/ rtog ge thams cad kyi yul las 'das par thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o
266b8(mdo sde): 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med the tsom med pa yin te/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba la mngon par dad ngo do// ji ltar na byang
267a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub pa la mngon par dang ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di byang chub kyi rgyu byang chub kyi rga
267a2(mdo sde): byang chub kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can gyi don la mngon du phyogs pa dang / sems can gyi bya ba dang / sems can gyi byed pa dang / yongasu mi skyo ba dang / 
267a3(mdo sde): mi skrag pa dang / khung chen po khyer ba dang / mthu brtan pa dang / brtul ba brtan pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mthar
267a4(mdo sde): yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i blo dang / mtha' yas pa'i blo dang / mi mnyam pa'i blo dang / phal la med pa'i blo dang / brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / cho ga brtan
267a5(mdo sde): pa dang / dam bcas pa las mi g.yo ba dang / dam bcas pa pa la la med pa de dag thams cad rim gyis 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par yong su rdzogs
267a6(mdo sde): par 'gyuraro zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med the tsom med/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang ga
267a7(mdo sde): bar sgrub pa la mngon par dang ngo // ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba la mngon par dadang ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang byang chub
267a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'dug nas/ lha'i mig chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa sgrib pa med pa 'thob bo// lha'i rna ba dang / gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi
267b1(mdo sde): gnas rjesu dran pa'i shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa dang / dus gsum pa skad cig gcig pa dang ldan pas shes pa/ chags pa med pa
267b2(mdo sde): thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa 'thob bo// de'i phyir sems can gyi khams la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lta ste/ sems can 'di rnams ni lus kyi ngan du spyong pa dang
267b3(mdo sde): ldan pa/ ngag gi ngan du spyong pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa/ log par lta ba rnams te/ log par lta ba'i las dang
267b4(mdo sde): / chos yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir/ myu re dang rkyen de dang / gzhi nges lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye'o// sems can 'di
267b5(mdo sde): rnams ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur ba
267b6(mdo sde): mi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba rnams te/ yang dag par lta ba'i las dang chos yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir/ rgyu de dang rkyen de dang / gzhi des lus zhig nas/ bde 'gro mtho rim
267b7(mdo sde): kyi 'jig rten gyi lha'i nang du skye'o smrab nas de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams la bltas te// sems can gyi khams de nyid dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las
267b8(mdo sde): rnams rnam par lta'o// nga yang 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyang ba spyod pas gang 'di ltar bdag nyid rnam par sangs rgyas nas/ gzhan yang rnam
268a1(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas par bya'o zhes ngam bcas pa'i bdag gi smon lam de yong su rdzogaso// bdag gi brnag pa de yong su rdzogaso snya mo zhes thos pa 'di ni yang / 
268a2(mdo sde): pa'os 'dzin de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la re nem nur med the tsom me // gang la byang chub sems dpa' de rnam par sangs rgyas pa de ni byang chub ces
268a3(mdo sde): bya'o// bdag nyid rnam par sangs rgyas pas nges na rdzogs par sangs rgyas shes bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba la mngon
268a4(mdo sde): bar dngango // ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan pa la mngon par rang ce na/ de 'di snyam du sem so// gang 'di theg pa ni gcig kho na ste/ 'di lnga sdeng bami
268a5(mdo sde): pa'i thed pa'o zhes thos pa 'dri ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni dri'o na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o// 'di ni de bzhin no// ma nor ba'o// gzhan ma yin ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
268a6(mdo sde): theg pa gzhan rnams kyang 'di las 'byung // rigs kyi bu 'di lnga ste dper na/ 'dzam bu'i gling na gang gling yong pa rnams ming gis tha dad par shes mod kyi 'on kyang
268a7(mdo sde): ngag ni 'dzam bu'i gling du 'du'o// 'dzam bu'i gling la ston to// 'dzam bu'i gling gi grangasu 'gro'o// de'i phyir na gling gcig kho na ste/ 'di ni 'dzam bu'i glingo // de bzhin du theg pa
268a8(mdo sde): thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg par 'du'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa la gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa las byung ngo // de'i phyir theg pa mi
268b1(mdo sde): pa kho na ste/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med the tsom medade/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan pa
268b2(mdo sde): la mngon par dang ngo // ji ltar na tshul sna tshogs bstan pa la mngon par dang cen/ de 'di snyam du sem so// gang 'di mdo sde dang de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa tshul sna
268b3(mdo sde): tshogs bshang ba thob pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o 'di ni mi slu ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dad pa ji lta ba bzhin
268b4(mdo sde): du sems can rnams la chos ston to snyam te/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med the tsom med de// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul sna tshogs bstan pa la mngon
268b5(mdo sde): par dang ngo // ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs sgra'i dbyangs zab mo la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du semaso// gang 'di de bzhin
268b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i gsung smra'i dbyangs zab mo thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyi dbya
268b7(mdo sde): kyang zab cing snyam pa yin na/ bskal pa brgya stong du mar dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lta ci smos snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med the tshom
268b8(mdo sde): med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo la mngon par dang ngo // rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
269a1(mdo sde): byi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dang ce na/ de 'di snyam du sem so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa bsam pa dang bag la nyal mkhyen te/ sems
269a2(mdo sde): can mos pa tha dad pa dang / 'dul ba tha dad pa rnams la gsung sgra'i dbyangs gcig brjod pas/ the tsom gcod cing yongasu smin pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams 'du 'o// seMs
269a3(mdo sde): can rnams kyang so so nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdag la chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag la chos ston to// snyam byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par
269a4(mdo sde): mi rtog go zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni pi spu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nung med the tsam med de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems
269a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems can gyi khams pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon car ngang ngo // rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems ne pa nur
269a6(mdo sde): med pa rnams yin/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ bya nga chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i 'byung gnasu gyur
269a7(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ zab cing gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ rgya che zhing tshadang med pa rnams yin/ bags kyis gzhol ba rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i ro dang ldan cig mi 'dug
269a8(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ ro gcig pa rnams yin/ chu bo kun zeng pa rnams yin/ dus las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ 'byung po mang po'i gan su gyur pa rnams yin/ mi zad pa rnams yin/ 
269b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin pa nas/ ji ltar na mi zad pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen
269b2(mdo sde): po ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas te/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi thams cad kyis rin po che blang bas mi bzang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yon tan rin po che thams
269b3(mdo sde): cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ sems can thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che blang bas mi zang ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dazer na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni zab cing gting babag dka'
269b4(mdo sde): ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dadag par grub pa yang / rab cing sems can thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yino// rigs
269b5(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di lta ste/ chu tshang med pas na yangs shing rgya che ba yin// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/ blo tshad med pas na
269b6(mdo sde): yangs shing rgya che ba yin// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni bags kyis gzhol/ bags kyis 'bab/ thags kyis zab bo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
269b7(mdo sde): yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'bab/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bab bo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni ni
269b8(mdo sde): ba'i ro dang lhan cig mi 'dug go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni rgya mtsho chen po'i chos nyid do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i ro dang mi dge ba'i grogs/ 
270a1(mdo sde): po rnams dang lhan cig mi gan so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po chu bo ji snyed
270a2(mdo sde): 'bab pa de thams cad kyang ro gcig pa yin te/ 'di lta ste lan tsa'i ro'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos dkar po rnams ji snyed sdud pa de thams cad ro gcig
270a3(mdo sde): pa yin te/ 'di lta ste thams cad mkhyen pa'i ro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni chu zo chang med pa kun zed kyang de la bri ba 'am/ gang bar yang mi mngon
270a4(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi chu bo tshad me nga ba kun zed kyang de la bri ba'am/ gang bar mi mngon no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta sde dper na/ rgya ma
270a5(mdo sde): chen po ni dus las mi yol lo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'dul bar bya ba'i sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i dus las mi yol lo// rigs kyi bu
270a6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni 'byung po mang po'i gnaso// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad dang chos dkar po thams cad kyi gnas so
270a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni sems can thams cad kyis chu bcus kyang mi zad pa yino// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can the la
270a8(mdo sde): chos ston pa mi zad pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'byung gan su gyur pa nas mi zad pa'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos
270b1(mdo sde): de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo zhib pa rnams yin
270b2(mdo sde): no bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad brtag pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong
270b3(mdo sde): du chung ba rnams yin/ chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du khong du chung ba rnams yin/ chos thams cad yongasu shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ rten cing 'breng bar
270b4(mdo sde): 'byung ba zab cing gting dpag dka' ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ las bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ smras pa'i don shes pa rnams yin/ don yang
270b5(mdo sde): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa rnams yin/ de kho na lam khas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba tshol ba la maH
270b6(mdo sde): pa yin pa nas/ ji ltar na de kho na la mkhas pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste 'dod chags kyi
270b7(mdo sde): mes kun tu 'bar ro// rab tu 'gyur ro// kun tu rab tu 'bar ro// kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/ zhe sdang gi dub 'khrigs pa'i du ba 'tshubs pas rnam par rmongs
270b8(mdo sde): kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/ gzi mug gi mun pas sun nag tu gyur ta m+b+ha'o// nga na 'di ltar sems can 'di dag ni ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur snyal sems te// 
271a1(mdo sde): ngag gi 'byung ba yongasu tshol zhing chos thams cad la rtog go// chos thams cad la rtog pas chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud bar 'gyuraro// chos thaMng
271a2(mdo sde): kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas chos thams cad spru la'i mtshan nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos rnams sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du
271a3(mdo sde): rab tu shes pas/ chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yo ngasu shes pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung
271a4(mdo sde): ba zab mo la rnam par semaso// de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo la rnam par sems pas/ las bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par rtog ste/ de 'di snyam du dngos po med
271a5(mdo sde): pa'i chos rnams la/ las sna tshogs snang ba ni ngo mtshar to/ snyam du sem so// de ltar de blo zhib mo dang ldan pa sa sangs rgyas rnams sam/ byang chub sems dpa'
271a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi gsungs pa tsam gyis don sheso// nges don shes pas don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog so// don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pas de kho na mthong ngo // de
271a7(mdo sde): kho na mthong bas sems can rnams 'khor ba'i btson ra nas thar par byed de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba tshol thal mkhas pa nas de kho na la
271a8(mdo sde): mkhas pa'i bar du yino// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo zhib pa rnams yin// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa
271b1(mdo sde): rigs pa'i spobs pa can rnams yino// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bdag med par 'jog go// chos thams cad sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gsob
271b2(mdo sde): med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po med pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa dang / gsog gso ba ste dbang phyug med pa dang / stong pa yang dag pas
271b3(mdo sde): yin pa kun btags pa dang rkyen las byung bar 'jog ste/ rigs kyi bu de la chos thams cad bdag med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa'o// 'di ni chos nyid dang 'thun pa'o// chos thams
271b4(mdo sde): cad sems can med pa srog med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa'o// 'di ni chos nyid dang 'thun pa'o// de bzhin du chos thams cad gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / byed pa po dang / 
271b5(mdo sde): tshor ba po med pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa dang / gsog gsob ste dbang phyug med pa dang / stong pa yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa dang / rkyen las byung
271b6(mdo sde): ba'o zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa'o// 'di ni chos nyid dang 'thun pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang chos nyid dang 'thun pa ni rigs pa'o// gang chos nyid dang mi 'gal ba de ni rigs pa'o// gang
271b7(mdo sde): chos nyid las mi 'khrul pa de ni rigs pa'o// gang chos nyid la 'thab pa de ni rigs pa'o// gang chos nyid ston pa de ni rigs pa'o// de yang de dag la spobs pas na de'i phyir rigs pa
271b8(mdo sde): spobs pa rnams shes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rigs pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ bya
272a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams yino// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mi zad pa rnams yin/ spong
272a2(mdo sde): ba rgyun chags pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mi btabs pa rnams yin/ spobs pa ma zhum pa rnams yin/ spongs pa mi skrag pa rnams yin/ spobs pa phal la med pa rnams
272a3(mdo sde): yin/ spobs pa zil gyis mnon pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa rnams yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu
272a4(mdo sde): po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams yin// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang lnga na na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i spob
272a5(mdo sde): pa can rnams yino// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'dar 'dar po me nga pi'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ mi 'khrul pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ mi zhan pa'i spobs
272a6(mdo sde): pacan rnams yin/ yang leng po med pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ de dag gi spobs pa don dang bral ba ma yin/ tshig 'bru dang bral ba ma yin/ sbyor ba dang bral ba ma yin/ 
272a7(mdo sde): dus dang bral ba ma yin/ rtsub pa ma yin/ mi gsal ba'i spobs pa ma yin// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa 'angar 'angar po ma yino// de ci'i phyir na
272a8(mdo sde): na/ 'khor gyi 'jigs pa'i bag tsha ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni 'khrul pa ma yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba
272b1(mdo sde): phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni mi zhan pa rnams yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor
272b2(mdo sde): nang du phyin na mi 'jigs mi skrag ste/ seng+ge ltar 'jigs pa med cing mi skrag mi dngang pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa yang yong po med pa yino// de ci'i phyir
272b3(mdo sde): zhe na/ nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i spobs pa ni yeng yeng por 'gyur ba yin te/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i ni ma yin no// byang
272b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni don dang bral ba ma yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu chos nyid ma thob pa rnams kyi ni don dang bral ba
272b5(mdo sde): 'gyur gyi/ chos nyid thob pa rnams kyi ni ma yino// byang chu ba sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni tshig la bru dang bral ba ma yi no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsun bcos
272b6(mdo sde): thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu bstan bcos kyi phyogs 'ga' shes pa rnams kyi ni tshig 'bru dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ bstan bcos tha~Mng la mkhas pa rnam
272b7(mdo sde): kyi ni ma yi no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs pa'i sbyor bdang bral ba mayin// nga ci'i phyir zhe na/ stospyong ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi
272b8(mdo sde): sbyor ba la mi mkhas pa rnams kyi ni spyong ba dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ sbyong ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni ma yin// byang chub sems da'ir rnams kyi spongs pa ni/ gang
273a1(mdo sde): phyis smra bar bya ba de ni sngar smra ba 'am/ gang sngar smra bar bya ba de phyis smra ba lta bur dus dang bral ba ma yin// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dus
273a2(mdo sde): shes pa yin/ tshong shes pa yin/ dus shes pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni rtsub pa mi mi 'ong ba mi snyam pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngag gi gnas ngan
273a3(mdo sde): len dang bral ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu gnas ngan len dang bcas pa rnams kyi spobs pa ni rtsub pa yin gyi/ gnas ngan len dang bral ba rnams kyi ni ma yin no// byang chub sems da
273a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi spobs pa ni mi gsal ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbang po rno ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dbang po rtul po rnams kyi spobs pa ni mi gsal ba yin gyi/ dbang po dang po rnas
273a5(mdo sde): kyi ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang lnga na na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i sgo bas pa can rnams yino// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang
273a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams yino// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'jam par smra ba rnams yin/ bzhin 'dzub zhing khro gnyer po
273a7(mdo sde): pa rna bas yin/ don du smra ba rnams yin/ cho su smra ba rnams yin/ mtshungs par smra ba rnams yin/ mi ngom ra rnams yin/ brnyas pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ nyon mongs par 'gyur
273a8(mdo sde): ba med pa rnams yin/ 'khrug pa med pa rnams yin/ spongs pa sna tshogs pa rnams yino// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'jam par smra ba ni/ 'jam par smrabs sen na
273b1(mdo sde): mgu bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' ni bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa yin te/ mngangs bzang pos sems can rnams mgu bar bye'o// byang chub sems dpa' don tu smra ba ni/ 
273b2(mdo sde): tshig ran pas sems can rnams 'gru bar bye'o// byang chub sems dpa' chosu smra ba ni phan par sbubs sems can rnams mgu bar bye'o// byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs
273b3(mdo sde): smra ba ni sems can thams cad la mtshungs par chos ston pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' mi ngom pa ni nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / rgyag
273b4(mdo sde): pa dang bral zhing spyod pa mtshungs pas sems can rnams mgu bar bye'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnyas pa dang bral ba ni ri mor byas shing chos bstan pas sems can
273b5(mdo sde): rnams mgu thar byeng ngo // byang chub sems dang 'anyon mongs par 'gyur ba med pa yin/ nga chu la nges pas sems can rnams mgu bar bye'o// byang chub sems
273b6(mdo sde): dpa' 'khrug pa med pa ni bzod pa mang bas sems can rnams mgu bar bye // rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa sna tshogs can ni dga' ba'i tshig gis sems
273b7(mdo sde): can rnams mgu bar byeda'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin// / 
273b8(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshig gzung ba rnams yino// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snod du ma gyur pa'i seMn rnams la chos
274a1(mdo sde): // mi ston te/ zhe 'gras pa rnams la ma yin/ sman ka tshol ba rnams la ma yin/ mu stegs can rnams la ma yin/ ri mo med pa rnams la ma yin/ mdang ba ma
274a2(mdo sde): rnams la ma yin/ g.yo dang sbrus glags pa rnams la ma yin/ 'tshol ba'i bsam pa can rnams la ma yin/ rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti dang / phrag dog dang / ser snas glags
274a3(mdo sde): pa rnams la ma yin/ sems can glen pa rmongs pa lugs ltar lkugs pa'i rang bzhin can rnams la chos mi ston to// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam
274a4(mdo sde): la chos kyi ser sna yang med/ chos la slob dpon 'chab pa yang med/ sems can rnams la ri nor mi byed pa yang med/ sems can gyi don la rgyab kyis phyogs pa la
274a5(mdo sde): med mod kyi/ sems can 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'i chos 'dul ba'i sdong du ma gyur pa'o zhes btang masu gnas pa rnams yino// byang chub sems dpa
274a6(mdo sde): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na sems can ci 'dra ba rnams la sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston/ bcom
274a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can dang pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston to// sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba smin pa
274a8(mdo sde): rnams dang / snod du gyur pa rnams dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa'i rnams dang / g.yo med pa rnams dang / sgyu med pa rnams dang / spyod lam mi 'chos pa rnams dang / 
274b1(mdo sde): rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti la chags pa dang bral ba rnams dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu zin pa rnams dang
274b2(mdo sde): tshul bzang po dang ldan pa rnams dang / legs par ston nus pa rnams dang / dbang po rno ba gang bshad pa'i don rig par 'gyur ba de thob par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus
274b3(mdo sde): brtsams pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin byed par 'gyur ba'i sems can de lta bu dag la/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems
274b4(mdo sde): dpa' rnams chos ston to// rigs kyi grus bcu pod ngag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshig gzung ba rnams yin// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ 
274b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos rjod pa rnams yin// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag pab bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
274b6(mdo sde): rnams dang yang dag par bsgrub pa yang mi dmig so// pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsgrub pa yang mi
274b7(mdo sde): dmigaso// byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir/ chos sngon kyang byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa yang mi dmig so// nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i phyir chos ston
274b8(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa spangs pa yang mi dmig so// skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'gog pa'i phyir chos ston kyang skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'gog pa yid
275a1(mdo sde): dmig so// rgyun tu zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ chos sngon kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa yang mi dmig so// lan ci
275a2(mdo sde): phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba yang mi dmig so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang mi dmig so// dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ chos ston kyang dgra bcom pa dang dgra ba
275a3(mdo sde): ba'i 'bras bu yang mi dmig so// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ chos ston kyang rang sang+yas dang rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu yang mi dmig so// bdag tu 'dzin pa la ma
275a4(mdo sde): ba bzhen pa spang ba'i phyir/ chos ston kyang bdag du 'dzin pa yang mi dmigs las kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'jog mod kyi/ las ngang las kyi rnam par smin pa yang mi dmig so// de ci'i
275a5(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ chos gang ming gang gis rjod pa de ming ngos yod pa ma yin// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid ni yi ge'i rang bzhin ma yin/ yi ge rnams ni chos
275a6(mdo sde): nyid kyi rang bzhin ma yin mod kyi/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa la rten/ tha snyad la brten brtags pa la brten te/ ming med pa'i chos rnams la ming du 'jog ste/ ming de yang gsob po gsog go// gang
275a7(mdo sde): gsob dang / gsog de la don dam pa medo// gang la don das pa med pa de brdzun te/ sU ba'i chos so// gang brdzun ning slu ba'i chos de ni byis pa'i skye bo spu ba'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po dag
275a8(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos rjod pa rnams yin no// dkon mchog sprin/ bam po lnga pa// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa sa
275b1(mdo sde): rjesu 'brang ba rnams yin// bcu gang zhe na 'di ste ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi rjes 'ang 'brang la/ gzugs las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjesasu yang 'brang la
275b2(mdo sde): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjesu yang 'brang ba/ 'dod pa'i khams las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjesu yang 'brang la/ ga
275b3(mdo sde): kyi khams las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la/ gzugs med pa'i khams las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjesu yang 'brang la/ chos las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rje su yang 'brang
275b4(mdo sde): la/ chos las 'da' bar yang mi 'gyur/ chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la/ sems can gyi phyir yang mi 'brang / chos kyi rjesu yang 'brang la/ chad par lta ba'i phyir yang mi 'brang / chos kyi rjes
275b5(mdo sde): yang 'brang la/ lam las kyang mi 'byung ste/ de ni thabs mkhas pa// dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi phyiraro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos
275b6(mdo sde): kyi rjesu 'brang ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldanan/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa rnams yino// bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste/ shes rab can rnams yin/ dge
275b7(mdo sde): ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu bzung ba rnams yin/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ shin tu yongasu dag pa rnams yin/ gang pas ngag la
275b8(mdo sde): ri mo dang bcas pa rnams yin/ stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ dmigs par lta ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ lam du zhugs pa rnams yin/ de kho na mthong ba rnams yin no// rig
276a1(mdo sde): / kyi tha byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang ldan pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen tshol te// des dge ba'i ba shes gnyedan bathong nas dga' ning ras te/ de la ston par 'du shes
276a2(mdo sde): skyed cing de la brten te gan so// de dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pas na/ mi dge ba'i chos thams thams cad spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson
276a3(mdo sde): 'grus brtsams pa yin no// brtson 'grus brtsams pas na sgrib pa thams cad nub par 'gyur ro// sgrib pa med cing lam gyi rgyun ma chad pas shin tu yongasu dag cing lus dang ngag dang yid kyi
276a4(mdo sde): gnas ngan len dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de shin tu yongasu dag pas gangams ngag la ri mo dang bcas pa yin no// de gdams ngag la ri bo dang bcas pas stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang ba yin/ 
276a5(mdo sde): stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang bas dmigs pa'i lta bar mi 'gyu ro// de dmigs pa'i lta ba dang bral bas lam pu drug go// de lam du zhugs pas de kho na mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa
276a6(mdo sde): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de kho na zhes bgyi bde ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ de khon zhes bya ba 'dzin
276a7(mdo sde): yang ga pa'i don gyi tshig blangags so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ci lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang pi sbu ba de ri yang
276a8(mdo sde): pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi smra ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
276b1(mdo sde): nyid do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di ni so sor rang gis rig pa yin 'di ni yi/ 
276b2(mdo sde): ge dag gis gdams par mi nuso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos 'di ni yi ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ smra ba thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ tshig gi spyod yul thams
276b3(mdo sde): las yang dag par 'das pa/ ngag gi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'angs pa/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba/ blang ba dang dor ba thams cad dang bral ba/ bye ba dang btsums paza
276b4(mdo sde): dang bral ba/ rtog ge thams dang bral ba/ brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma dang bral ba/ mtshan
276b5(mdo sde): ma'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ byis pa'i yul/ las yang dag par 'das pa/ bdud tha~Md kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul las yang dag
276b6(mdo sde): par 'das pa/ rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ gnas pa ma yin pa mi gnas pa/ zhi ba pags pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul te/ de dag nyid kyi so so rang gis rig
276b7(mdo sde): pa dri ma med pa gos pa dang / rnam par dag pa gya nom pa mchog dam pa/ phul brtag pa brtan pa/ ther zug mi 'jig pa'i chos can yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang ru
276b8(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings 'di ni 'dug pa kho na'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos nyid thos nas/ son dag kyang chos nyid 'di kho na la rag tung gong ngo snyam ste/ don gang gi phyir 'bar
277a1(mdo sde): cing rtsol ba dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dka' ba brgya dag byed pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i
277a2(mdo sde): bya'o// rnam pa zeng mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings shes bya'o// gnyi su meng ba'i dbyings shes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib patheng rnam par sel bas nas
277a3(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ji ltar mngon du bgyi ji ltar khong du chung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyis mngon du bya
277a4(mdo sde): rang gis rig par khong du chud par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyis mngon tu bgyi ba de/ rang gis rig pa
277a5(mdo sde): khong du chud pa nyid ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu pa yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyis ni chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ngo // 
277a6(mdo sde): lus kyis ni mngon tu byu // byang chub sems dpa' sgring pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu gang dag gis thos pa las byung ba 'am/ bsam pa las
277a7(mdo sde): byung ba'i shes pas khong du chung bar gyur pa de rang gis rig pa ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ma yin te/ thos pa tsam 'am/ bsam pa tsam gyis ni ra
277a8(mdo sde): gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nuso// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na dpe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'brog chen por mos ka'i zla ba tha ma la mi la la nig shar phyogs nas
277b1(mdo sde): nub phyogasu 'gro la/ de nas mi gzhan zhig nub phyogs nas shar phyog su 'ong ste/ de yang sos ka'i tsha bas yongasu gsum par gyur nas skom gyis nyen pa de/ shar phyogs nas 'ong ba'i mi de la
277b2(mdo sde): skad ces smras pa/ kye skyes bu kho bo sos ka'i tsha bas yongasu gdungs te skob gyis nyen na/ gang na mtsho 'am/ lteng ka 'am/ rdzing gang chu bsil ba dang rnyog pa med pa gsal bas gang ba yo
277b3(mdo sde): gang du bdagi che ba dang sgom pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i lam bdag la ston cig ces ze re la/ shar phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i mi de yang lam shes pa lam la mkhas pa/ lam mthong ba
277b4(mdo sde): gyi mtshan ma mthong ba zhig yin te/ des de na chu'i nyes pa dang bral ba'i chu sngan chad mthong la/ sngon myangs shing sngon yang zhugs pa yin te/ nges mi de la 'di skad du kye grogs po lam 'ang
277b5(mdo sde): nas lam kha brag mthong gi bar du song la/ kye skyes bu khyod kyis g.yo na gyi lam bor te/ g.yas kyi lam nas nags tsha sngon po dang nags tshal de'i dbus na/ 'tsho 'am/ lteng
277b6(mdo sde): rdzing chu bsil zhing da nga rnyog pa med pa gsal bas gang ba mthong gi bar du song la/ der skyes bu khyod sgom pa dang / che ba med par byos shig ces zer na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems
277b7(mdo sde): sos ka'i mabs yongasu gdungs te/ sbom gyis nyen pa'i minges/ chu thom ma thag dang / bsams pa tsam gyis tsha ba med par 'gyur ram/ sgom pa dang bral bar 'gyur rag/ chu
277b8(mdo sde): ba yang rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das mi de na ma der phyin nas/ des chu der zhugs te 'tshal bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ mi de tsha tha ma ma
278a1(mdo sde): / par 'gyu ro// skom pa dang yang bral bar 'gyu ro// nges bsil ba yang rang gis rig par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu thos pa
278a2(mdo sde): tsam dang / bsapas pa tsam gyis rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chung bar mi nu so// de la rigs kyi bu 'brog ces bya ba de ni 'khor ba'i 'brog gis tshig bla dag so// mi sos ka'i tshabs
278a3(mdo sde): yongasu gdungs shing skom gyis nyen pa zhes bya ba de ni/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung bas yongasu gdungs shing / yul gyi sring pas nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshig bla ngag so// lam shes pa'i
278a4(mdo sde): mi zhes bya ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la mkhas pa chos myong ba chos rang gis rig pa rnams kyi tshig bla dgas so// chu bsil zhing dngas
278a5(mdo sde): la rnyog pa med pa/ gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di ni don dam pa'i chos nyid kyiHga bla dag so// yang rigs kyi bu dpe zhon cig/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ gal te de bzhin
278a6(mdo sde): pa che'i tshang bskal par bzhugs ste/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams kyi mdun du 'di lta ste/ lnga'i bdud rtsi dri zhim pa dang gtsang ba dang / gya nom pa dang / shin tu zhim pa dang / reg na 'ang
278a7(mdo sde): las brtsams te bsngags pa brjod rigs kyi bu de ji sA pa sems/ ci sems can de dag gis lnga'i bdud rtsi de'i bsngags pa rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol ga bcom ldan 'a
278a8(mdo sde): ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis ji ltar thos pa tsam 'am/ bsams pa tsam gyis rang gis rig pa'i
278b1(mdo sde): du chung bar mi nus par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang dpe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mi zhig gis shing rtog gis rnam par sngon sems can sus kyang ma myangs pa zhig bya
278b2(mdo sde): par gyur la/ des mi gzhan zhig gi mdun du shing rtog gi rnam pa de'i bsngags pa 'di lta ste/ kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dang / ro phun sum tshogs pa dang / dri zhim pa las brtsams te
278b3(mdo sde): brjod na rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems kyi la nges shing tog gi rong rang zhes rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
278b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis ji ltar thos pa tsam 'am/ bsams pa tsam gyis so so rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus par rig par bya'o// 
278b5(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gso la pa/ bcom ldan 'das legs par gsung so// bde bar gshegs pa shin tu legs par gsung so// 
278b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi tshul 'dis dag gi rnar thos par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di khong du chud pa nyid du ga par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
278b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di thos par bgyi ba la 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhi no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi
278b8(mdo sde): de dag gis chos 'di thob par bya ba la/ 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa rnams
279a1(mdo sde): man rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul pa rnams yin// bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste/ stobs kyi stong pa'i
279a2(mdo sde): kyang rab tu shes/ mi 'jigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ sangs rgyas kyi rlos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ rgyal khrims kyi phung ba'i stong pa nyid kyang
279a3(mdo sde): tu shes/ ting 'dzin gyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shis/ shes rab kyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ rnar
279a4(mdo sde): tshul ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i thung po'i spong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ skyong ba'i stong ba nyid kyang rab tu shes/ don dam pa'i spong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes te/ ngo'i rgyu
279a5(mdo sde): rkyen de dang gni nges stong pa nyid du dmigs pa dang / nga ba nyid du 'dzin pa dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid la gnas pa 'ang mi dmigs rgyu dang rkyen de dang gni
279a6(mdo sde): nges med par yang mi ltu'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul ba rnams yin// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ 
279a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams yin// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ phyi rol gyi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams yin/ nang gi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams yin/ 
279a8(mdo sde): spros pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ g.yo ba thams cad pang bral
279b1(mdo sde): rnams yin/ rgyu ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ dmigs par bya ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa rnams yin/ rnam par shes par
279b2(mdo sde): bya ba'i dngos po mi dmigs pa rnams yino// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams yi no// de nas bsngon 'das la
279b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan ma ma mchis pa la gnas pa
279b4(mdo sde): yang de 'dra na// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ci 'dra bar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// de ci'i phyir
279b5(mdo sde): zhe na/ bsam pa'i yul dang bral ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rjesu pas mas na/ sems can thaMng mos par 'gyur gyi/ de bzhin gshegs
279b6(mdo sde): pa'i chos nyid kyi pha rol tam tshu rol mthong bar mi 'gyur/ mi dmigs te/ tha mar na dub pa'i skal pa can du 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni
279b7(mdo sde): zab cing gting dbag dka' la bsam gyis mi khyab pa dpag tu med pa rgya che ba na mkha' dang 'dra ba rtog ge pa thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa/ dmigs pa can tha~Md kyi yul las
279b8(mdo sde): 'das pa ste/ de ni brtag pa 'am/ bsam pa 'am/ gzhal ba 'am/ tshad gzung bar mi nuso// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa zed rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ gal te nus nas nub
280a1(mdo sde): lung bstan pa'i slang du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bdagra bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
280a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu skabs phyes khyod dris shig/ byang chub sems
280a3(mdo sde): dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bdag bstod na ni bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa'i chosu gsungs na/ de ji ltar chos kyi rje/ bcom ldan
280a4(mdo sde): 'das nyid la bdag la bstong pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bA ka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legaso leg so// khyod kyi sa dri ba tshul bzhin du dris so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir
280a5(mdo sde): legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad ngo // bcom ldan 'das leg so zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa theng rnam par sel ba/ bcom ldan
280a6(mdo sde): 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni seMn 'di dag la ci nas kyang / phan pa dang bde ba dang / chos
280a7(mdo sde): nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir bdag stong pa ma gtogs par/ nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non pa dang rnyed pa'i zil gyis non pa dang / bkur bsti'i zil gyis non pa dang / grags pa 'dod pa dang
280a8(mdo sde): shes kyi khe 'dor ba'i phyir tshul 'chos pa 'am/ kha gsag med cing yang dag pa ma yin par bdag bstod pa ma yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa
280b1(mdo sde): dga' ba dang dad pa dang / rangs pa nye bar gzhag pas chos bston pa'i skal pa yod par 'gyur/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyi snod du 'gyur te/ de yang de dag la yun ring por don dang phan pa/ 
280b2(mdo sde): dang bde bar 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sems can 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu
280b3(mdo sde): ma 'tshal tam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu mi sheso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i seMn rnams ni rgya chung ngu la mos pa/ dam
280b4(mdo sde): tshegs la mos pa/ shes rab chung ba/ dang pa chung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngus brtan pa dag ste/ de dag gris de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi che ba mi shes pas/ de bzhin gcu
280b5(mdo sde): pa bdag nyid bdag gi yon tan gyis bsngags pa brjod pa mdzad de/ de'ang nan gyi sgrub bo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste de ra na/ sman pa mkhas pa zhig yod la son rnams
280b6(mdo sde): kyang nad kyis nyen par gyur/ sa'i phyogs de na 'ang / sman pa de gcig pur zad de/ gnyi su med la/ de'i yon tan gyi che ba sus kyang mi shes pa dang / de nas sman pa de 'di snyam du
280b7(mdo sde): sems te/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni sdug bsngal ba nad kyis nyen pa/ sman la mi mkhas pa gnod pa la spen pa yin gyis/ bdag gis de dag gso bar bya'o snyam nas/ sman
280b8(mdo sde): pa des sems can de dag gi mdun du/ kye sems can dag bdag ni sman pa sten nang la mkhas pa'o// nad kyi gzhi la mkhas pa'o// sman la mkhas pa'o zhes bdag gi yon tan
281a1(mdo sde): gyi bsngags pa bdag nyid kyis brjod pa dang / sems can de dag 'di ni sman pa'o zhes bya bar shes shing / yid ches par gyur nas sman pa de la rten to// de nas
281a2(mdo sde): sman pa de sems can de dag gso zhing nang du zhi bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ sman pa de bdag la bstod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lagaso/ 
281a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa yang sman pa'i rgyal po chen po bla na med pa ste/ nyon mongs pa'i nang la mkhas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi gzhi
281a4(mdo sde): la mkhas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i nang gso ba la mkhas pa/ chos kyi sman pa chen po stobs pa yin kyang / nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nang par gyur pa'i seMn rnams kyis mi shes te/ nyon mong
281a5(mdo sde): pa'i nad kyis nang par gyur pa'i sems can rnams gzigs nas/ de dag gi mdun du bdag gi yon tan dang bsngags pa bag nyid brjod de// de nas nyon mongs pa'i nang par
281a6(mdo sde): gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa'i che ba thos nas yid ches par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la rten to// de nas de dag la de bzhinan
281a7(mdo sde): pa sman gyi rgyal po chen po chos kyi sman de dag gis nyon mongs pa'i nang rab tu ni car mdzad// chos kyi sman chen po de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ mi sdug pa dang / byabs pa dang / rten cing
281a8(mdo sde): 'brel par 'byung ba la sogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas/ bdag la bdag nyid stong pa mdzad// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ 
281b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang bral ba yino// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa la smon kyang sbyin pa la mi gnas pa rnams yin/ de bzhin du tshul
281b2(mdo sde): khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / khams gsum pa dang / byang chub dang lam dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la smon kyang mya ngan las
281b3(mdo sde): 'das pa la mi gnas pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas thams cad dang bral ba ste/ mi gnas par 'jig rten thams cad du rnapa
281b4(mdo sde): / spyong ngo // rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang bral ba rnams yino// rigs kyi thu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang
281b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' byams pa'i bdag nyid can yino// bcu gang / zhe na 'di lta ste/ nyi tshe ba med pa'i byams pa dang snga na pa rnams yin/ tha dad pa med pa'i byams pa dang ldan
281b6(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ chos kyi byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ nges par rtog pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gnod pa med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ phan
281b7(mdo sde): ba'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ sems can thaMd la snyoms pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gnod sems med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ phyogs su
281b8(mdo sde): kun tu khyab pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems da / 
282a1(mdo sde): byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams yino// bcu gang zhe na/ 
282a2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sems can sdug bsngal ba dang / skyabs med pa dang / mgon med pa dang / rten med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa dag mthong na/ byang chub tu sems bskyed // byang chub
282a3(mdo sde): tu sems bskyed nas/ chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir 'bad rtsol/ brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ dka' bar spyod pa brgya dag kyang byengo // de dag chos thob nas son rnams la phan par bye'o//
